column3: mthong phyir ji snyed yod pa nyid // / +de la ji snyed yod pa nyid ni shes bya'i dngos po mtha' dag mthar thug par rtogs pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes  rab kyis sems can thams cad la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa rnams la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa nyid mthong ba las rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168307#168316#TD4035E.TXT.r_7621# de'i bde ba la gnas ba ches  gsal bar 'gyur ba dang  des de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i lam thob par 'gyur ba dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i lam yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168316#168328#TD4035E.TXT.r_7621;TD4035E.TXT.r_7622;TD4035E.TXT.r_7623# de'i bde ba la gnas ba ches  gsal bar 'gyur ba dang  des de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i lam thob par 'gyur ba dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i lam yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o // /
column6: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#318917#318917#TD4026E.TXT.r_8156;TD4026E.TXT.r_8157# de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa nyid kyi  dgongs pa'i mtshan nyid DU RIG PAR BYA'O // / +rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa / /
column7: 0.022#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2597208#2597208#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7699;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7700# ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gal te lam la rjes su shes pas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i spangs pa yang dag par 'dzin pas de'i phyir mthong ba'i lam du gyur na / /
column8: 0.025#TD4009E.TXT.r#335446#335446#TD4009E.TXT.r_2049;TD4009E.TXT.r_2050# rigs de yang phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang  phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan  las 'das pas rab tu phye ba dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las 'das pas rab tu phye ba'o // / +de la phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus byas nas / /
column9: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2585477#2585477#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6151# rnam pa    gang zhig spangs la zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nas lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i bar dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'o // /
column10: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876364#1876364#TD4039E.TXT.r_7146# phyir yang srid par skye ba'i gnyen po'i lam bsgoms pas gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bar byas nas / /
column11: 0.028#TD4053E.TXT.r#2986971#2986971#TD4053E.TXT.r_3020;TD4053E.TXT.r_3021# yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po'o // / +yang  dag pa'i shes pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4039E.TXT.r#1874967#1874967#TD4039E.TXT.r_6989;TD4039E.TXT.r_6990# bslab pa gsum po 'di dag ni gzhi dang BCAS PAR RIG PAR BYA'O // / +rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni bslab pa'i 'bras bu dang po'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#167382#167382#TD4035E.TXT.r_7448;TD4035E.TXT.r_7449;TD4035E.TXT.r_7450# phyir zhing  'byung ba dang  'phel ba dang  rgyas par 'byung ba'am / / +nyams par 'gyur pa'i lam gang yin pa'o // / +mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na / /
column14: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1857793#1857793#TD4039E.TXT.r_4960;TD4039E.TXT.r_4961# rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun LA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BTAGS nas thur du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye mched  dang ; / +yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa'i skye mched dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas de dag dang  skye mched de gnyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bden pa'i tshul gyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na // /
column15: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1827306#1827306#TD4039E.TXT.r_1515;TD4039E.TXT.r_1516# mgo mnyam du mar me ltar mya ngan las 'da' BAR RIG PAR BYA'O / / +phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni kun nas dkris pa spong ba dang po'i sgo nas ni zhi ba'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464845#1464845#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7587;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7588# dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin du mi slob pa'i lam la yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mi slob pa'i lam ni ci rigs par sa 'og  ma pa dang mnyam pa'am khyad par yin par sbyar bar bya ste phyogs 'dis sa thams cad sbyar bar bya'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#254879#254879#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5083# sgom pa la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyor ba gsal ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar thogs pa med pa'i lam gang yin pa'o // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba de yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nyid las skye ste / / +chos kyi dbyings  kun tu 'gro ba'i don du rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168329#168341#TD4035E.TXT.r_7623;TD4035E.TXT.r_7624;TD4035E.TXT.r_7625# nyon mongs pa'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na ni / / +de'i phyir gnas gtsang mar skye bar 'gyur te / /

column3: de ltar rtogs pa gang yin de // / +so so rang shes mthong ba nyid // / +dri med dbyings la chags med dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168342#168362#TD4035E.TXT.r_7625;TD4035E.TXT.r_7626;TD4035E.TXT.r_7627# bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa chung du dang 'bring dang  chen po'i bye brag gis thams cad dus gsum du 'gyur te  rtog pa dang bcas pa dang  dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa la sngar bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: thogs med phyir de dag pa yin // / +de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid dang ji snyed pa yod pa nyid kyi rnam pa 'dis  'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa so so rang gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi gzigs par 'dod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168363#168377#TD4035E.TXT.r_7626;TD4035E.TXT.r_7627;TD4035E.TXT.r_7628# rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ni tshangs pa chen po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro // / +spel mar bsgom pa chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen po dang  shin  tu che ba dang  rab tu che bar bsgoms pas gnas gtsang ma'i lnga grub po // /
column5: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1060374#1060374#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1311# spel mar bsgom pa de ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang  shin tu che ba dang  shin tu ches che ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa lnga yin te / /
column6: 0.027#TD4095E.TXT.r#96214#96214#TD4095E.TXT.r_6438# spel mar bsgom pa de ni chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen po dang  shin tu che     // /

column3: de yang mdor bsdu na rgyu gnyis kyis na cig shos nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis  mthong ba la ltos nas shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168378#168396#TD4035E.TXT.r_7627;TD4035E.TXT.r_7628;TD4035E.TXT.r_7629;TD4035E.TXT.r_7630;TD4035E.TXT.r_7631;TD4035E.TXT.r_7632;TD4035E.TXT.r_7633# spel mar bsgom pa chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen po dang  shin  tu che ba dang  rab tu che bar bsgoms pas gnas gtsang ma'i lnga grub po // / +de la dag pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pas na / /
column5: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349930#1349930#TD4037E.TXT.r_4589;TD4037E.TXT.r_4590# kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang  rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can rnams gdul ba'i bsam gtan dang  sdig pa byed pa rnams la ngan song gis rnams par ston pa'i bsam gtan dang  sems can spobs pa med par gyur pa rnams la spobs pa nye bar sgrub pa'i bsam  gtan dang  sems can brjed ngas pa rnams la dran pa nye bar sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa'i bstan bcos dang  snyan dngags dang  ma mo sbyar ba'i rnam par gzhag pa'i bsam gtan dang  'jig rten pa rnams kyi  bzo dang las kyi gnas don dang ldan pa sems can rnams la phan pa rnams dang  yi ge dang rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang grangs dang lag rtsis la sogs pa dang  khri dang khri'u dang  gdugs dang  lham la sogs pa dang  snod spyad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa mang po rnams 'byung bar  byed pa'i bsam gtan dang  sems can ngan song gi sar skyes pa rnams kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal de'i mod la bsal ba'i phyir 'od zer 'gyed pa'i bsam gtan no // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na / /

column3: gnyis po gang dag gis she na / / +chags pa med pa'i phyir dang  thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +de la ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i yul     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168397#168406#TD4035E.TXT.r_7632;TD4035E.TXT.r_7633;TD4035E.TXT.r_7634;TD4035E.TXT.r_7635# de las 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro // / +ji ste dag pa bsgom na de nyid du skye ba'am / /

column3: can gyi phyir ni chags pa med pa yin la / / +ji snyed yod pa nyid kyis shes bya'i dngos po mtha' med pa'i yul can gyi phyir ni thogs pa med pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168407#168419#TD4035E.TXT.r_7634;TD4035E.TXT.r_7635;TD4035E.TXT.r_7636;TD4035E.TXT.r_7637;TD4035E.TXT.r_7638# yang na 'og mar skye bar 'gyur ro // / +gong ma la snyoms par 'jug na ni steng du 'phar bar 'gyur te / /

column3: ye shes gzigs pa dag pas na // / +sangs rgyas ye shes bla med phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168418#168434#TD4035E.TXT.r_7636;TD4035E.TXT.r_7637;TD4035E.TXT.r_7638;TD4035E.TXT.r_7639;TD4035E.TXT.r_7640;TD4035E.TXT.r_7641# sngar 'di snyoms par zhugs nas de'i 'og tu der  skye bar 'gyur ro // / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +so so'i skye bo 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni / /
column5: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2633733#2633733#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12231# ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis kyang log par nges par sems pa'i phyir der thal bar 'gyur ro  zhe na / /

column3: 'phags pa phyir mi  ldog pa ni // / +lus can kun gyi skyabs yin no // /
column4: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1207309#1207309#TD4047E.TXT.r_12268;TD4047E.TXT.r_12269# ji skad bstan pa'i rtags rnams dang ldan pa dang  byang chub kyi sbyor ba la zhugs pa dang   bsam pa rnam par sbyong bar byed pas 'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 'di dag la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir te / / +rigs la gnas pa yang sems bskyed pa'i bslab pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa yin no // /
column5: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1981346#1981347#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_368;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_369;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_370# dbyibs med kyang de'i bkod pa tha dad pas 'di ni phreng ba'o // / +'di ni 'khor lo'o zhes bya bar 'gyur te / / +khyad par du 'phags par gnas pa'i  phyir ro // /
column6: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1218304#1218304#TD4047E.TXT.r_13759# de rnam par dag pas bsgom pa'i rab kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir de dag mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa yan chad ces bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi gzigs pa de ni bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi gzigs pa rnam par dag pa dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ram / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168435#168450#TD4035E.TXT.r_7641;TD4035E.TXT.r_7642;TD4035E.TXT.r_7643;TD4035E.TXT.r_7644;TD4035E.TXT.r_7645;TD4035E.TXT.r_7646# 'di dang der snyoms par zhugs pa gnyis la yang bde ba'i bye brag ni  med la / / +lus kyi bye brag ni yod do // /
column5: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2640941#2640943#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13137;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13138;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13139# rnam par thar pa ni rnam pa brgyad de / / +brgyad gang zhe na / / +gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni RNAM PAR THAR PA DANG po'o // /

column3: gang dang ldan pas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168449#168459#TD4035E.TXT.r_7644;TD4035E.TXT.r_7645;TD4035E.TXT.r_7646;TD4035E.TXT.r_7647;TD4035E.TXT.r_7648# mdo sde bsdu ba gang zhe na / / +rnam par thar pa brgyad ni / / +gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste snga ma bzhin no // /

column3: de las gzhan pa tshul khrims la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams las bla na med pa nyid du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168460#168468#TD4035E.TXT.r_7647;TD4035E.TXT.r_7648;TD4035E.TXT.r_7649;TD4035E.TXT.r_7650# rnam par grol ba ni mos  par 'gyur te / / +de bas na rnam par thar pa bdun no // /

column3: byang chub sems  dpa'i dge 'dun gyi rjes thogs su nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dkon mchog ni ma smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168469#168476#TD4035E.TXT.r_7649;TD4035E.TXT.r_7650;TD4035E.TXT.r_7651;TD4035E.TXT.r_7652# 'du shes dang tshor ba la mi phyogs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad de / / +de ltar na rnam par thar ba brgyad ces bya'o // /

column3: de mchod par 'os pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang  nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par shes pa ni nam yang byang chub chen po'i bsod nams dang   ye shes kyi chogs rgya chen po rdzogs par byed pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168477#168484#TD4035E.TXT.r_7651;TD4035E.TXT.r_7652;TD4035E.TXT.r_7653;TD4035E.TXT.r_7654;TD4035E.TXT.r_7655# gzugs can gzugs rnams la ji ltar lta zhe na / / +'dod pa'i khams su skyes par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168484#168496#TD4035E.TXT.r_7653;TD4035E.TXT.r_7654;TD4035E.TXT.r_7655;TD4035E.TXT.r_7656;TD4035E.TXT.r_7657# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni thob la / / +gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang ni ma bral te / / +de de ltar grol bar gyur na / /

column3: shes rab dang  snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can gzhal du med pa'i sems can gyi khams snang bar nye bar gnas pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168497#168514#TD4035E.TXT.r_7656;TD4035E.TXT.r_7657;TD4035E.TXT.r_7658;TD4035E.TXT.r_7659;TD4035E.TXT.r_7660# gang dag las grol ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs de dag nyid yid la byed de / / +snang zhing gsal ba dang bcas pa'i mtshan mas mos  par byed de // /

column3: bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba nya ba thob pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam du zhugs pa / / +byang chub  sems dpa' zla ba tshes pa dor nas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa skar ma'i gzugs ltar rang gi rgyud snang ba nye bar gnas pa'i nyan thos la nam yang phyag byed pa ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168514#168527#TD4035E.TXT.r_7659;TD4035E.TXT.r_7660;TD4035E.TXT.r_7661;TD4035E.TXT.r_7662;TD4035E.TXT.r_7663;TD4035E.TXT.r_7664# gang 'dod pa'i khams su skyes par gyur pa dang  gang gzugs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob nas / / +snang ba dang bcas pa la yang mos pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168527#168535#TD4035E.TXT.r_7663;TD4035E.TXT.r_7664# ci'i phyir na ni lta zhe na / / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams su rnam par bshig pa'i gzugs chung du kha dog bzang po dang  kha dog ngan pa dang  bzang po rnams gang dag yin pa ste / /

column3: gzhan la phan par byed pa'i bsam pa rnam par ma dag pa'i phyir ro // / +yang dag par  brten pa'i yon tan nyid kyis sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas kyang rjes su brtse ba med pa gzhan rgyas par byed pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par gyur pa yang zil gyis gnon na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168534#168543#TD4035E.TXT.r_7664;TD4035E.TXT.r_7665;TD4035E.TXT.r_7666# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams su rnam par bshig pa'i gzugs chung du kha dog bzang po dang  kha dog ngan pa dang  bzang po rnams gang dag yin pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168543#168563#TD4035E.TXT.r_7665;TD4035E.TXT.r_7666;TD4035E.TXT.r_7667;TD4035E.TXT.r_7668;TD4035E.TXT.r_7669# chen po rnams la zhes bya ba yang de bzhin du rgyas  par bya'o // / +ci'i phyir zhe na / /
column6: 0.013#TD4044E.TXT.r#391376#391377#TD4044E.TXT.r_1779;TD4044E.TXT.r_1780# grol ba rnams yongs su byang bar mdzad PA'I PHYIR TE / / +bstan par mdzad pa'i don du sbyong bar mdzad pa'i don to // /
column7: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311777#2311778#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_112# kha cig na re 'di ni bskal ba grangs med pa gnyis par gtogs pas rab tu dga' ba'i nye ba'i sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ji ltar mi lcogs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsam gtan dang por gtogs pa lta bu'o zhe'o / /
column8: 0.014#TD4047E.TXT.r#1222784#1222784#TD4047E.TXT.r_14401;TD4047E.TXT.r_14402# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas tha ma las sa'i le'u ste gsum pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +de ltar sa la gnas PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I spyod pa'i  sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir / /
column9: 0.017#TD4049E.TXT.r#2298822#2298823#TD4049E.TXT.r_2013;TD4049E.TXT.r_2014# 'dod pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // / +'bral ba'i bar du gcod pa'i phyir sbyor ba rnams te / /
column10: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1015950#1015951#TD4054E.TXT.r_4219;TD4054E.TXT.r_4220# 'dod pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // / +bral ba'i bar du gcod pa'i phyir sbyor ba rnams te / /
column11: 0.018#TD4009E.TXT.r#326479#326480#TD4009E.TXT.r_924;TD4009E.TXT.r_925# mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su 'jog nus so snyam pa'am sems can gyi tshogs bsgral ba la lta bas gzhan la phan par  bya bar nus pa ni GZHAN LA PHAN PAR SBYOR ba ste / / +phan par sbyor ba'i phyir / /
column12: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1477058#1477058#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8958# mi dge ba ni sa gong ma pa'i dge ba'i sbyor ba nyid yin par mi srid pa'i phyir dang  de ma spangs par sa gong mar skye ba'i sems mi     // /
column13: 0.022#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199682#2199684#TD4046E.TXT.r_511;TD4046E.TXT.r_512# dper na nyan thos kyi sdom pa la skyabs su sngon du 'gro ba de bzhin du BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I YANG smon lam sngon du 'gro bar bstan pa'i phyir / / +brtan par bya ba'i don du smon lam 'dri bar byed do // /
column14: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1173442#1173444#TD4047E.TXT.r_7628# dper na nyan thos kyi sdom pa la skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du 'gro ba de bzhin du BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I YANG smon lam sngon du 'gro bar bstan pa'i phyir brtan par bya ba'i don du smon lam 'dri bar byed do // /
column15: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#196222#196223#TD4035E.TXT.r_12487;TD4035E.TXT.r_12488# de dag spang ba ni lha mo des snga ma'i rjes su dpag pas SHES PA'I PHYIR RO // / +tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i thabs dang  ji ltar de dag legs par spong bar 'gyur  ba lus te / /
column16: 0.023#TD4079E.TXT.r#758407#758407#TD4079E.TXT.r_277;TD4079E.TXT.r_278# gsum pa NI RNAM PAR DAG PA'I don du  dmigs pas don dam par yod pa ste / / +rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir / /
column17: 0.024#TD4019E.TXT.r#2412385#2412385#TD4019E.TXT.r_645;TD4019E.TXT.r_646# stong pa'i dngos pos gnas par bya // / +zhes zab mo'i don SMRAS PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column18: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2911644#2911644#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6118# thabs la mkhas pas theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i don rtogs par bya bar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste / /
column19: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#52136#52136#TD4036E.TXT.r_7831# de ltar na re zhig nang dang  phyi rol gyi mi sdug pa'i sbyor ba la brten pa'i mos pa yid la byed pas khams rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i phyir  lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed do // /
column20: 0.024#TD4019E.TXT.r#2479247#2479247#TD4019E.TXT.r_9384# bag chags kyi rgyu las skyes pa ni de las don du snang ba'i bsam pa dang de las brjod par 'dod pa la sogs pa'o // /
column21: 0.024#TD4012E.TXT.r#1588403#1588403#TD4012E.TXT.r_44;TD4012E.TXT.r_45# zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +gang las ci la ji ltar  mi chags pa'i sbyor ba de bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / /
column22: 0.025#TD4066E.TXT.r#2102643#2102643#TD4066E.TXT.r_76;TD4066E.TXT.r_77# gang zhig gang la 'dzin pa dang brjod pa 'jug pa de ni rten dang tha dad pa'i rang bzhin med pas btags pa'i yod pa nyid de / / +don du ma yin pas btags pa'i yod pa nyid ces bya'o // /
column23: 0.025#TD4029E.TXT.r#2151599#2151599#TD4029E.TXT.r_4048# de dag gis rab tu sbyar bas sems can zhing lta bu de dag la mchod pa sa bon la sogs pa lta bu  ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i me tog skye bar bya ba'i don du zhes bya ba'i phyir btab par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264887#264887#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6440# de ltar na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni / / +mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  dpe'i phyir dang  yongs su grags pa'i phyir dang  lung gi  tshad ma'i phyir mtshan nyid lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column25: 0.026#TD4044E.TXT.r#390545#390545#TD4044E.TXT.r_1613# ma dad PA DAD PAR BYED PA'I phyir dang  bsam pa  dag par byed pa'i phyir dang  sbyor BA DAG PAR BYED PA'I DON gyis so // /
column26: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393648#2393650#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9813# rnam par thar pa dang pos ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  'phags pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon  nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa mngon par sgrub par byed do zhes bshad do // /
column27: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248147#248147#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4348# sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i phyir dang yon tan dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir khyad par yod par  gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column28: 0.028#TD4041E.TXT.r#1270460#1270460#TD4041E.TXT.r_229;TD4041E.TXT.r_230# rjes  su mthun pa ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang yon tan khyad par can 'thob pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o // / +rjes su 'phrod pa ni dge ba mi spyoms pa'o // /
column29: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127394#1127395#TD4047E.TXT.r_875# thams cad    kyi sems bskyed pa'i rnam pa gcig pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir dang  de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rnam pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir / /
column30: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2997735#2997735#TD4053E.TXT.r_4371;TD4053E.TXT.r_4372# de la de ltar mos pa'i don ni rnam par thar pa'i don du rig par bya'o // / +zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched la sogs pa'i las kyang snga ma bzhin du de bstan pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya'o // /

column3: de las gzhan pa'i yon tan dbang bcu la sogs pa lta ci smos te / / +gang gi phyir / / +gang zhig tshul khrims bdag don byed pas rnam rgyas shing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168564#168578#TD4035E.TXT.r_7669;TD4035E.TXT.r_7670;TD4035E.TXT.r_7671# zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad ba'i skye mched dang  'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas  shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393678#2393679#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9815# zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched yongs su dag pas ni nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed do // /
column6: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#169025#169027#TD4035E.TXT.r_7761;TD4035E.TXT.r_7762# zad par rnam par shes pa'i skya mched yongs su  dag pas ni / / +nyon mongs pa med pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed do // /

column3: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can rnams la brtse bral ba // / +bdag nyid rgyas byed tshul khrims nor gyis rab dag pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168579#168591#TD4035E.TXT.r_7670;TD4035E.TXT.r_7671;TD4035E.TXT.r_7672;TD4035E.TXT.r_7673;TD4035E.TXT.r_7674# de sngon gzugs de dag las 'dod chags dang bral du zin kyang / / +des de dag la mos pa'i dbang ma thob pas na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2641923#2641925#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13238# yul b'a r'a na s'i'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba lta bu rnams la lta zhing zhes bya ba nas rgyas par 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang  nang gzugs  med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba dper na ban du dzi ba ka'i me tog gam / /
column6: 0.020#TD4061E.TXT.r#1519893#1519894#TD4061E.TXT.r_887;TD4061E.TXT.r_888# de dang du len pa'i phyir ni dbang du song ba'o // / +de'i dbang gis las kun nas slong bar byed pa'i phyir ni lag tu song ba'o // /
column7: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603060#2603060#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8393;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8394# yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i     // / +chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir yang spel bar byed do // /
column8: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2203794#2203794#TD4046E.TXT.r_1050;TD4046E.TXT.r_1051# dgongs te gsungs zhes bya ba ni don gzhan la ldem por dgongs pa'i tshig yin pa'i    phyir ro // / +mos pa'i dbang kho nas spong bar mi byed na ni nyes pa med do // /
column9: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1177555#1177555#TD4047E.TXT.r_8137;TD4047E.TXT.r_8138# dgongs te gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni don  gzhan la ldem por dgongs pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir ro // / +mos pa'i dbang kho nas spong bar mi byed na ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: 'phags pa de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag mi brjod // / +gang zhig gzhan la mchog tu snying rje bskyed nas ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168590#168601#TD4035E.TXT.r_7673;TD4035E.TXT.r_7674;TD4035E.TXT.r_7675;TD4035E.TXT.r_7676;TD4035E.TXT.r_7677# nang gzugs  med par 'du shes pas / / +phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la ji ltar lta zhe na / /

column3: tshul khrims yang dag blangs pa byas te me rlung dang / / +chu dang sa bzhin gzhan dag nye bar 'tsho byed pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168602#168611#TD4035E.TXT.r_7675;TD4035E.TXT.r_7676;TD4035E.TXT.r_7677;TD4035E.TXT.r_7678;TD4035E.TXT.r_7679# 'dod pa'i khams su skyes bar 'gyur la / / +gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang ni bral / / +gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mngon du mi byed la / /

column3: de ni khrims ldan gzhan ni de yi gzugs brnyan  yin // / +zhes bshad do // / +de la don gang gis dbang du byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168612#168620#TD4035E.TXT.r_7678;TD4035E.TXT.r_7679;TD4035E.TXT.r_7680;TD4035E.TXT.r_7681# de'i 'du shes dang ni ldan te / / +nang gi  snang ba'i mtshan ma yid la mi byed la / / +phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la mos par byed do // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis skyabs gsum rnam par gzhag pa mdzad ce na / / +ston pa bstan pa slob don gyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168621#168629#TD4035E.TXT.r_7680;TD4035E.TXT.r_7681;TD4035E.TXT.r_7682# phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la mos par byed do // / +gang dag las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa de dag ni de'i phyi rol zhes bya'o // /

column3: theg gsum pa dang byed gsum la // / +mos pa rnams kyi dbang byas nas // / +skyabs  gsum rnam par gzhag pa yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168630#168639#TD4035E.TXT.r_7682;TD4035E.TXT.r_7683;TD4035E.TXT.r_7684;TD4035E.TXT.r_7685# de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa zhes bya ste / / +gang gzugs med     // /

column3: ston pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi dngos po nyid don du gnyer bar zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dag / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168640#168649#TD4035E.TXT.r_7684;TD4035E.TXT.r_7685;TD4035E.TXT.r_7686;TD4035E.TXT.r_7687# med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob la / / +snyoms par 'jug pa de yang bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang  gang nang gi snang ba'i mtshan ma yid la mi byed pa ste / /

column3: sangs rgyas la mchog tu bya ba byed par mos pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas sangs rgyas ni  skyabs yin te / / +rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zhing rnam par gzhag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168650#168663#TD4035E.TXT.r_7686;TD4035E.TXT.r_7687;TD4035E.TXT.r_7688;TD4035E.TXT.r_7689;TD4035E.TXT.r_7690# lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no // / +sdug pa'i rnam par thar ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas te / /

column3: ston pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i don du / / +rang nyid rten 'brel gyi chos zab mo rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir zhugs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168664#168676#TD4035E.TXT.r_7689;TD4035E.TXT.r_7690;TD4035E.TXT.r_7691;TD4035E.TXT.r_7692;TD4035E.TXT.r_7693# 'di ltar 'di na kha cig btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag cing / / +yongs su byang ba thob par gyur la / / +des de la brten nas sdug pa bsgoms te / /

column3: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dang  chos  la mchog tu bya ba byed par mos pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas chos ni skyabs yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168675#168685#TD4035E.TXT.r_7692;TD4035E.TXT.r_7693;TD4035E.TXT.r_7694;TD4035E.TXT.r_7695# 'phags pa'i rnam pas yongs su rdzogs pa ni sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa zhes  bya'o // / +ci'i phyir zhe na / /

column3: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zhing rnam par gzhag go // / +ston pa'i bstan pa la legs par zhugs pa'i slob ma'i yon tan bstan pa'i don du  gzhan las thos pa'i sgra'i rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir zhugs pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag dang  dge 'dun la mchog tu bya ba byed par mos pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas dge 'dun ni skyabs yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168686#168693#TD4035E.TXT.r_7695;TD4035E.TXT.r_7696;TD4035E.TXT.r_7697# bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la rnam par 'das pa dang  gyo ba thams cad dang bral ba dang  shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168694#168704#TD4035E.TXT.r_7695;TD4035E.TXT.r_7696;TD4035E.TXT.r_7697;TD4035E.TXT.r_7698;TD4035E.TXT.r_7699;TD4035E.TXT.r_7700# bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la rnam par 'das pa dang  gyo ba thams cad dang bral ba dang  shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro // / +lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba ni / / +gnas pa des 'phags  pa rnams shas cher gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168702#168716#TD4035E.TXT.r_7697;TD4035E.TXT.r_7698;TD4035E.TXT.r_7699;TD4035E.TXT.r_7700;TD4035E.TXT.r_7701;TD4035E.TXT.r_7702;TD4035E.TXT.r_7703# gnas pa des 'phags  pa rnams shas cher gnas pa'i phyir ro // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ni / /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168728#168730#TD4035E.TXT.r_7705;TD4035E.TXT.r_7706;TD4035E.TXT.r_7707;TD4035E.TXT.r_7701;TD4035E.TXT.r_7702;TD4035E.TXT.r_7703;TD4035E.TXT.r_7704# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ni / / +ci yang med pa'i skye mched thob la / / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mos par byed pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2308371#2308377#TD4049E.TXT.r_3543;TD4049E.TXT.r_3544# thar pa'i rjes su mthun pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ji lta bar    rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste / /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352985#2352989#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4895;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4896# snying rje'i mtha' ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o // / +dga' ba ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o // /
column10: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2163898#2163898#TD4029E.TXT.r_5724;TD4029E.TXT.r_5725# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga ba'o // / +de rnam pa thams cad du  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o // /
column11: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128034#2128037#TD4029E.TXT.r_1035;TD4029E.TXT.r_1036;TD4029E.TXT.r_1037# gnas pa ni gsum pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni bzhi pa'o // /
column12: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1042139#1042144#TD4054E.TXT.r_8154# zad par sa dang  zad par chu dang  zad par med  dang  zad par rlung dang  zad par sngon po dang  zad par ser po dang  zad par dmar po dang  zad par dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /
column13: 0.022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1599134#1599135#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_774;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_775# zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // / +zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis  bsdus so // /
column14: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#65627#65628#TD4095E.TXT.r_491;TD4095E.TXT.r_492# zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dag kyang  de dang 'dra'o // / +zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so // /
column15: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392618#2392619#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9692# nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang ldan pa'i rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya bas ni sems lnga pa ston to // /
column16: 0.023#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078735#1078735#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4410# zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlu rlung dang  sngon po dang ser po dang  dmar po dang dkar  po dang  zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /
column17: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786350#786350#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3251;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3252# zad par gyi skye mched bcu las / / +zad par nam mkha' dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag gis te / /
column18: 0.023#TD4095E.TXT.r#104224#104224#TD4095E.TXT.r_8091# zad par sa dang chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /
column19: 0.024#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2755551#2755551#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7740;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7741# de grub pa'i rgyus gnas pa mchog gis bsdus pa 'du shes dang  tshor ba 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro // / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las ni khyab pa'i  rnam pa mtha' yas pa dang  tshad med pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas de'i phyir gong du zad par rnam par gzhag pa med do // /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393619#2393619#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9810# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las 'phags pa  rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa mngon du byed do zhes bshad do // /
column21: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920057#920058#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3765;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3766# bzang po'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas gnas te rnam par thar ba gsum pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang  cung zad med min skye mched dang  'gog ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang brgyad de / /
column22: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876727#1876728#TD4039E.TXT.r_7185;TD4039E.TXT.r_7186# bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa rnams la ni gong nas gong du gyo ba spangs pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya'o // / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la  ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi phyi rol du bltas pa'i dmigs pa'i gyo ba tsam las dben pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya ste / /
column23: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1416463#1416463#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1873# dgu pa dang bcu pa zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag ni 'og nas 'chad par     // /
column24: 0.025#TD4033E.TXT.r#1388778#1388783#TD4033E.TXT.r_1073# nam mkha'  dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas so // /
column25: 0.025#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1912476#1912477#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3599;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3600# nam  mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi ba'o // / +de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs shing nye bar gnas te / /
column26: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2712939#2712941#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1406;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1407# chen por gyur pa'i 'du shes ni gzugs na spyod pa'i'o // / +tshad med pa'i 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na spyod pa'i'o // /
column27: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117361#3117362#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3703# nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang ldan pa'i'o // /
column28: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1416499#1416499#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1876;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1877# 'khor rnams dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos  kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so zhes snga ma bzhin du rnam par bshad par bya'o // / +zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po ste / /
column29: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#2974229#2974229#TD4053E.TXT.r_1302# 'du shes med pa la sogs pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang  nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi dmigs pa'o // /
column30: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1008245#1008245#TD4054E.TXT.r_2880# 'du shes med pa la sbyor ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang  nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rnams kyi dmigs pa'o // /
column31: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965661#2965661#TD4053E.TXT.r_142# tshad med pa ni nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la ste / /
column32: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#993964#993964#TD4054E.TXT.r_428# tshad med pa ni nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa ste / /
column33: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2640997#2640997#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13143;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13144# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byed de gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa ste / / +'di lta ste nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams lta bu'o // /
column34: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876712#1876713#TD4039E.TXT.r_7184# sna tshogs kyi 'du shes kyi gyo ba spangs pa'i phyir ni nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched mi gyo ba'o // /

column3: tshogs rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan     // / +cing rnam par gzhag go // / +de ltar 'dis ni mdor bsdu na don rnam pa gsum gyis gang zag drug gi dbang du byas nas / /
column4: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2755526#2755526#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7737# zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched grub na / /
column5: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024648#1024649#TD4054E.TXT.r_5578# 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye    mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de / /
column6: 0.017#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282116#1282117#TD4086E.TXT.r_338# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye    skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni kha dog med do // /
column7: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#864107#864108#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15805;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15806# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do // / +rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column8: 0.020#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2760275#2760275#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8433;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8434# de ma thob pas bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'i sems ni mi skye ba de lta bu dang  'di ltar 'di na la las bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes     // / +mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched la rags par yid la byed cing bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste / /
column9: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#993900#993901#TD4054E.TXT.r_417# gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched shes pa'o // /
column10: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041168#1041168#TD4054E.TXT.r_8004# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam thar gyi lta bar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam thar kyang de bzhin     // /
column11: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1711467#1711467#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1794# bdag gi tshor ba dang btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te / /
column12: 0.020#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2730179#2730179#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4182# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa na ji lta ba bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa na yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o // /
column13: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392667#2392668#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9695# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de mtha' MED PA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BSHAD DO // /

column15: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128152#2128152#TD4029E.TXT.r_1052# zad par gyi skye mched ni zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag go // /

column22: 0.022#TD4029E.TXT.r#2163898#2163898#TD4029E.TXT.r_5724;TD4029E.TXT.r_5725# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga ba'o // / +de rnam pa thams cad du  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o // /
column23: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393619#2393619#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9810# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las 'phags pa  rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa mngon du byed do zhes bshad do // /

column22: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2066690#2066690#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12825# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column23: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#754193#754193#TD4091E.TXT.r_10739# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mjug thogs su rang gis pa dang  rnam shes mtha' yas dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas kyi skye mched kyis pa'i dag pa dang  zag pa med pa / /
column24: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2755508#2755508#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7735;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7736# zad par nam mkha' yas skye mched kyis ni 'ong ba dang 'gro ba 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub par byed do // / +zad par rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched kyis ni nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub par byed do // /
column25: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351157#2351157#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4658# rnam par shes pa la rab tu dga' bas gnas pas de'i phyir rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column26: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353177#2353178#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4914# dga' ba ni bde ba'i rnam pa 'byed pa lta bur 'jug pa'i phyir dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni  rang gi rnam par shes pa mtha' med pa la dmigs pa'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir dang  mtha' med pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu 'phel ba dang bde bar gyur pa'i phyir dga' ba bsgoms pa'i mtha' ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column27: 0.025#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876726#1876726#TD4039E.TXT.r_7185;TD4039E.TXT.r_7186# bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa rnams la ni gong nas gong du gyo ba spangs pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya'o // / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la  ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi phyi rol du bltas pa'i dmigs pa'i gyo ba tsam las dben pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya ste / /
column28: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2076056#2076058#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14183# rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam du mos pa'i sbyor ba grub pas ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de / /
column29: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876646#1876646#TD4039E.TXT.r_7175# mthar gyis rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mi gyo ba'i bar du snyoms par 'jug go // /
column30: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393618#2393618#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9810# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las 'phags pa  rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa mngon du byed do zhes bshad do // /
column31: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2642624#2642624#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13300# de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i khams su yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du skyes pa la las kyi  stobs kyis ni sa gong ma pa rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyis pa'i las lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir de las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mthun pa'i rgyud gnas te / /
column32: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1488608#1488608#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10297# khyad par ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig yod do // /
column33: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2641033#2641033#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13146# 'di lta ste rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams lta bu'o // /
column34: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1741200#1741200#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5479# chos la 'dun pa de nyid dang  chos la sred pa de nyid dang  chos la dga' ba de nyid dang  chos la mngon par rab tu dga' ba de nyid kyis rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column35: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353205#2353205#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4914# dga' ba ni bde ba'i rnam pa 'byed pa lta bur 'jug pa'i phyir dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni  rang gi rnam par shes pa mtha' med pa la dmigs pa'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir dang  mtha' med pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu 'phel ba dang bde bar gyur pa'i phyir dga' ba bsgoms pa'i mtha' ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column36: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2082512#2082512#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15172# rang gi sa pa  dang gong ma'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa'i dmigs pa ni rang gi sa pa'i sdug bsngal dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'i sa pa yin gyi / /

column3: sdang phyir slu ba'i chos can phyir // / +med phyir 'jigs dang bcas pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168743#168762#TD4035E.TXT.r_7709;TD4035E.TXT.r_7710;TD4035E.TXT.r_7711;TD4035E.TXT.r_7712;TD4035E.TXT.r_7713;TD4035E.TXT.r_7714# gzhan la mos par mi byed de / / +ji srid du  zad par gyi 'du shes 'byung ba de srid du mos par bya dgos so // /

column3: chos rnams gnyis dang 'phags pa'i tshogs // / +gtan gyi skyabs mchog ma yin no // /
chos ni rnam par gnyis te / / +bstan pa'i chos dang rtogs  pa'i chos so // / +de ltar bstan pa'i chos ni mdo'i sde la sogs pa bstan pa brjod pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168763#168776#TD4035E.TXT.r_7713;TD4035E.TXT.r_7714;TD4035E.TXT.r_7715;TD4035E.TXT.r_7716;TD4035E.TXT.r_7717# lta ba'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ces bya'o // / +zil gyis gnon pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste / /

column3: ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs kyis bsdus pa'o // / +de yang lam mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir gzings lta bu'o zhes bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168777#168790#TD4035E.TXT.r_7716;TD4035E.TXT.r_7717;TD4035E.TXT.r_7718;TD4035E.TXT.r_7719;TD4035E.TXT.r_7720# dper na bzo la sogs pa 'ga' zhig gis lhag pa'i phyir / / +des gzhan chung bar rtsi ba lta bu'o // /

column3: rtogs pa'i chos ni rgyu dang  'bras bu'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis te / / +'di lta ste / / +lam gyi bden pa dang  'gog pa'i bden pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168785#168800#TD4035E.TXT.r_7718;TD4035E.TXT.r_7719;TD4035E.TXT.r_7720;TD4035E.TXT.r_7721;TD4035E.TXT.r_7722# nyams stobs chung bar zil gyis gnon pa ni / / +dper na stobs dang ldan pas ches stobs chung ngu brnyas pa lta bu'o // /

column3: gang gis dang gang rtogs pa zhes bya bas so // / +de la lam ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du rtogs la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168801#168811#TD4035E.TXT.r_7721;TD4035E.TXT.r_7722;TD4035E.TXT.r_7723;TD4035E.TXT.r_7724;TD4035E.TXT.r_7725# dper na rtsig pa la    sogs pas bar du bcad pa dang  gsang sngags sam / / +rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar byed pa lta bu'o // /

column3: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du rtogs pa gang yin pa  'di ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can gang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos chan de ni mi bden pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168805#168822#TD4035E.TXT.r_7722;TD4035E.TXT.r_7723;TD4035E.TXT.r_7724;TD4035E.TXT.r_7725;TD4035E.TXT.r_7726;TD4035E.TXT.r_7727# rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar byed pa lta bu'o // / +sun 'byin pas zil gyis gnon pa ni / / +dper na nyon mongs pa rnams sun phyung nas spong bar byed pa lta bu'o // /

column3: gang mi bden pa de ni mi rtag pa / / +gang ming rtag pa de ni skyabs ma yin no // / +lam des rtogs pa'i 'gog pa gang yin pa de yang nyan thos kyi tshul gyis mar me rgyun chad pa bzhin du nyon mongs pa  dang sdug bsngal med pa tsam gyis rab tu phye la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168821#168834#TD4035E.TXT.r_7726;TD4035E.TXT.r_7727;TD4035E.TXT.r_7728;TD4035E.TXT.r_7729# dper na rje bos  bran la ci dga' dgur bsko ba lta bu'o // / +don 'di'i skabs su ni mi snang bar zil gyis gnon pa dang  dbang byed pas zil gyis gnon pa gzung bar bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168835#168845#TD4035E.TXT.r_7728;TD4035E.TXT.r_7729;TD4035E.TXT.r_7730# sngar ni rnam par thar pa rnams la mos pas dbang byed do // / +de'i 'og tu ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mchad rnams la zil  gyis gnon pas dbang byed do // /

column3: med pa ni skyabs sam skyabs ma yin par 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin no // / +dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di ni theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168846#168861#TD4035E.TXT.r_7729;TD4035E.TXT.r_7730;TD4035E.TXT.r_7731;TD4035E.TXT.r_7732;TD4035E.TXT.r_7733;TD4035E.TXT.r_7734;TD4035E.TXT.r_7735# de'i 'og tu ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mchad rnams la zil  gyis gnon pas dbang byed do // / +de la gzugs chung ngu dag mthong ZHES BYA BA NI / /

column3: de yang rtag tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs  pa la skyabs su song ba / /

column6: 0.023#TD4097E.TXT.r#2214624#2214624#TD4097E.TXT.r_1365# thar par 'du shes pa bzlog pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar par 'du shes pa dor ba'i phyir khams gnyis nas skyes pa'i 'dod chags ni srid pa'i  'dod chags zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#827897#827897#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10185;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10186# sems dang sems las byung ba gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes  bya ba'o // / +de dag dang mi mthun pas zhes bya ba ni 'du shes dang mi mthun pas dang  'du shes dang tshor ba dang mi mthun pas so // /
column8: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#34159#34159#TD4036E.TXT.r_5230# bral ba'i dbyings dang  'gog pa'i dbyings la zhi bar lta ba ni spang pa'i 'du shes dang  'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang  'gog pa'i 'du shes sgom par byed do // /
column9: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2712921#2712923#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1403# mtshan ma  dang bcas pa'i 'du shes dang  mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes dang  chung ngu'i 'du shes dang  chen por gyur pa'i 'du shes dang  tshad med pa'i 'du shes dang  ci yang med pa'i 'du shes so // /

column3: dper na ral gri gdengs pa'i gshed ma'i skyes bu la bya ba bzhin te / / +des na de dag kyang gtan du bde ba'i nges par  'byung ba thob pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168897#168919#TD4035E.TXT.r_7741;TD4035E.TXT.r_7742;TD4035E.TXT.r_7743;TD4035E.TXT.r_7744;TD4035E.TXT.r_7745;TD4035E.TXT.r_7746;TD4035E.TXT.r_7747# de ltar 'du shes zhes bya ba ni zil gyis gnon pa'i 'du shes so // / +zad par gyi skye mched rnams kyis ni / / +mos par bya ba'i dngos po'i zad par gyi skye mched la mos bar byed do // /

column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#168919#168929#TD4035E.TXT.r_7746;TD4035E.TXT.r_7747;TD4035E.TXT.r_7748# chad med pa ni thams cad kyi'o // / +gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched 'di gnyis ci'i phyir rnam par gzhag ce na / /
column5: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2634426#2634427#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12316# gal te yang gzugs med par skye ba'i gzugs na dang ba'i phyir sa 'og ma pa'i dbang pos mi 'dzin pas gzugs med pa rnams zhes bya ba'o zhe na / /

column13: 0.021#TD4051E.TXT.r#1245518#1245518#TD4051E.TXT.r_1812# rga ba la sogs pa  zhes bya ba ni rga ba la sogs pas gzugs la sogs par snang ba'i rnam par rig pa rnams 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir te / /
column14: 0.022#TD4018E.TXT.r#3052516#3052518#TD4018E.TXT.r_6278# 'dus pa'i gzugs la sgyu ma'i gzugs gcig tu nges pas na tha dad par dmigs su med pa'i phyir tha dad par yang mi rung ngo // /
column15: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#993042#993043#TD4054E.TXT.r_225;TD4054E.TXT.r_226# rjes su 'gyur pa'i rgyu nyid ni 'byung ba rnams gyur na de la gnas pa nye bar blangs pa'i gzugs rnams mi gnas par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +gnas par byed pa'i  rgyu nyid ni mtshungs par 'byung ba'i dus na 'byung ba rnams kyis nye bar blangs pa'i gzugs kyi rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.023#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1074307#1074307#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3645;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3646# snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro // / +bsam gtan du skye ba'i gzugs kyang sa 'og ma'i dbang pos mi zin pa'i phyir de dang yang khyad par ci zhig yod / /
column17: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529126#1529126#TD4061E.TXT.r_2281;TD4061E.TXT.r_2282# rnam  pa gcig tu na sdug bsngal gyi phung po can gyi mdo dang bo las 'dod pa rnams dang gzugs rnams gsungs PA BZHIN NO // / +yid byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'gog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i  phyir dang  kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir te go rims bzhin no // /
column18: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2970185#2970185#TD4053E.TXT.r_776;TD4053E.TXT.r_777# gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis ma bsgyur pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur ba'i  gzugs ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir te / / +sems mnyam pa'i lha bzhin no // /
column19: 0.026#TD4032E.TXT.r#1942567#1942567#TD4032E.TXT.r_3588# de la  gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du brtags pa'i phyir kun brtags pa'o // /

column21: 0.026#TD4060E.TXT.r#681139#681139#TD4060E.TXT.r_108;TD4060E.TXT.r_109# gro bzhin skyes dge sbyong ngam bram ze de dag thams cad ni de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //// / +gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin no zhes bya ba dang  gzugs gang rtag pa dang  brtan pa dang  ther zug ba dang  mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang  yang dag par de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba'i  gzugs de lta bu 'ga' yod dam zhes bya ba dang  'phags pa nyan thos shes nas dad pa bzhi dag dang ldan pa ni 'tsho ba dag gis dbul ba ma yin / /
column22: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124486#1124486#TD4047E.TXT.r_447;TD4047E.TXT.r_448;TD4047E.TXT.r_449# bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +sems can la DGA' BA YIN NO // / +rnam pa bcus ji ltar rigs par sems can la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par sgrub par byed pas 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtags bstan pa'i phyir / /

column24: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#825464#825464#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9798# 'du  shes med pa pa dang  gzugs ni 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ro // /

column27: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2966281#2966281#TD4053E.TXT.r_237# rang gi ngang gis grol bar 'gyur bas sgrim mi  dgos par thar par 'gyur ba'i nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: tshogs kyang de yin mthar thug phyir // / +'dis ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pas rab tu phye ba'i thub pa rnam par byung ba'i bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos  kyi sku can yin pa'i phyir dang  theg pa gsum po'i tshogs kyang chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa mthar thug pa thob pas mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i phyir na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393673#2393689#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9814;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9815;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9816# gzhan yang de nyid las gzugs kyi zad par gyi skye mched brgyad yongs su dag pa rnams kyis ni 'phags pa'i mos pa dang dngos po yongs su bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon  par sgrub par byed do // / +zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched yongs su dag pas ni nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169004#169013#TD4035E.TXT.r_7758;TD4035E.TXT.r_7759;TD4035E.TXT.r_7760# gzugs kyi zad par gyi skye mchad brgyad yongs su dag pa rnams kyis ni 'phags  pa'i mos pa dang dngos po yongs su bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub par byed de / / +de ji lta ji ltar mos pa dang  ji srid kyi bar du bsgyur ba de kho na bzhin du 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169013#169029#TD4035E.TXT.r_7759;TD4035E.TXT.r_7760;TD4035E.TXT.r_7761;TD4035E.TXT.r_7762# de ji lta ji ltar mos pa dang  ji srid kyi bar du bsgyur ba de kho na bzhin du 'gyur te / / +gser la sogs pa de dag gis kyang bya ba byed nus so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169030#169038#TD4035E.TXT.r_7762;TD4035E.TXT.r_7763# nyon mongs pa med pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed do // / +zad par nam mkha'i skye mched yongs su dag pas ni gang 'dod pa de nam mkhar sgyur bar byed de / /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#259381#259381#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5670# tshad med pa dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  mngon par  shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams so // /
column9: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#168564#168564#TD4035E.TXT.r_7669# zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad ba'i skye mched dang  'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas  shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393611#2393611#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9810# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las 'phags pa  rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa mngon du byed do zhes bshad do // /
column11: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2755516#2755517#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7736# zad par rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched kyis ni nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub par byed do // /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393651#2393651#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9813# rnam par thar pa dang pos ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  'phags pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon  nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa mngon par sgrub par byed do zhes bshad do // /

column3: skyob pa med cing skyabs med pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa mi zad pa'i skyabs rtag     // /

column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169070#169080#TD4035E.TXT.r_7769;TD4035E.TXT.r_7770;TD4035E.TXT.r_7771;TD4035E.TXT.r_7772;TD4035E.TXT.r_7773# zad par gyi skye mched kyi gnas skabs ni / / +ji ltar shin tu yongs su byang bar byas nas / /
column5: 0.028#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1077363#1077363#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4158;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4159# bdag  med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa nyid de / / +rnam pa gnyis pa yin no // /

column3: 'byung ba dkon phyir dri med phyir // / +mthu ldan phyir dang 'jig rten gyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169079#169091#TD4035E.TXT.r_7771;TD4035E.TXT.r_7772;TD4035E.TXT.r_7773;TD4035E.TXT.r_7774;TD4035E.TXT.r_7775# ji srid 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su bsgyur ba lta bur blta bar bya'o // / +ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +stong pa nyid dang  smon pa med pa dang   mtshan ma med pa'o // /
column5: 0.019#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1911777#1911780#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3517;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3518# gsum gang zhe na / / +stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  smon pa med pa smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin no zhes gsungs so // /
column6: 0.026#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1077363#1077363#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4158;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4159# bdag  med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa nyid de / / +rnam pa gnyis pa yin no // /
column7: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#641692#641692#TD4069E.TXT.r_2681;TD4069E.TXT.r_2682# de nas mjug thogs su gnyis kyis yod pa la bla ma dang bcas pa dang  bla na med par shes par byed pa de kho na'i phyir stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ste / / +stong pa nyid dang smon pa  med pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi go rims bzhin no // /

column3: rgyan gyur phyir dang mchog nyid phyir // / +'gyur ba med phyir dkon mchog nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169090#169099#TD4035E.TXT.r_7775;TD4035E.TXT.r_7776# sems can dang  srog dang  gso pa dang  gang zag nyid med pa las brtsams nas sems kyi gnas ba rtse gcig pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: mdor bsdu na chos mthun pa rnam  pa drug gis na sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba'i dkon mchog gsum po 'di rin po che dang 'dra bar brjod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169100#169112#TD4035E.TXT.r_7775;TD4035E.TXT.r_7776;TD4035E.TXT.r_7777;TD4035E.TXT.r_7778# sems can dang  srog dang  gso pa dang  gang zag nyid med pa las brtsams nas sems kyi gnas ba rtse gcig pa gang yin pa'o // / +de la stong pa nyid rnam pa bzhi ste / /

column3: 'di lta ste 'byung ba dkon bar chos mthun pas na bskal pa yongs su 'gyur ba mang por yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams de dang phrad pa mi 'thob pa'i  phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169113#169127#TD4035E.TXT.r_7778;TD4035E.TXT.r_7779;TD4035E.TXT.r_7780;TD4035E.TXT.r_7781;TD4035E.TXT.r_7782# rtag    pa nas bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i bar dag gis chos thams cad stong par so sor rtog pa'o // / +de'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: dri ma med par chos mthun pas ni rnam pa thams cad du dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro // / +mthu dang ldan par chos mthun pas ni mngon par shes pa drug la sogs pa yon tan gyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169128#169143#TD4035E.TXT.r_7781;TD4035E.TXT.r_7782;TD4035E.TXT.r_7783;TD4035E.TXT.r_7784;TD4035E.TXT.r_7785;TD4035E.TXT.r_7786;TD4035E.TXT.r_7787# 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stong pa'o // / +nang stong pa nyid ni  'di lta ste / / +ngar 'dzin pa dang  nga yir 'dzin pa dang  nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal LA MNGON PAR ZHEN PA rnams kyis lus stong pa'o // /

column3: 'jig rten gyi rgyan du chos mthun pas  ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dge ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169144#169152#TD4035E.TXT.r_7785;TD4035E.TXT.r_7786;TD4035E.TXT.r_7787# 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams / / +'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis stong pa ste / / +ji skad du rnam pa thams cad du gzugs  kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das pas phyi stong pa nyid lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: rin po che bsnyen ma las ches mchog nyid du chos mthun pas ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169153#169161#TD4035E.TXT.r_7787;TD4035E.TXT.r_7788# ji skad du rnam pa thams cad du gzugs  kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das pas phyi stong pa nyid lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: bstod pa dang smad pa la sogs pas rnam par mi 'gyur ba'i chos mthun pas ni 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin  yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169162#169170#TD4035E.TXT.r_7787;TD4035E.TXT.r_7788;TD4035E.TXT.r_7789# ji skad du rnam pa thams cad du gzugs  kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das pas phyi stong pa nyid lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +gzugs kyi 'du shes ni 'dir 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi 'du shes la bya ste / /

column3: dkon mchog gsum bstan pa'i rjes thogs la gang yongs na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa skye ba'i gnas ni dkon mchog gsum skye bar 'gyur ba de'i dbang du byas nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169171#169183#TD4035E.TXT.r_7789;TD4035E.TXT.r_7790;TD4035E.TXT.r_7791# de'i 'du shes las byung ba'i 'dod chags  spangs pa'i phyir te de phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169184#169197#TD4035E.TXT.r_7790;TD4035E.TXT.r_7791;TD4035E.TXT.r_7792# rnal 'byor pa yang res 'ga' ni de'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid yid la byed do // / +res 'ga' ni nang stong pa nyid yid la byed do // /

column3: dri bcas de bzhin nyid dang dri  ma med // / +dri med sangs rgyas yon tan rgyal ba'i mdzod // /
gang las dkon mchog dge ba gsum 'byung ba // / +don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi yul nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169196#169205#TD4035E.TXT.r_7792;TD4035E.TXT.r_7793# res 'ga' ni rtog pa'i stong pa nyid kyis nang dang phyi stong pa nyid yid la byed de de'i  dbang gis de gnyis la sems 'jug go // /

column3: 'dis ci zhig gsal bar byas she na / / +dkon mchog gsum po 'di yi rigs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169206#169222#TD4035E.TXT.r_7793;TD4035E.TXT.r_7794;TD4035E.TXT.r_7795;TD4035E.TXT.r_7796;TD4035E.TXT.r_7797;TD4035E.TXT.r_7798# gal te nang dang phyi stong pa nyid la yang mi 'jug na ni / / +de'i 'og tu mi gyo ba yid la byed de / /

column3: thams cad gzigs    ba rnams kyi yul // / +de yang rnam bzhi go rims bzhin // /
rgyu bzhi yis ni bsam mi khyab // / +de la dri ma dang bcas pa'i de bzhin nyid ni nyon mongs pa'i sbubs las ma grol ba'i khams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169221#169238#TD4035E.TXT.r_7798;TD4035E.TXT.r_7799;TD4035E.TXT.r_7800;TD4035E.TXT.r_7801;TD4035E.TXT.r_7802# de de ltar yid la byas pas nga'o snyam du gyo  bar mi 'gyur te 'di'o // /

column3: dri ma med pa'i de  bzhin nyid ni de nyid sangs rgyas kyi sar gnas yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169239#169255#TD4035E.TXT.r_7801;TD4035E.TXT.r_7802;TD4035E.TXT.r_7803;TD4035E.TXT.r_7804;TD4035E.TXT.r_7805# de bas na de gnyis la de'i sems 'jug go // / +smon pa med pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /

column3: dri ma med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku de nyid la yod pa 'jig rten  las 'das pa stobs bcu la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169250#169257#TD4035E.TXT.r_7803;TD4035E.TXT.r_7804;TD4035E.TXT.r_7805;TD4035E.TXT.r_7806# nya bar len pa'i phung po lnga po la / / +mi rtag pa'am sdug bsngal bar yid la byed  cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169257#169276#TD4035E.TXT.r_7805;TD4035E.TXT.r_7806;TD4035E.TXT.r_7807;TD4035E.TXT.r_7808;TD4035E.TXT.r_7809;TD4035E.TXT.r_7810# sems kyi gnas pa rtse gcig pa gang yin pa'o // / +mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /
column6: 0.023#TD4049E.TXT.r#2288719#2288719#TD4049E.TXT.r_224;TD4049E.TXT.r_225# ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +brtag pa'i dngos po la sems rtse gcig pa nyid de / /
column7: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#586359#586360#TD4068E.TXT.r_1970;TD4068E.TXT.r_1971# de la sems zhi ba zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang  ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig pa la bya ste / / +gang sems gyengs pa ni ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig pa dang mi mthun pa'i chos la sems ma zhi ba zhes bya'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4049E.TXT.r#2302418#2302418#TD4049E.TXT.r_2597;TD4049E.TXT.r_2598# so so rang gis bden pa rnams la snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang   shes rab mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'o // / +rtse mo gang zhe na / /

column3: rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ni stobs bcu la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos de nyid kyi so so rang gi bla na med pa'i phrin las te / /
gang zhig med par ma gyur zhing chad pa med la rgyun mchad pas byang  chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i gtam rgyun mi 'chad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169277#169293#TD4035E.TXT.r_7807;TD4035E.TXT.r_7808;TD4035E.TXT.r_7809;TD4035E.TXT.r_7810;TD4035E.TXT.r_7811# nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag nyid la 'gog pa dang zhi bar yid la byed cing sems kyi gnas pa rtse gcig pa gang yin pa'o // / +mtshan ma med pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin ni / / +'dud     // / +par yang mi byed ces bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gang gsungs pa de la ji ltar 'dud par mi byed cing mngon par 'dud par mi byed ce na / /
column5: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#890437#890437#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_172;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_173# zhes bya ba yan chad tshigs  su bcad pa gsum gyi don rnam pa gnyis shig ston te ji ltar yod pa dang  ji snyed yod pa'o // / +de la ji ltar yod pa'i bshad pa ni gang brgyan par byed / /
column6: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2910673#2910673#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5970;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5971# yang  dag pa'i lta bas de kho na khong du chud pa de la yang dag pa'i rtog pas de nyid rnam par 'jog par byed de / / +ji ltar rnam par 'jog par byed ce na / /

column3: gnas bzhi po 'di dag kyang go rims ji lta bzhin du rgyu bzhis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul yin no zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169294#169307#TD4035E.TXT.r_7810;TD4035E.TXT.r_7811;TD4035E.TXT.r_7812;TD4035E.TXT.r_7813# par yang mi byed ces bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gang gsungs pa de la ji ltar 'dud par mi byed cing mngon par 'dud par mi byed ce na / / +mi mthun pa dang mthun pa gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: bzhi po gang dag gis shes na // / +dag dang  nyon mongs dang ldan phyir // / +kun nas nyon mongs med dag phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169308#169320#TD4035E.TXT.r_7812;TD4035E.TXT.r_7813;TD4035E.TXT.r_7814;TD4035E.TXT.r_7815# yang na mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa dang  mtshan  ma med pa'i dbyings yid la byed pa dang  rnam pa gnyis kyis mtshan ma med pa la snyoms par 'jug go // / +de la mtshan ma rnams yid la mi byed pas ni de dag la skyo bar mi 'gyur zhing / /

column3: rnam par dbye ba med chos phyir // / +lhun grub rnam par mi rtog phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169321#169330#TD4035E.TXT.r_7814;TD4035E.TXT.r_7815;TD4035E.TXT.r_7816;TD4035E.TXT.r_7817;TD4035E.TXT.r_7818# sun mi 'byin par mngon par 'du mi byed pa kho nar byed de / / +de bas na 'dud par mi byed  ces bya'o // /

column3: de la dri ma dang bcas pa'i de bzhin rten nyid ni cig bcar dus gcig tu rnam par dag pa yang yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169330#169345#TD4035E.TXT.r_7816;TD4035E.TXT.r_7817;TD4035E.TXT.r_7818;TD4035E.TXT.r_7819;TD4035E.TXT.r_7820;TD4035E.TXT.r_7821# mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings yid la byed pas ni / / +de la chags par mi 'gyur te / / +de bas na mngon par 'dud par mi byed ces bya'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977223#977223#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11146;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11147# sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye zhing 'tshang rgya na nyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas dge ba rgya chen po spyad na lta gdon mi    za bar 'tshang rgya zhes nyan pa dang sems pa la sogs pa la yang 'jug par byed de / / +de bas na le lo'i gnyen por 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#57787#57789#TD4036E.TXT.r_8585;TD4036E.TXT.r_8586# re zhig mngon sum gyi dbang du byas pa'i yid la byed pas nang gi dngos po'i 'gyur nyid yongs su tshol bar byed do / /
column7: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167790#1167790#TD4047E.TXT.r_6869;TD4047E.TXT.r_6870;TD4047E.TXT.r_6871# de'i phyir sems can mang po'i dgos pa nye bar gnas pa mthong nas sbyin par mi byed de / / +de ltar yang kha na ma tho bar yang  mi 'gyur te / / +nyes pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1140088#1140088#TD4047E.TXT.r_2716;TD4047E.TXT.r_2717;TD4047E.TXT.r_2718# sgyu ma dang  smig rgyu dang  gzugs brnyan dang  brag ca dang 'dra bar dngos po dang  dngos po med par yang ston  par mi byed de / / +rnam par 'jog par mi byed pa'o // / +de ltar byas na gnyis su med pas rab tu phye bar 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#32545#32545#TD4036E.TXT.r_4981;TD4036E.TXT.r_4982;TD4036E.TXT.r_4983# yang dang yang du so sor rtog par byed pa ste / / +de la spangs par shes nas / / +yid bde bar 'gyur la / /
column10: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#821246#821247#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9149# ci ste skye ba don med par 'gyur du 'ong bas de'i phyir thob pas skye ba skyed par byed la / /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa yang  yin pa'i phyir / / +gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste / / +zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la mos pa rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang spyod yul du ma gyur pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169346#169356#TD4035E.TXT.r_7821;TD4035E.TXT.r_7822# de la sbyor ba las byung ba ni so sor  brtags shing so sor brtags shing 'jog par byed pa mtshan ma rnams las kyang rnam par ma grol ba ste / /

column3: gang gi phyir lha mo chos 'di gnyis ni rtogs par dka' ba ste / / +sems rang bzhin gyis  rnam par dag pa rtogs par dka' ba dang  sems de nyid kyi nye bar nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169355#169370#TD4035E.TXT.r_7822;TD4035E.TXT.r_7823;TD4035E.TXT.r_7824# 'di ltar de'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang bas skabs skabs su sems kun nas dkris shing 'dug go // /
column5: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#201111#201112#TD4035E.TXT.r_13276# yul rgyas pa'i phyir de'i rnam par shes pa yul gyi sdug pa'i mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang bas sems kun nas dkris shing 'dug ste / /

column3: lha mo chos 'di gnyis nyan par byed pa ni khyod dam yang na chos chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169368#169379#TD4035E.TXT.r_7823;TD4035E.TXT.r_7824;TD4035E.TXT.r_7825;TD4035E.TXT.r_7826# de yang so sor brtags shing so sor brtags shing  'jog pa na / /

column3: lha mo lhag ma nyan thos dang rang     // / +sangs rgyas kyis ni chos 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtogs par bya ba nyid do zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169380#169392#TD4035E.TXT.r_7825;TD4035E.TXT.r_7826;TD4035E.TXT.r_7827;TD4035E.TXT.r_7828;TD4035E.TXT.r_7829# mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba las kyang grol bar 'gyur ro // / +rnam par grol ba de yang rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la dri ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni sngar dri mas kun nas nyon mongs par ma gyur pa phyis rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir gnas 'di  bsam gyis mi khyab po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169390#169408#TD4035E.TXT.r_7828;TD4035E.TXT.r_7829;TD4035E.TXT.r_7830;TD4035E.TXT.r_7831;TD4035E.TXT.r_7832;TD4035E.TXT.r_7833# de'i phyir shin tu rnam par grol ba yin no // / +so sor brtags shing so sor  brtags shing 'jog pa na yang gnas pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba yin gyi / /

column3: gang gi phyir sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste / / +de ni de kho na bzhin shes so // / +des na skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes  gsungs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169407#169417#TD4035E.TXT.r_7831;TD4035E.TXT.r_7832;TD4035E.TXT.r_7833;TD4035E.TXT.r_7834# kun shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  kun shes pa'i phan yon zhes bya ba ni / / +nyon mongs pa spong ba dang  tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169418#169427#TD4035E.TXT.r_7834;TD4035E.TXT.r_7835;TD4035E.TXT.r_7836;TD4035E.TXT.r_7837# de gnyis ni kun shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  kun shes pa'i phan yon dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o // /

column3: de la dri ma med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang rnam pas dbyer med pa'i chos nyid snga phyir khyad par med pa yod pa'i phyir gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169426#169446#TD4035E.TXT.r_7834;TD4035E.TXT.r_7835;TD4035E.TXT.r_7836;TD4035E.TXT.r_7837;TD4035E.TXT.r_7838;TD4035E.TXT.r_7839# de gnyis ni kun shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  kun shes pa'i phan yon dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o // / +yang bden pa mngon par rtogs pa yang kun shes pa yin la / / +dgra bcom pa nyid kyang kun shes pa yin te / /
column5: 0.013#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#822833#822834#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9382;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9383;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9384;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9385# ci zhe na / / +so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ste / / +zag pa med pas thob pa'i ni zag pa med pa'o // /
column6: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1362456#1362457#TD4037E.TXT.r_6257;TD4037E.TXT.r_6258;TD4037E.TXT.r_6259# sdu bsngal gyi bden pa nas / / +lam gyi bden pa'i bar dag go // / +bden pa rnam pa lnga ni rgyu'i bden pa dang  'bras bu'i bden pa dang  shes pa'i bden pa dang  shes bya'i  bden pa dang  mchog gi bden pa'o // /
column7: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1331382#1331383#TD4037E.TXT.r_2143;TD4037E.TXT.r_2144# skad kyi byings kyi ngo bo bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag pa ston pa'i rnam pa dang  tshig legs par sbyor ba'i phan yon ston pa'i    rnam pa'o // /
column8: 0.018#TD4015E.TXT.r#1972150#1972152#TD4015E.TXT.r_865;TD4015E.TXT.r_866# ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +yang mdor bsdus nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ma lus pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i phan yon  gang gsungs ba / /
column9: 0.018#TD4019E.TXT.r#2487647#2487647#TD4019E.TXT.r_10510;TD4019E.TXT.r_10511# rang gi phyogs zhes pa ni skye ba med pa la sogs pa sgra ji bzhin gyi don du bzung nas skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba'i phyogs sgrogs par byed pa dang  sgro 'dogs kyi lta ba'i phyogs sgrogs par byed pa'o // / +de ste zhes pa  la sogs pas de las bzlog pa'i phan yon ston te / /
column10: 0.018#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1610890#1610893#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2822;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2823# de nyid slob pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i ni slob pa'o // / +mi slob pa'i lam gyi sa thob pa'i  ni mi slob pa'o // /
column11: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2032349#2032350#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7876# 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi bden pa kho na mi rtag pa'i rnam pas sun 'byin par byed kyi lam gyi bden pas ni ma yin no // /
column12: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1029716#1029716#TD4054E.TXT.r_6389;TD4054E.TXT.r_6390# yang dag pa'i shes rab ni rnam par grol  ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o // / +yang lam gyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhir shes par bya ste / /
column13: 0.022#TD4053E.TXT.r#2986972#2986975#TD4053E.TXT.r_3020;TD4053E.TXT.r_3021;TD4053E.TXT.r_3022# yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po'o // / +yang  dag pa'i shes pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o // /
column14: 0.022#TD4019E.TXT.r#2516238#2516238#TD4019E.TXT.r_14392;TD4019E.TXT.r_14393# de las rnam par thar pa la sogs pa'i  phan yon 'byung ba'o // / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sde tshan te / /
column15: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1434948#1434948#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4077# rnam    par grol ba'i lam yang bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su skye ba ste / /
column16: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386729#2386729#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9013;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9014# shes bya'i sgrib pa lhan cig skyes pa'i phyogs GCIG GIS KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA'I phyogs kyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba yod pa nyid du 'dzin pas des sa drug PA'I KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA DANG  rnam par byang ba med pa'i lam la sgrib par byed de / / +sa drug par zhugs pa'i tshe yongs su spong bar byed  pa des na / /
column17: 0.024#TD4049E.TXT.r#2304809#2304810#TD4049E.TXT.r_3010;TD4049E.TXT.r_3011# mi slob pa'i chos bcu ni  mi slob pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i dbang du byas par shes par bya'o // /
column18: 0.025#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2586258#2586258#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6236# bsgom pa'i lam yang 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro bas mthong  ba'i lam gyi tha mar tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa gcig 'thob bo // /
column19: 0.026#TD4013E.TXT.r#611038#611038#TD4013E.TXT.r_138;TD4013E.TXT.r_139# 'di  man chad ni 'don ba tsam gyi phan yon yongs su bsngo ba byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i phan yon ston to // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob pa'i mtshan nyid ni / /
column20: 0.027#TD4013E.TXT.r#619747#619747#TD4013E.TXT.r_1200;TD4013E.TXT.r_1201# de ltar ji skad smos pa'i smon lam gyi don yongs su rdzogs par byas nas / / +da ni de la mos pa'i phan yon 'bras bur gyur pa shin tu che ba'i phyir / /
column21: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1882638#1882638#TD4039E.TXT.r_7961;TD4039E.TXT.r_7962# lhag pa'i spyod pa dang  lhag pa'i 'dul ba dang  lhag pa'i so sor thar pa'o // / +bslab pa'i phan yon dang ldan par gnas pa / /
column22: 0.028#TD4097E.TXT.r#2223195#2223195#TD4097E.TXT.r_2723;TD4097E.TXT.r_2724# de la so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis thob pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni bsdus te bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'o // / +dri ma med pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i  so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o // /
column23: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2415407#2415407#TD4019E.TXT.r_1057;TD4019E.TXT.r_1058# de yang chos kyi sku'i ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du'o // / +de ltar shes pa la sogs pas de nyid kyi phan yon ston te / /
column24: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1198765#1198766#TD4047E.TXT.r_11014;TD4047E.TXT.r_11015;TD4047E.TXT.r_11016# phan pa 'dod pa yin gyi mi mthun pa'i bsam pas ni ma yin no // / +mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba'i bya ba ston pa yin gyi bsam pas ni ma yin no // /

column3: gang gi phyir gang la de bzhin gshegs  pa'i ye shes mtha' dag rjes su ma zhugs pa'i sems can de ni sems can gyi ris na 'ga' yang med do // /
