column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169445#169458#TD4035E.TXT.r_7839;TD4035E.TXT.r_7840;TD4035E.TXT.r_7841;TD4035E.TXT.r_7842;TD4035E.TXT.r_7843# gang la gang med par de des stong par mthong bas na stong pa nyid ces bya'o // /

column3: 'on kyang 'du shes kyi 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mi mngon no // / +'du shes kyi 'dzin pa dang bral ba las ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169457#169468#TD4035E.TXT.r_7841;TD4035E.TXT.r_7842;TD4035E.TXT.r_7843;TD4035E.TXT.r_7844;TD4035E.TXT.r_7845# de nyid la smon par mi byed pas na / / +smon pa med pa zhes  bya'o ; / / +'du byed thams cad mtshan ma med par mthong bas na mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes  rang byung gi ye shes thogs pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo // / +kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169467#169477#TD4035E.TXT.r_7844;TD4035E.TXT.r_7845;TD4035E.TXT.r_7846;TD4035E.TXT.r_7847# gzhan las ni mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o // / +sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o zhes stong pa nyid mjug tu smos na / /

column3: dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i dar yug chen po gcig yod par gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169478#169492#TD4035E.TXT.r_7846;TD4035E.TXT.r_7847;TD4035E.TXT.r_7848;TD4035E.TXT.r_7849# ci'i phyir 'dir stong pa nyid sngar bstan ce  na / / +ji srid du bdag med pa'i 'du shes la yang dag par mi gnas pa de srid du / /
column5: 0.026#TD4003E.TXT.r#425915#425915#TD4003E.TXT.r_89# de'i phyir ma rtogs pa rnams la sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rjes de dag gi sdug bsngal ba dang  chos la dmigs pa'i snying rjes chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang     sdug bsngal ba dang  stong pa dang  bdag med par bsgom pa dang  dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang stong pa nyid bsgom ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926411#926411#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4596# de la mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  stong pa dang  bdag med par de lta bur phyin ci ma log par shes pas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: dar yug chen po de la yang stong gsum gyi stong  chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdzogs par bris par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169490#169503#TD4035E.TXT.r_7848;TD4035E.TXT.r_7849;TD4035E.TXT.r_7850;TD4035E.TXT.r_7851# gang gis smon pa med par 'gyur ba'i mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba mthong ba de ltar yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de'i 'og tu smon pa med par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.029#TD4052E.TXT.r#2845978#2845978#TD4052E.TXT.r_512;TD4052E.TXT.r_513# bdag po'i rkyen yin te mi mthun pa'i phyogs med par gnyen po  med pa'i phyir ro // / +de bas na bdag po'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs so // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +khor yug chen po'i tshad du ni khor yug chen po bris / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169504#169512#TD4035E.TXT.r_7851;TD4035E.TXT.r_7852;TD4035E.TXT.r_7853;TD4035E.TXT.r_7854;TD4035E.TXT.r_7855# bdag med pa'i 'du shes la yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes rgya cher gsungs so // / +des mi rtag pa de bdag med par mthong na / /

column3: sa chen po'i tshad du ni sa chen po / / +stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad du ni stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169513#169520#TD4035E.TXT.r_7853;TD4035E.TXT.r_7854;TD4035E.TXT.r_7855;TD4035E.TXT.r_7856;TD4035E.TXT.r_7857# smon par mi byed de / / +nges par 'byung ba tshol ba ni / / +smon pa med pa nyid la smon par byed do // /

column3: stong gi  'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad du ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams / / +gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad du ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169521#169531#TD4035E.TXT.r_7856;TD4035E.TXT.r_7857;TD4035E.TXT.r_7858;TD4035E.TXT.r_7859# de bas na de'i 'og tu  mtshan ma med pa bstan to // / +rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /

column3: rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad du ni rgya mtsho chen po / / +'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad du ni 'dzam bu'i gling / / +shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling gi tshang du ni shar gyi    las 'phags kyi gling / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169532#169545#TD4035E.TXT.r_7858;TD4035E.TXT.r_7859;TD4035E.TXT.r_7860;TD4035E.TXT.r_7861# rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis ka mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa'o // / +rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.017#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3114975#3114977#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3364;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3365# so sor rtog pa las byung ba'i gang yin pa de ni // / +rtog pa med  cing dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yin no // /
column6: 0.017#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1077265#1077267#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4141# rtog pa tsam zhig bkag pa'i phyir rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi  ting nge 'dzin to zhes shes par byas zin to // /
column7: 0.017#TD4091E.TXT.r#755172#755172#TD4091E.TXT.r_10925;TD4091E.TXT.r_10926# de la re zhig bsam gtan khyad par can gyi rtog pa tsam zhig  bkag pa'i phyir / / +rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yin no // /
column8: 0.024#TD4095E.TXT.r#103542#103543#TD4095E.TXT.r_7925# de la re zhig bsam gtan khyad par can ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes shes par byas zin to // /
column9: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#755146#755152#TD4091E.TXT.r_10924# mdo las rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum du bka' stsal te / /

column3: nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling gi tshad du ni nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling / / +byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi tshad du ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169546#169559#TD4035E.TXT.r_7860;TD4035E.TXT.r_7861;TD4035E.TXT.r_7862;TD4035E.TXT.r_7863;TD4035E.TXT.r_7864# dpyod pa tsam dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa ste / / +gang bsgoms pas tshangs pa chen po nyid 'thob pa'o // / +rtog pa med la dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#124932#124933#TD4035E.TXT.r_19;TD4035E.TXT.r_20# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa dang  yid kyi sa dang  rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang  rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi sa dang / / +rtog pa yang med la  dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang  mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa dang  sems yod pa'i sa dang  sems med pa'i sa dang  thos pa las byung ba'i sa dang  bsams pa     // /
column6: 0.018#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1633118#1633119#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6277# rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang  rtog pa med la  dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang  dge ba'i sa dang  mi dge ba'i sa dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i sa dang  yang gsum ste / /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#486723#486725#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4893# rnam par shes pa tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa dang  yid kyi sa dang  rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang  rtog pa med pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang  mnyam par  gzhag pa'i sa dang  mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i sa dang  sems yod pa'i sa dang sems med pa'i sa'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1849651#1849651#TD4039E.TXT.r_4088# 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshor ba  rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes rnams dang  rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtog pa rnams de dang 'dra'o // /

column3: re rab kyi tshad du ni ra rib / / +sa la spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal yas khang gi tshad du ni sa la spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal yas  khang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169560#169573#TD4035E.TXT.r_7863;TD4035E.TXT.r_7864;TD4035E.TXT.r_7865;TD4035E.TXT.r_7866# rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa gang yin pa ste / / +gang bsgoms pas de yan chad nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad du skye bar 'gyur ba ste / /

column3: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal yas khang gi tshad du ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal yas khang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169574#169584#TD4035E.TXT.r_7866;TD4035E.TXT.r_7867;TD4035E.TXT.r_7868# rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji lta bu zhe na / /

column3: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal yas khang gi tshad du ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal yas khang bris so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169585#169596#TD4035E.TXT.r_7867;TD4035E.TXT.r_7868;TD4035E.TXT.r_7869;TD4035E.TXT.r_7870;TD4035E.TXT.r_7871;TD4035E.TXT.r_7872# rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis la sems lhag par btang snyoms su bzhag nas / / +gal te ngang gcig gis nang gi dmigs pa la mos la / /

column3: dar yug chen po de yang chu zheng stong gsum  gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169597#169610#TD4035E.TXT.r_7871;TD4035E.TXT.r_7872;TD4035E.TXT.r_7873;TD4035E.TXT.r_7874;TD4035E.TXT.r_7875# ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +dmigs pas chung ba ste / / +yul gyi gzugs chung ngu mthong ba'i phyir ram / /

column3: dar yug chen po de yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig tu bcug par gyur to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169609#169618#TD4035E.TXT.r_7874;TD4035E.TXT.r_7875;TD4035E.TXT.r_7876;TD4035E.TXT.r_7877# yang na yid la byed pas chung ba ste / / +dad pa dang 'dun pa dang  mos pa chung ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169661#169664#TD4035E.TXT.r_7885;TD4035E.TXT.r_7883;TD4035E.TXT.r_7884;TD4035E.TXT.r_7886# yang na yid la byed pas dad pa dang  'dun pa dang  mos pa mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig tu dar yug chen po de bcug pa de bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi rdul ma lus pa rnams su de'i tshad kyi  dar yug chen po de nang du bcug par gyur to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169617#169634#TD4035E.TXT.r_7876;TD4035E.TXT.r_7877;TD4035E.TXT.r_7878;TD4035E.TXT.r_7879;TD4035E.TXT.r_7880;TD4035E.TXT.r_7881# chen por gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +dmigs  pa'i sgo nas che ba ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169627#169643#TD4035E.TXT.r_7878;TD4035E.TXT.r_7879;TD4035E.TXT.r_7880;TD4035E.TXT.r_7881;TD4035E.TXT.r_7882# de yang gzugs phal mo che mthong ba'i phyir yin gyi / / +mtha' yas mu med pa mthong ba ni ma yin no // /
column6: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#169661#169661#TD4035E.TXT.r_7885# yang na yid la byed pas dad pa dang  'dun pa dang  mos pa mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de nas mkhas pa mdzangs pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa der nye bar zhugs pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig skyes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169643#169651#TD4035E.TXT.r_7882;TD4035E.TXT.r_7883;TD4035E.TXT.r_7884# dad pa dang 'dun pa dang  mos pa mtha'  yas mu med pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // /
column5: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#162887#162888#TD4035E.TXT.r_6635;TD4035E.TXT.r_6636;TD4035E.TXT.r_6637# phyogs  gang gi gnas ngan len de dang bral bas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag las rnam par grol ba'o // / +ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /

column3: de'i mig lha'i mig tu gyur cing kun tu yongs su dag pa 'od gsal bar gyur pa zhig la  des lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas te / /
column4: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#33799#33799#TD4036E.TXT.r_5169;TD4036E.TXT.r_5170# de ltar yid la byed pa chen por gyur pa dang  dmigs pa chen por gyur pa'i phyir  mos pa chen por gyur pa yin no // / +de la mos pa tshad med pa ni dad pa dang 'dun pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa dang  dmigs pa mtha' yas mu med pa la mos pa'i mos pa gang yin pa ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#33780#33780#TD4036E.TXT.r_5167;TD4036E.TXT.r_5168# de ltar yid la byed pa chung ngu dang  dmigs pa chung ba'i phyir mos pa chung ngu yin no // / +de la mos pa chen por gyur pa ni dad pa dang 'dun pa chen por gyur pa dang ldan pa dang  dmigs pa chen por gyur pa la mos pa'i mos pa gnag yin pa ste / /

column3: 'di lta bur gyur pa'i dar yug chen po 'di rdul phra rab kyi rdul chung du 'di nyid la gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169665#169676#TD4035E.TXT.r_7885;TD4035E.TXT.r_7886;TD4035E.TXT.r_7887# yang na yid la byed pas dad pa dang  'dun pa dang  mos pa mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir ro // / +de la chen por gyur  pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169687#169696#TD4035E.TXT.r_7888;TD4035E.TXT.r_7889;TD4035E.TXT.r_7887;TD4035E.TXT.r_7890# tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa bzhi po rnams so // / +lha 'od can rnams lha 'od can rnams shes shing drung gcig tsam du ji ltar  mos she na / /

column3: sems can 'ga' la yang nye bar mkho bar ma gyur to // / +de 'di snyam du sems te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169675#169684#TD4035E.TXT.r_7887;TD4035E.TXT.r_7888;TD4035E.TXT.r_7889# lha 'od can rnams lha 'od can rnams shes shing drung gcig tsam du mos par byed pa nas rgya cher 'byung ba'o // /

column3: kye ma gang bdag gi brtson pa chen  po'i stobs dang mthus rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'di rdo rjes phye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169671#169675#TD4035E.TXT.r_7886;TD4035E.TXT.r_7887# de la chen por gyur  pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin ni / / +lha 'od can rnams lha 'od can rnams shes shing drung gcig tsam du mos par byed pa nas rgya cher 'byung ba'o // /

column3: dar yug chen po 'di 'gro ba thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o snyam pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169697#169708#TD4035E.TXT.r_7889;TD4035E.TXT.r_7890;TD4035E.TXT.r_7891;TD4035E.TXT.r_7892# lha 'od can rnams lha 'od can rnams shes shing drung gcig tsam du ji ltar  mos she na / / +'dod pa'i khams su na phyung nas bsam gtan dang po thob ste / /

column3: des brtson pa chen po'i stobs kyi mthus bskyed de / / +rdo rje phra mos rdul phra rab kyi rdul de phye nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dar  yug chen po de 'gro ba mtha' dag la nye bar 'tsho bar byed cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169707#169717#TD4035E.TXT.r_7891;TD4035E.TXT.r_7892;TD4035E.TXT.r_7893# ting nge 'dzin de yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing / / +des lha 'od can rnams zhes bya ba yang thos te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169718#169729#TD4035E.TXT.r_7893;TD4035E.TXT.r_7894;TD4035E.TXT.r_7895# des de dag gi lus kyi snang ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed cing shing drung gcig nas / /

column3: gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du rdul phra rab lus pa med pa mtha' dag las de kho na bzhin byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169727#169745#TD4035E.TXT.r_7894;TD4035E.TXT.r_7895;TD4035E.TXT.r_7896;TD4035E.TXT.r_7897;TD4035E.TXT.r_7898;TD4035E.TXT.r_7899;TD4035E.TXT.r_7900# sa'i steng  rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i bar du mos par byed de / /
column5: 0.016#TD4071E.TXT.r#402266#402274#TD4071E.TXT.r_441;TD4071E.TXT.r_442# de'i khyad par yod par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i khyad par yod par 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column6: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1206440#1206440#TD4047E.TXT.r_12108;TD4047E.TXT.r_12109# de ltar gyur na ni rab tu byung ba yang don med par tha la bar 'gyur ro // / +khyad par  rnam pa lngas khyad par rnam par gzhag par bya ste // /
column7: 0.020#TD4073E.TXT.r#1813262#1813262#TD4073E.TXT.r_54;TD4073E.TXT.r_55# gang 'dod pa'i yul de dam par 'gyur ro // / +sun 'byin pas  ji ltar 'gyur zhe na 'di ltar 'dod chags dang 'dod chags kyi yul la nyes pa dang chags su mi rung bar lta ste / /
column8: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2956655#2956656#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12227;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12228# sa thams cad kyang rtogs par 'gyur te /// / +ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na / /
column9: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2896650#2896651#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4027;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4028# de las lhag ces bya ba ni gong ma las bzlog na chen por 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i    don to // / +ji ltar chen por 'gyur zhe na / /
column10: 0.021#TD4001E.TXT.r#1973634#1973634#TD4001E.TXT.r_151;TD4001E.TXT.r_152# 'di dag thams cad ni phan tshun rang bzhin tha dad na ji ltar mi 'dra ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong bas chos mthong bar 'gyur ro // / +ji ltar mi 'dra ba'i chos mthong bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur te / /
column11: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#133688#133689#TD4035E.TXT.r_1507;TD4035E.TXT.r_1508# de dang 'byung ba yin la byed pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na / / +rnam pa bzhis 'gyur te 'dun pa'i stobs dang  dran pa'i stobs dang  yul gyi stobs dang  goms pa'i stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#968974#968974#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10101# bslab pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par yang bsam pa'i khyad par dang  sbyor ba'i khyad par dang  bdag la phan pa'i khyad par dang  gzhan la phan pa'i khyad par la sogs pa ste / /
column13: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1181502#1181506#TD4047E.TXT.r_8691;TD4047E.TXT.r_8692# dka' ba'i bzod pa yang rnam  pa gsum du rnam par gzhag par bya ste / / +bzod par bya ba'i khyad par dang  bzod par byed pa'i khyad par dang  gnod pa'i dngos po'i khyad par ro // /
column14: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#156575#156580#TD4035E.TXT.r_5484;TD4035E.TXT.r_5485;TD4035E.TXT.r_5486# dbus kyi mtha' nas phyi ma'i mthar 'du byed rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji ltar na 'byung bar 'gyur / / +ji ltar na 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /
column15: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903995#903995#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1798# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis ni nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyi ga dang bral ba'i ge ba gsal zhing dag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyu byed pas na nyan thos kyi rigs pas  khyad par 'phags par rig par bya'o // /
column16: 0.024#TD4009E.TXT.r#333257#333259#TD4009E.TXT.r_1770# grol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i khyad par dang  rnam  par grol ba'i 'bras bu zad pa dang  mi skye ba shes pas sdud pa'i ye shes mngon par 'du byed pa'i khyad par dang  rnam par grol ba'i spyi'i khyad par dang  bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'i khyad par dang  mi slob pa'i khyad par dang  mchod par 'os pa'i phyir mchod par 'os pa'i khyad par dang  skyes  bu zung bzhi dang  gang zag brgyad kyi dbang du byas nas dge 'dun gyi mchog tu btags pa'i khyad par dang  tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste / /
column17: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2994672#2994672#TD4053E.TXT.r_4012# de la rnam par dag pa'i khyad par ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1439698#1439698#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4638# yid dga' na lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i khyad par dga' bas drangs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no // /
column19: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#126982#126982#TD4035E.TXT.r_368;TD4035E.TXT.r_369# 'chi ba'i tshe de bde ba'i 'chi bas kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur la / / +sdug bsngal ba'i 'chi bas kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1020864#1020864#TD4054E.TXT.r_4971# gcig ji ltar na dge bar yang 'gyur la mi dge bar 'gyur zhe na / /
column21: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1040204#1040204#TD4054E.TXT.r_7856# dmigs pa'i khyad par dang  nyer rton gyi khyad par dang  rab tu rtogs pa'i khyad par dang  khas len gyi khyad par dang  nges 'byung gi khyad par dang  yongs 'dzin gyi khyad par dang  gnas dang gyog 'khor gyi khyad par dang  mngon  par skye ba'i khyad par dang  skye ba'i khyad par dang  'bras bu'i khyad par ro // /
column22: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2620822#2620822#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10526# rgod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rgod pa yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa nyes pa'i khyad par bstan pas de dag gi nyes pa'i khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir don gyi khyad par bshad pa kho na yin no // /
column23: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2928109#2928109#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8398# bdag de lta ba'i byed pa po byed pa nas nyan pa'i byed pa po byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i byed par ji ltar 'gyur te mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.028#TD4049E.TXT.r#2308079#2308079#TD4049E.TXT.r_3514# dmigs pa'i khyad par dang  nye bar rton pa'i khyad par dang  rab tu rtogs pa'i khyad par dang  khas len pa'i khyad par dang  nges par 'byung  ba'i khyad par dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par dang  gnas dang gyog 'khor gyi khyad par dang  btsun par skye ba'i khyad par dang  skye ba'i khyad par dang  'bras bu'i khyad par ro // /
column25: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#192028#192028#TD4035E.TXT.r_11693;TD4035E.TXT.r_11694;TD4035E.TXT.r_11695# der 'bod cing shan pa byed pa la sogs pas shin tu kha na ma tho ba sdig pa'i las lug la sogs pa gsod par byed pa'o // / +'byin pas 'gyod pa med par 'gyur // / +'gyod pas nyes pa med par 'gyur // /
column26: 0.029#TD4099E.TXT.r#118287#118287#TD4099E.TXT.r_2752;TD4099E.TXT.r_2753# ring dang rgyang ring byas pas dga' bar 'gyur // / +bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' bar 'gyur // /
column27: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#180667#180669#TD4035E.TXT.r_9681;TD4035E.TXT.r_9682;TD4035E.TXT.r_9683# de la sdig pa'i grogs pos ni lhag pa'i  sems dang  lhag pa'i shes rab las brtsams te 'doms shing ston pa log par rnyed par 'gyur ro // / +bka' blo mi bde bas ni rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i ye shes sems can thams cad     // / +nye bar 'tsho ba'i ye shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la mtshang ba med par rjes su zhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169746#169755#TD4035E.TXT.r_7898;TD4035E.TXT.r_7899;TD4035E.TXT.r_7900;TD4035E.TXT.r_7901;TD4035E.TXT.r_7902# yid la byed pa'i rim par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / / +gang ji tsam du mos par byed pa / / +de'i yid la byed pa yang de  tsam du gdags par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1851402#1851403#TD4039E.TXT.r_4286# gzhan yang 'du byed  rnams la bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa'i bdag tu lta ba yang spangs la bden pa 'dzin pa'i bdag med par lta ba la brten nas ji ltar rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba de gleng bar bya'o // /

column3: sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang 'dra bar tshad med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169756#169765#TD4035E.TXT.r_7901;TD4035E.TXT.r_7902;TD4035E.TXT.r_7903;TD4035E.TXT.r_7904# yid la byed pa'i rim pa la brten nas / / +bsgom pa'i rim par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: de lta mod kyi 'du shes kyi 'dzin pas  bcings pa'i byis pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mi shes rab tu mi shes shing nyams su mi myong / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169764#169777#TD4035E.TXT.r_7903;TD4035E.TXT.r_7904;TD4035E.TXT.r_7905# yid la byed pa de nyid kyi dbang gis ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi bsgom pa'i khyad par gdags par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169791#169797#TD4035E.TXT.r_7906;TD4035E.TXT.r_7907# ji lta ji ltar ting nge 'dzin ches shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa de lta de ltar skye ba'i rgyu'i khyad par gdags par 'gyur ro // / +lam gyi rim pa la brten nas ji ltar gang zag gi rim pa  gdags par 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: mngon du mi byed do // / +des na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi dbyings sems can gyi gnas thams cad la rnam par  gzigs nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169778#169789#TD4035E.TXT.r_7905;TD4035E.TXT.r_7906;TD4035E.TXT.r_7907# bsgom pa'i rim pa la brten nas ji ltar lam gyi rim pa gdags par 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: slob dpon gyi 'du shes su gyur te / / +kye ma ma la sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rjes su zhugs pa dag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169798#169805#TD4035E.TXT.r_7907;TD4035E.TXT.r_7908# lam gyi rim pa la brten nas ji ltar gang zag gi rim pa  gdags par 'gyur zhe na / /
column5: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#169775#169775#TD4035E.TXT.r_7905# bsgom pa'i rim pa la brten nas ji ltar lam gyi rim pa gdags par 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: gang yang ngas sems can 'di dag  la 'phags pa'i lam nye par bstan pas 'du shes kyis byas ba'i 'ching ba thams cad bsal phar byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169806#169820#TD4035E.TXT.r_7908;TD4035E.TXT.r_7909;TD4035E.TXT.r_7910;TD4035E.TXT.r_7911# rgyu des sems can der skyes pa rnams mthon dman dang bzang ngan du gdags par 'gyur ro // /

column3: ji ltar rang nyid 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pas ye shes kyi mdud pa chen po bsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so sor mngon par shes shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169821#169836#TD4035E.TXT.r_7910;TD4035E.TXT.r_7911;TD4035E.TXT.r_7912;TD4035E.TXT.r_7913;TD4035E.TXT.r_7914;TD4035E.TXT.r_7915;TD4035E.TXT.r_7916# dper na nor bu ni phyi rol na 'od yod la / / +nor bu nyid 'od ma yin pa de bzhin du / /

column3: de  bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa bzhin du de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam bstan pas 'du shes kyis byas pa'i 'ching ba thams cad log par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169837#169851#TD4035E.TXT.r_7915;TD4035E.TXT.r_7916;TD4035E.TXT.r_7917;TD4035E.TXT.r_7918;TD4035E.TXT.r_7919# phyi rol na yang 'od yod la / / +mar me nyid kyang 'od yin pa de bzhin du / / +bsam gtan gnyis pa'i lus kyang 'od yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: 'du shes kyis byas pa'i 'ching ba thams cad log pa dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i  ye shes tshad med pa de 'gro ba mtha' dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169852#169871#TD4035E.TXT.r_7918;TD4035E.TXT.r_7919;TD4035E.TXT.r_7920;TD4035E.TXT.r_7921;TD4035E.TXT.r_7922# de bas na de la ni lus gcig  ces bya'i snga ma la ni ma yin no // / +tshad med pa bzhi ji ltar rnam par gzhag ce na / / +sems can sdug bsngal yang med bde ba yang med pa dang  sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang  bde ba dang ldan pa rnam pa gsum yod de / /

column3: de la rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ni cig car thams cad la dus thams cad du lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bsam ba ji lta ba dang  gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can  rnams la ma tshang ba med cing rjes su mthun bar 'jug pa'i phyir gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169871#169892#TD4035E.TXT.r_7921;TD4035E.TXT.r_7922;TD4035E.TXT.r_7923;TD4035E.TXT.r_7924# de dag ni bde ba 'dod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang bral bar  'dod pa dang  bde ba dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang go rims bzhin no // / +de dag la nye bar bsgrub pa rnam pa bzhis bzhir rnam par gzhag ste / /

column3: gang gi phyir sems can rnams gzhug pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes tshad med pa yin yang mdor bsdus pa tsam gyi sgo nas tshad dang ldan par bstan mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169891#169907#TD4035E.TXT.r_7923;TD4035E.TXT.r_7924# gsum ni bde ba nye bar bsgrub pa dang  sdug bsngal bstsal ba nye bar bsgrub pa dang  bde ba dang ma bral ba la rjes su yi rang ba  nye bar bsgrub pa gsum dang go rims bzhin no // / +btang snyoms ni bde ba 'dod pa la sogs pa gsum po de dag nyid kyis mi dga' zhing 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa dang  zhe sdang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa dang  'dod chags  kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pas rnam par gzhag go // /

column3: rigs    kyi bu 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes par bya ba ma yin pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169901#169918#TD4035E.TXT.r_7924;TD4035E.TXT.r_7925;TD4035E.TXT.r_7926# btang snyoms ni bde ba 'dod pa la sogs pa gsum po de dag nyid kyis mi dga' zhing 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa dang  zhe sdang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa dang  'dod chags  kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pas rnam par gzhag go // /

column3: yi ge brjod du med pa / / +gzhan gyis sgrub par dka' ba / / +sangs rgyas kyi zhing  thams cad du gnas pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169919#169927#TD4035E.TXT.r_7925;TD4035E.TXT.r_7926;TD4035E.TXT.r_7927;TD4035E.TXT.r_7928;TD4035E.TXT.r_7929;TD4035E.TXT.r_7930# byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes rgya cher 'byung ba de la / / +byams pa dang ldan pa ni phan 'dogs pas nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522645#522646#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9516;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9517# yul tha dad pa drug po dag la rags par  gyo ba dang  bar du chod pa'i rnam par rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#575297#575297#TD4068E.TXT.r_605;TD4068E.TXT.r_606# sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar rig par bya'o // / +bde ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir / /
column7: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2642527#2642527#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13292# 'ga' zhig gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par bzhag nas de las yongs su nyams te rjes kho na la gzugs kyi    khams su skye na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir de la gzugs kyi khams su gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye'o // /
column8: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1460701#1460701#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7104;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7105# de dag gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni thag ring ba'i phyir ro // / +rang gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi ni yin te nye ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#284554#284554#TD4026E.TXT.r_1621;TD4026E.TXT.r_1622;TD4026E.TXT.r_1623# sems dang shes rab rnam par grol ba dag ni des rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro // / +med pa yang ma yin te / / +rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de lta bur yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#862231#862232#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15521# srid pa bar ma zhes  bya ba 'di ci zhe na zhes bya ba la 'di log par rtogs pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid ma bstan pa'i phyir the tshom za bas dris pa'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2942394#2942394#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10242;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10243# 'dod chags can la mi gtsang ba'i chos bstan pa dang  zhe sdang can la byams pa'i chos bstan pa la  sogs pa gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis bstan cing bshad pa yang dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro // / +de la smin par bya ba'i dngos po dang  smin par rung ba'i dngos po gnyis la khyad par ci yod ce na / /

column3: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa / / +'bad rtsol dang bya ba thams cad las 'das pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169928#169935#TD4035E.TXT.r_7928;TD4035E.TXT.r_7930;TD4035E.TXT.r_7929;TD4035E.TXT.r_7931;TD4035E.TXT.r_7932# phan 'dogs pa yang     // / +phan pa nye bar bsgrub pa dang  bde ba nye bar bsgrub pa ste / /

column3: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa med pa / / +chos kyi dbyings kyi bya ba nyid kyi tha dad du dbyer med pa zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169936#169955#TD4035E.TXT.r_7931;TD4035E.TXT.r_7932;TD4035E.TXT.r_7933;TD4035E.TXT.r_7934;TD4035E.TXT.r_7935;TD4035E.TXT.r_7936;TD4035E.TXT.r_7937# de gnyis kyang tshad med pa thams cad kyis bstan to // / +kho na MED PA ZHES BYA BA NI / / +rab tu sdang ba'i bsam pa med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: nor bu bee d'u rya rnam par dag pa'i dper mdzad nas / /

rgyas par bstan te / / +rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rigs par bya ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa dus gsum dang  rjes su 'brel pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169954#169963#TD4035E.TXT.r_7936;TD4035E.TXT.r_7937;TD4035E.TXT.r_7938;TD4035E.TXT.r_7939;TD4035E.TXT.r_7940# gnod pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gnod par bya ba rnam par mi spyod pa'i phyir ro // / +yangs pa zhes bya ba ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169963#169972#TD4035E.TXT.r_7938;TD4035E.TXT.r_7939;TD4035E.TXT.r_7940;TD4035E.TXT.r_7941# dmigs pa che ba'i phyir ro // / +chen por gyur pa zhes bya ba ni / / +phan pa dang bde ba nye bar bsgrub pa gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par byed pa'o // / +bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las gang la rab tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i rang bzhin yang mi 'dor la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169973#169994#TD4035E.TXT.r_7941;TD4035E.TXT.r_7942;TD4035E.TXT.r_7943;TD4035E.TXT.r_7944;TD4035E.TXT.r_7945;TD4035E.TXT.r_7946;TD4035E.TXT.r_7947# tshad med  pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu tshad med pa'i phyir te / / +chu klung chen po bzhi 'dres pa bzhin no // /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad  du yang kun tu ston to // / +gsung brjod du med pa'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#169994#170006#TD4035E.TXT.r_7946;TD4035E.TXT.r_7947;TD4035E.TXT.r_7948;TD4035E.TXT.r_7949;TD4035E.TXT.r_7950;TD4035E.TXT.r_7951;TD4035E.TXT.r_7952# mos te khyab par byas nas  bsgrubs te zhes bya ba ni / / +lhag pa'i bsam pas mos te / /

column3: sgra rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to // / +sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad dang yang bral la / /
sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod  pa dang bsam pa yang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs so // / +rtogs bya rtogs pa de yi ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170006#170015#TD4035E.TXT.r_7950;TD4035E.TXT.r_7951;TD4035E.TXT.r_7952;TD4035E.TXT.r_7953;TD4035E.TXT.r_7954# yongs su dag par byas / / +yongs su byang bar byas pa'o // / +gnas so zhes bya ba ni / /

column3: yan lag rtogs par byed phyir te // / +go rims ji bzhin gnas gcig ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170016#170023#TD4035E.TXT.r_7953;TD4035E.TXT.r_7954;TD4035E.TXT.r_7955;TD4035E.TXT.r_7956# nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa'i tshul gyis dus 'da'  bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +byams pa bsgom pa ni / / +dge ba'i mchog yin no zhes rgya cher gsungs pa de / /

column3: dag rgyu gsum ni rkyen yin no // / +don gyi gnas bzhin po 'di dag las kyang shes bya thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir  dang po ni rtogs par bya ba'i gnas su blta bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170024#170039#TD4035E.TXT.r_7955;TD4035E.TXT.r_7956;TD4035E.TXT.r_7957;TD4035E.TXT.r_7958;TD4035E.TXT.r_7959;TD4035E.TXT.r_7960;TD4035E.TXT.r_7961;TD4035E.TXT.r_7962# dge ba'i mchog yin no zhes rgya cher gsungs pa de / / +ci las dgongs te gsungs she na / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: de'i rjes su rtogs pa ni rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir gnyis pa byang chub kyi gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170040#170047#TD4035E.TXT.r_7961;TD4035E.TXT.r_7962;TD4035E.TXT.r_7963# de bas na dge ba'i mchog ces bya'o // / +snying rje yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrub pa yongs su bsgoms pas mchog yin la / /

column3: byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yin pa'i phyir gsum pa byang chub kyi yan lag gi gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170048#170055#TD4035E.TXT.r_7962;TD4035E.TXT.r_7963;TD4035E.TXT.r_7964# snying rje yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrub pa yongs su bsgoms pas mchog yin la / / +de yang sdug bsngal bstsal ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: byang     // / +chub kyi yan lag rnams nyid kyis gzhan dag rtogs par byed pa'i phyir bzhi pa rtogs par byed pa'i gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170056#170064#TD4035E.TXT.r_7963;TD4035E.TXT.r_7964;TD4035E.TXT.r_7965;TD4035E.TXT.r_7966# de yang sdug bsngal bstsal ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // / +de bas na gzugs med pa  dag na de gtan med de / /

column3: de ltar gnas bzhi po 'di dbang du byas te rgyu dang rkyen gyi dngos pos dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170065#170078#TD4035E.TXT.r_7965;TD4035E.TXT.r_7966# gcad pa dang dbug pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir / / +snying rje la snyoms par zhugs pas sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gang na sdug bsngal rten dang bcas par med pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched de nyid du skye bar    gyur cig ces nye bar sgrub par byed do // /
column5: 0.012#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1076774#1076774#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4049;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4050# de nas ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la / / +de nas ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing / /
column6: 0.014#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2082501#2082501#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15172# rang gi sa pa  dang gong ma'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa'i dmigs pa ni rang gi sa pa'i sdug bsngal dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'i sa pa yin gyi / /
column7: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2164284#2164285#TD4029E.TXT.r_5773;TD4029E.TXT.r_5774;TD4029E.TXT.r_5775# zad par dmar po'o // / +zad par dkar po'o // / +zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched do zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med par 'du shes par byed do // /
column8: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2738429#2738431#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5371;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5372# log par rnam par brtags pa'i dngos po la dmigs pa dang  lta ba la dmigs pa dang  tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs la dmigs pa dang  rang gis rnam par brtags pa'i ming la  dmigs pa dang  rang gi ngang gis ye yod pa'i dngos po la dmigs pa'o // / +de la gang dag sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa la dmigs pa de dag ni log par rnam par brtags pa'i dngos po la dmigs pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.019#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876734#1876734#TD4039E.TXT.r_7186# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la  ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi phyi rol du bltas pa'i dmigs pa'i gyo ba tsam las dben pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya ste / /
column10: 0.020#TD4053E.TXT.r#2995169#2995169#TD4053E.TXT.r_4077;TD4053E.TXT.r_4078;TD4053E.TXT.r_4079# sdug pa'i gzugs sprul pa la ni chags pa'o // / +mi sdug pa'i gzugs sprul pa la ni mi mthun pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi ni 'phags  pa nyan thos kyi zag pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa dag pa gang yin pa de dag rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba thob ste / /
column11: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041139#1041139#TD4054E.TXT.r_8000;TD4054E.TXT.r_8001;TD4054E.TXT.r_8002# sdug pa'i gzugs sprul pa la ni chags pa'o // / +mi sdug pa'i gzugs sprul pa la ni mi mthun pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam thar gang / /
column12: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2350931#2350931#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4636;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4637# gzhan yang chos nyid kyis dang por gzugs kyi sa pa dag las rnam par grol ba la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ces bya bas so // / +gzhan yang rgyu mthun pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352982#2352989#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4894;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4895;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4896# tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pa yang byams pa'i mtha' ni dge rgyas kyi bar du'o // / +snying rje'i mtha' ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o // /
column14: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353162#2353162#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4911;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4912# snying rje bsgoms pa'i mtha' ni nam mkha' mtha'     // / +yas skye mched kyi bar du'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column15: 0.022#TD4096E.TXT.r#1555732#1555733#TD4096E.TXT.r_747;TD4096E.TXT.r_748# de na khyad par du ma byas pas rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun  pa'i lam dgu po ni sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin no zhes bshad kyi / / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pas bsdus pas sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs so zhes khyad par du byas nas ni ma bstan la / /
column16: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1363834#1363834#TD4037E.TXT.r_6456;TD4037E.TXT.r_6457# 'dod pa rnams spangs nas nyes par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba lta bu'o // / +sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba nas rgyas par log par  zhugs pa'i bar du nges pa ni med mod kyi / /
column17: 0.023#TD4091E.TXT.r#704263#704263#TD4091E.TXT.r_1778;TD4091E.TXT.r_1779# 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i'o // / +gang dag na 'du shes med pa'i sems can gnas pa'i sems can de dag kyang gang zhe na / /
column18: 0.023#TD4095E.TXT.r#70663#70663#TD4095E.TXT.r_1508;TD4095E.TXT.r_1509# 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i'o // / +gang dag na 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams 'khod pa'i sems can de dag gang zhe na / /
column19: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034119#1034119#TD4054E.TXT.r_7025;TD4054E.TXT.r_7026# rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa gang yin pas de ni  sbyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i bsam pa'o // / +gang dag la de ltar sbyin pas phan 'dogs pa'i sems can de dag ni bdag la shin tu phan 'dogs par byang chub sems dpa' mthong gi bdag gis ni ma yin te / /
column20: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1042137#1042137#TD4054E.TXT.r_8154# zad par sa dang  zad par chu dang  zad par med  dang  zad par rlung dang  zad par sngon po dang  zad par ser po dang  zad par dmar po dang  zad par dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /
column21: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2151480#2151481#TD4029E.TXT.r_4037;TD4029E.TXT.r_4038# bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis gzhan la phan pa la 'jug par rab tu sbyor ba la de'i log par bsgrubs pas sdug bsngal yal bar  'dor te / / +ji lta ji ltar sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed pa ni log par sgrub cing 'dul ba la mi gnas pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ba de'i gnyen por tshad med pa rnams so // /
column22: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1040764#1040764#TD4054E.TXT.r_7941;TD4054E.TXT.r_7942;TD4054E.TXT.r_7943# snying rje la sogs pa rnams la yang ji ltar mthun mthun du sbyar bar  bya'o // / +snying rje gang / / +sems can rnams sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i bsam pa'i gnas yang dag par 'byor ba'i zhes pa snga ma bzhin no // /
column23: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#993894#993894#TD4054E.TXT.r_415;TD4054E.TXT.r_416;TD4054E.TXT.r_417# kyi khams shes pa'o // / +tshad med pa'i 'du shes gang / / +gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched shes pa'o // /
column24: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2022651#2022651#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6503# mtshungs par ldan pa'i gnyis dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang  gzugs med par gtogs pa bsgom pas spang bar bya bas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa dang  zag pa med pa rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang  'gog pa mthong bas    spang bar bya ba de nyid kyis glags pa'i dmigs pa'o // /
column25: 0.029#TD4001E.TXT.r#1972811#1972811#TD4001E.TXT.r_46# shes rab kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang  'jug pa la rmongs pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i  lam la 'jug pa ni de'i dgos pa'o // /

column3: de  la gnas bzhi po 'di dag las dang po ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis bon yin pa'i phyir so so rang nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i gnas kyis de rnam par dag pa la brten nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rgyur rtogs par byed par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170077#170087#TD4035E.TXT.r_7966;TD4035E.TXT.r_7967;TD4035E.TXT.r_7968# snying rje la snyoms par zhugs pas sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gang na sdug bsngal rten dang bcas par med pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched de nyid du skye bar    gyur cig ces nye bar sgrub par byed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170088#170099#TD4035E.TXT.r_7967;TD4035E.TXT.r_7968;TD4035E.TXT.r_7969# dga' ba la snyoms par zhugs pas ni / / +sems can bde ba dang ldan zhing dga' ba thob pa rnams rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar bsgrub ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078088#1078090#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4302# gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i thos pa de bzhin du kye ma sems can rnams ni de ltar bde bar gyur cig ces sems can rnams la bde bar  mos par byed do // /
column7: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1192782#1192782#TD4047E.TXT.r_10219# byams pa nyid sgom par byed pa de ni zhes bya ba ni de dag thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces yid la byas nas chos la dmigs pas sgom par byed kyi sems can du mos pas ni ma  yin no // /

column3: de ltar gnas gcig ni rgyu yin no // / +ji ltar  gsum rkyen yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170098#170107#TD4035E.TXT.r_7968;TD4035E.TXT.r_7969# sems can bde ba dang ldan zhing dga' ba thob pa rnams rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar bsgrub ste / / +sems can 'di dag gi bde ba rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ji tsam du chad  med pa de tsam du tshad med par gyur cig snyam ste / /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas stobs bcu la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mdzad pa na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170106#170118#TD4035E.TXT.r_7969;TD4035E.TXT.r_7970# sems can 'di dag gi bde ba rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ji tsam du chad  med pa de tsam du tshad med par gyur cig snyam ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170118#170126#TD4035E.TXT.r_7970;TD4035E.TXT.r_7971;TD4035E.TXT.r_7972# de ltar na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i dga' ba ni mchog yin no // /
column6: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1741051#1741052#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5455# rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang  rtags de dang  mtshan ma de yid la mi byed kyi / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353177#2353178#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4914# dga' ba ni bde ba'i rnam pa 'byed pa lta bur 'jug pa'i phyir dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni  rang gi rnam par shes pa mtha' med pa la dmigs pa'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir dang  mtha' med pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu 'phel ba dang bde bar gyur pa'i phyir dga' ba bsgoms pa'i mtha' ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column8: 0.025#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876726#1876726#TD4039E.TXT.r_7185;TD4039E.TXT.r_7186# bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa rnams la ni gong nas gong du gyo ba spangs pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya'o // / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la  ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi phyi rol du bltas pa'i dmigs pa'i gyo ba tsam las dben pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya ste / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393618#2393618#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9810# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las 'phags pa  rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa mngon du byed do zhes bshad do // /
column10: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2066690#2066690#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12825# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column11: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1711466#1711466#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1794# bdag gi tshor ba dang btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te / /
column12: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876646#1876646#TD4039E.TXT.r_7175# mthar gyis rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mi gyo ba'i bar du snyoms par 'jug go // /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351761#2351761#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4723# rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so zhes gsungs pa de la / /

column3: gzhan  gyi sgra la brten nas de rnam par dag pa la brten nas dkon mchog 'byung ba'i rkyen du rtogs par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170125#170136#TD4035E.TXT.r_7970;TD4035E.TXT.r_7971;TD4035E.TXT.r_7972;TD4035E.TXT.r_7973;TD4035E.TXT.r_7974# de ltar na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i dga' ba ni mchog yin no // / +'di lta ste / / +ci yang med pa'i skye mched 'di ni zag pa med pa'i sems kyis sa'i mtha' yin te / /

column3: de ltar gsum po 'di ni rkyen yin no // / +'di phan chad gzhung lhag mas gnas bzhi po 'di dag nyid kyis mthar gyis rnam par dbye ba rgyas par ston par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170137#170145#TD4035E.TXT.r_7973;TD4035E.TXT.r_7974# de ni btang snyoms  rnams kyi mchog yin no // / +de bas na ji ltar dge slong dgra bcom pa bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa spyod pa thams cad la kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170145#170154#TD4035E.TXT.r_7974;TD4035E.TXT.r_7975# de bas na ji ltar dge slong dgra bcom pa bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa spyod pa thams cad la kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du / /

column3: de la dri ma  dang bcas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de don gang gi yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170153#170169#TD4035E.TXT.r_7974;TD4035E.TXT.r_7975;TD4035E.TXT.r_7976;TD4035E.TXT.r_7977;TD4035E.TXT.r_7978;TD4035E.TXT.r_7979# de bas na ji ltar dge slong dgra bcom pa bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa spyod pa thams cad la kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / +sems can 'di dag kyang de ltar gyur cig  snyam ste / /
column5: 0.021#TD4053E.TXT.r#2994957#2994958#TD4053E.TXT.r_4048# sems can bde bar gyur pa la sogs  pa la yang rjes su chags pa la sogs pa btang snyoms su byed cing kye ma nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol bar gyur cig snyam pa 'di ni btang snyoms kyi rnam par rig par bya ste / /

column3: rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir dang / / +de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170170#170179#TD4035E.TXT.r_7978;TD4035E.TXT.r_7979;TD4035E.TXT.r_7980;TD4035E.TXT.r_7981# de bas na ci yang med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i btang snyoms mchog yin te / / +'phags pa'i rnam pa byang chub kyi yan lag  dang ldan pa 'di dag thams cad ni / /

column3: rigs yod phyir na lus can  kun // / +rtag tu sangs rgyas snying po can // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170178#170189#TD4035E.TXT.r_7979;TD4035E.TXT.r_7980;TD4035E.TXT.r_7981;TD4035E.TXT.r_7982;TD4035E.TXT.r_7983# 'phags pa'i rnam pa byang chub kyi yan lag  dang ldan pa 'di dag thams cad ni / / +'phags pa kho nas bsgom par nus so // /

column3: mdor bsdu na don rnam pa gsum gyis sems can thams cad ni rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170188#170200#TD4035E.TXT.r_7981;TD4035E.TXT.r_7982;TD4035E.TXT.r_7983;TD4035E.TXT.r_7984;TD4035E.TXT.r_7985# cha gcig bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +gang la snang ba'i mtshan ma'am / / +yang na gzugs kyi mtshan ma yid la byas nas snyoms par 'jug pa ste / /

column3: sangs rgyas ye shes sems can tshogs zhugs phyir // / +rang bzhin dri med  de ni gnyis med de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170199#170210#TD4035E.TXT.r_7984;TD4035E.TXT.r_7985;TD4035E.TXT.r_7986;TD4035E.TXT.r_7987# de gnyis kyis go rims bzhin du snang  ba yang dag par shes pa'am / / +yang na gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4019E.TXT.r#2487719#2487719#TD4019E.TXT.r_10522# skye gnas kyi bye brag ni 'gro ba la phan par 'gyur ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal  po la sogs par 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas rigs la de 'bras nyer brtags phyir // / +'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po can du gsungs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170211#170222#TD4035E.TXT.r_7986;TD4035E.TXT.r_7987;TD4035E.TXT.r_7988;TD4035E.TXT.r_7989;TD4035E.TXT.r_7990# gnyis ka'i cha bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +gnyis ka yid la byas nas snyoms par 'jug ste / /

column3: don de rnam pa thams cad don gang gis gsungs rab thams cad du khyad par med par bstan par 'gyur ba de'i dbang du byas te bshad par    bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170223#170236#TD4035E.TXT.r_7989;TD4035E.TXT.r_7990;TD4035E.TXT.r_7991;TD4035E.TXT.r_7992;TD4035E.TXT.r_7993# gzugs rnams kyang mthong ngo // / +de ltar snang ba yongs  su bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi skus 'phro ba'i don dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam par dbyer med pa'i don dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yod pa'i don gyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170237#170251#TD4035E.TXT.r_7992;TD4035E.TXT.r_7993;TD4035E.TXT.r_7994;TD4035E.TXT.r_7995;TD4035E.TXT.r_7996# mdo las rgya cher ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no // / +de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma gang la sgrib ce na / /

column3: don gyi gnas gsum po  'di dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs te 'og nas ston par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170252#170265#TD4035E.TXT.r_7996;TD4035E.TXT.r_7997# gang la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma de las nyams na gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#164965#164965#TD4035E.TXT.r_7029;TD4035E.TXT.r_7030# ji ltar mos par mi byed ce na / / +de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i  mtshan ma bzung bar ma mos pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#670496#670496#TD4069E.TXT.r_6727;TD4069E.TXT.r_6728# yongs su nyams so zhes bya ba'i tha tshigs go // / +dka' ba spyad pas dag par thugs su chud pa'i phyir de'i 'dod pa na spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa la LTA BAR 'GYUR RO // /
column7: 0.029#TD4079E.TXT.r#765397#765397#TD4079E.TXT.r_1505# rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba rnams brdzun pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan ma las gyur pa'i phyir de dag don dam par med de // /

column3: sdom ni / / +ngo bo rgyu 'bras las ldan 'jug pa dang / / +gnas skabs de bzhin kun tu 'gro ba'i don // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170266#170277#TD4035E.TXT.r_7997;TD4035E.TXT.r_7998;TD4035E.TXT.r_7999;TD4035E.TXT.r_8000# de la thog mar ma bsams par gzugs snang ba mthong ba las ni the tshom za bar 'gyur ro // / +brtson pa lhod pa las ni yid la  mi byed par 'gyur te / /

column3: rtag tu mi 'gyur yon tan dbyer med ni // / +don dam dbyings  kyi dgongs don yin zhes bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170278#170288#TD4035E.TXT.r_7999;TD4035E.TXT.r_8000;TD4035E.TXT.r_8001;TD4035E.TXT.r_8002# dper na gzugs rnams la lta bar mi 'dod pa ni / / +yang na mig 'dzums par byed dam / /

column3: mdor bsdu na don rnam pa bcu la dgongs nas / / +de kho na'i yi shes dam pa'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170289#170302#TD4035E.TXT.r_8001;TD4035E.TXT.r_8002;TD4035E.TXT.r_8003;TD4035E.TXT.r_8004# yang na gdong gud du sgyur ba de bzhin du / / +de yang gzugs de dag yid la mi byed par 'gyur ro // /

column3: don rnam par bcu gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +ngo bo'i don dang  rgyu'i don dang  'bras  bu'i don dang  las kyi don dang  ldan pa'i don dang  'jug pa'i don dang  gnas skabs kyis rab tu dbye ba'i don dang  kun tu 'gro ba'i don dang  mi 'gyur ba'i don dang  dbyer med pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170301#170315#TD4035E.TXT.r_8003;TD4035E.TXT.r_8004;TD4035E.TXT.r_8005;TD4035E.TXT.r_8006;TD4035E.TXT.r_8007;TD4035E.TXT.r_8008# dbang po'i sgo ma bsdams pa la sogs pa ni lus kyi gnas  ngan len du 'gyur ro // / +ha cang gnyid ma log pa'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170316#170329#TD4035E.TXT.r_8007;TD4035E.TXT.r_8008;TD4035E.TXT.r_8009;TD4035E.TXT.r_8010# gzugs rnams mi mthong ngam / / +yang na tshang bar mi mthong ba la / /

column3: de la ngo bo'i don dang rgyu'i don las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170330#170340#TD4035E.TXT.r_8010;TD4035E.TXT.r_8011;TD4035E.TXT.r_8012;TD4035E.TXT.r_8013# ha cang btud de yid la  byed pa'i phyir ha cang brtun ngas par 'gyur ro // / +ha cang brtun ngas pa'i nyes pas ni ha cang zhum par byed de / /
column5: 0.012#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167790#1167790#TD4047E.TXT.r_6869;TD4047E.TXT.r_6870;TD4047E.TXT.r_6871# de'i phyir sems can mang po'i dgos pa nye bar gnas pa mthong nas sbyin par mi byed de / / +de ltar yang kha na ma tho bar yang  mi 'gyur te / / +nyes pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#61154#61154#TD4036E.TXT.r_9017;TD4036E.TXT.r_9018# des  na lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la sems gtad du zin kyang zhi ba'i dbyings nyid mi 'dod cing yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir sems 'jug par mi 'gyur / / +dang bar mi 'gyur / /
column7: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1703658#1703667#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_759;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_760;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_761# nyams par byed cing mthu skyed par mi byed par gnas par 'gyur ro // / +'grib par byed cing 'phel bar mi byed par  gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1338526#1338526#TD4037E.TXT.r_3116# bskrad pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems can  dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mngon sum du bstan pas mi dge ba las skyo bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'dun par byed mgu bar byed ya mtshan du 'dzin par byed pa'o // /
column9: 0.013#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2738474#2738476#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5377# nyon mongs pa ni nam yang 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs par ma gyur dmigs par mi byed dmigs par mi 'gyur la khams mi 'dra ba la yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#197927#197927#TD4035E.TXT.r_12763;TD4035E.TXT.r_12764# des chos de thos pas dad pa rnyed par 'gyur te / / +dngos po'i 'dod    pa spang ba'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do // /
column11: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#57788#57788#TD4036E.TXT.r_8585# re zhig mngon sum gyi dbang du byas pa'i yid la byed pas nang gi dngos po'i 'gyur nyid yongs su tshol bar byed do / /
column12: 0.014#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196244#2196245#TD4046E.TXT.r_48;TD4046E.TXT.r_49;TD4046E.TXT.r_50;TD4046E.TXT.r_51# bdag nyid la ltos nas nyams par mi byed do // / +brgyal bag med pa'am / / +brjed ngas pa'am / /
column13: 0.015#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#792395#792395#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4289;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4290# gal te de lta yin na tshangs par  spyod pa rnams kyi ci'i phyir rgyas par mi 'gyur la / / +de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pas yongs su gdung bas gnod pa'i phyir ro zhe na / /
column14: 0.015#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#825466#825467#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9798;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9799# 'du  shes med pa pa dang  gzugs ni 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ro // / +ris mthun pa'i ni 'phen par mi nus pa'i phyir te / /
column15: 0.015#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1986953#1986956#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1195;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1196;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1197# gang zag log par lta ba 'am bdag tu lta ba zhig gzhan dag la 'jig rten pha rol tu med pa 'am bdag yod  par ston par 'dod pas ngag skyes par byed pa'i sems kha phyir bltas pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pas tshig tu smra bar byed kyi / / +lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pas ni ma yin pa'i phyir na bar du chod par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#192999#192999#TD4035E.TXT.r_11897# de dag la mkhas pa ga la zhig mngon par chags par byed ces bstan pa'i phyir ro //// /
column17: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#38979#38979#TD4036E.TXT.r_5841;TD4036E.TXT.r_5842# bskyod du zin kyang log par bsgrub pa'i phyir / / +des ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par mi byed do // /
column18: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161898#1161898#TD4047E.TXT.r_5984# rig pa'i gnas lnga po 'di dag la sbyor ba goms par ma byas par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes byas nas rig pa'i  gnas lngas bsdus pa'i chos tshol bar byed cing / /
column19: 0.016#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201153#2201153#TD4046E.TXT.r_714;TD4046E.TXT.r_715# gal te lus dang longs spyod la lta bas 'dod pa che ba la sogs pa gsum dang du len par byed na nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.016#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201752#2201753#TD4046E.TXT.r_802;TD4046E.TXT.r_803# chang 'thung ba rnams ni phal che bar ra ro bar bya ba'i phyir chang 'thung bar byed de / /
column21: 0.016#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603091#2603091#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8396# yang ji ltar na nyon mongs pas 'jigs pas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir spel bar byed ce na / /
column22: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#685682#685682#TD4083E.TXT.r_183# thabs mkhas pas kyang ston par byed pa de bzhin du ser sna can rnams kyi ser sna spong bar byed pa dang  tshe 'di la yang yang dag pa dang  tshegs chung ngus longs spyod  rnams bsgrub pa dang  bsrung ba dang  bstan pa 'di la sdang ba rnams dad pa thob par bya ba dang  mthong ba thob par bya ba dang  lta ba rnam par dag pas ngan song las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang  kun tu sbyor ba thams cad mthar thug pas sdug bsngal ba thams cad las yang dag  par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa'am thabs mkhas pas kyang ston par byed do // /
column23: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1188540#1188540#TD4047E.TXT.r_9626# rnam pa dgu ni lus dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par dbye bas so sor rnam pa bzhir 'gyur la / /
column24: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#37068#37068#TD4036E.TXT.r_5573;TD4036E.TXT.r_5574# 'di ltar dge ba'i chos rnams la kun du sten par byed cing sgom par byed na ma thob pa thob par 'gyur zhing / / +thob par yang mngon du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1214115#1214115#TD4047E.TXT.r_13218# khams gsum ni kun du spyod pa'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams smos pa yin no // /
column26: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2617512#2617514#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10105;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10106;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10107# nyon mongs pa dag spong na zhes 'byung bas spong bar byed pa yod pa'i phyir ro // / +yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur te / /
column27: 0.019#TD4010E.TXT.r#2262873#2262873#TD4010E.TXT.r_4169# thams cad du mtshan ma thams cad yid la byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtag tu mnyam par  gzhag par 'gyur ro // /
column28: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2897991#2897991#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4207;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4208# dper na glang po la sogs pas yul srung bar byed pa bzhin du khrel ba dang ngo tsha bas zin na 'khor ba na gnas kyang byang chub sems dpas 'dod  chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas mi gos par srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +kun la bzod par mi 'gyur dang / /
column29: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2617573#2617573#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10114;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10115# 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur te / / +mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column30: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2057022#2057022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11396;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11397# 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba nges pa la 'jug na 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa dang bzod pa rnams kyis yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur te / / +mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column31: 0.020#TD4018E.TXT.r#3055530#3055530#TD4018E.TXT.r_6635# chos kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par khong du chud pa'i phyir zhes pa ni chud pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du song bar snang bas na yid kyi zhes bya'o // /
column32: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1981346#1981346#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_368;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_369;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_370# dbyibs med kyang de'i bkod pa tha dad pas 'di ni phreng ba'o // / +'di ni 'khor lo'o zhes bya bar 'gyur te / / +khyad par du 'phags par gnas pa'i  phyir ro // /
column33: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#971965#971965#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10485;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10486# 'jig rten du grags ba'i tshig dang yi ge smras na 'jig rten pa dag gis myur du tshig dang don khong du  chud cing de de bzhin du bden no zhes khas len par byed pas na grags pas ni khas len par 'gyur ro // / +ji ltar rigs pa'i phyir mthun pa ste / /
column34: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1867272#1867272#TD4039E.TXT.r_6037;TD4039E.TXT.r_6038# tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar lhung nas de'i rgyu de dang de'i rkyen des khams gsum gyi skye ba'i mun par ltung bar 'gyur te / / +ma rig pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa'i phyir bdag  nyid kyi lta ba bzung ba la log pa yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi mthong ngo // /
column35: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#638545#638554#TD4069E.TXT.r_2233;TD4069E.TXT.r_2234# rtse gcig ba nyid kyi phyir na kun du gnas par byed ces bya bar shes par bya'o // /
column36: 0.022#TD4032E.TXT.r#1961085#1961085#TD4032E.TXT.r_6460;TD4032E.TXT.r_6461# rnam par  'jig pa de yang tshig pa dang 'dra bar byed pas na tshig par byed ces bya ste / / +gyur par mthong ba'i phyir ro // /
column37: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#601965#601965#TD4068E.TXT.r_3632# dgra bcom  pas ni khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i chos kun ma lus par spangs pas nyon mongs pa'i yid kyang spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa'i yid med do // /
column38: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#602046#602046#TD4068E.TXT.r_3641# 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de ches zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa'i yid med do // /
column39: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#638535#638535#TD4069E.TXT.r_2232# de la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir na dad par byed ces bya bar shes par bya'o // /
column40: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1500682#1500682#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11669# mig gi rnam par shes pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'ang yid la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir yid kyi sa pa yang yin pa bzhin no // /
column41: 0.022#TD4010E.TXT.r#2269905#2269905#TD4010E.TXT.r_5099;TD4010E.TXT.r_5100;TD4010E.TXT.r_5101# de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde la 'dod par mi 'gyur te lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +mos par yang mi 'gyur te zab mo'i     // / +chos la goms par ma byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column42: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1175520#1175520#TD4047E.TXT.r_7894;TD4047E.TXT.r_7895# chang 'thung ba rnams ni phal cher ra ro bar bya ba'i phyir chang 'thung bar byed de / / +ci nas dga' bar bya'o snyam pa dang  yang na ra ro bar 'gyur bar bdag nyid kyis shes bzhin du 'thung ba de dag ni nyon mongs  pa can gyi sems yin pa'i phyir da lus kyis nyes par spyod par 'gyur ba 'dir dgongs par rig par bya ste / /
column43: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#888821#888822#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19544;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19545# dga' ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan par byed de / / +yid dga' ba'i lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column44: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477227#477227#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3549# sems can gdul ba'i mkhyen pa'i mchog brnyes par gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column45: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2589979#2589980#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6755;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6756# 'di la grub pa ni yang sred pa la sems kyi rgyud sred pa dang bcas pa 'jug par 'gyur te / / +gzhol ba'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la gzhol ba bzhin no // /
column46: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1045789#1045789#TD4054E.TXT.r_8657;TD4054E.TXT.r_8658# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug dang  yid de / / +gzung ba'i mtshan ma ji skad bstan pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column47: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#945380#945380#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7122;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7123# mngon pa'i chos la mkhas na mdo sde rnams kyi don rtogs par 'gyur te / / +mdo sde'i don rtogs par byed ba'i phyir mngon pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column48: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#732650#732650#TD4091E.TXT.r_6883# spyin ba la sogs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir te bdag shi nas bde bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing tshul khrims srung bar byed do // /
column49: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1174903#1174903#TD4047E.TXT.r_7818;TD4047E.TXT.r_7819# gal te lus dang longs spyod la lta bas 'dod pa che ba la sogs pa gsum dang du len par byed na nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column50: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#174006#174006#TD4035E.TXT.r_8674;TD4035E.TXT.r_8675;TD4035E.TXT.r_8676# dran par mi byed cing / / +yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te / / +ji ltar dran par mi byed cing  yid la mi byed par byed ce na / /
column51: 0.027#TD4018E.TXT.r#3090934#3090934#TD4018E.TXT.r_11227# gang yang sangs rgyas dang  chos dang dge 'dun la mi bden par byed pa de ni de lta bur sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ste / /
column52: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1722612#1722612#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3328# de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du ston pa'i mdun du yang bdag gis bshad pa la dge slong  'di phyir zlog par byed khong khro bar byed cing tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang bdag gis bshad pa la / /

column3: rin chen  nam mkha' chu dag bzhin // / +rtag tu rang bzhin nyon mongs med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170339#170349#TD4035E.TXT.r_8012;TD4035E.TXT.r_8013;TD4035E.TXT.r_8014;TD4035E.TXT.r_8015# bya khug rta btsir ba bzhin no / / +de snang ba tsam zhig 'dod pa las / /

column3: chos mos lhag pa'i shes rab dang / / +ting 'dzin snying rje las byung ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170350#170359#TD4035E.TXT.r_8014;TD4035E.TXT.r_8015;TD4035E.TXT.r_8016# gzugs mthong ba dang lhan cig tu 'byung ste / / +gcig 'dod pa las gnyis rnyed pa'i phyir / /

column3: de la tshigs su bcad pa phyed snga mas ci bstan zhe na / / +mthu dang gzhan du mi 'gyur dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170357#170367#TD4035E.TXT.r_8015;TD4035E.TXT.r_8016;TD4035E.TXT.r_8017;TD4035E.TXT.r_8018# gcig 'dod pa las gnyis rnyed pa'i phyir / / +gnyer  gyi sgo gnyis rnyed pa bzhin du / /

column3: brlan pa'i ngo bo rang bzhin phyir // / +'di dag nor bu rin chen mkha' // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170366#170375#TD4035E.TXT.r_8017;TD4035E.TXT.r_8018;TD4035E.TXT.r_8019# shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ro // / +glo bur du phyogs kun tu gzugs bzang po cig car mthong na sngar bar 'gyur te / /

column3: chu yi yon tan chos mthun nyid // / +gsum po 'di dag ni 'dir sngar bstan zin pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170376#170384#TD4035E.TXT.r_8018;TD4035E.TXT.r_8019;TD4035E.TXT.r_8020;TD4035E.TXT.r_8021# glo bur du phyogs kun tu gzugs bzang po cig car mthong na sngar bar 'gyur te / / +glo gnyi ga nas sreg par 'phur ba bzhin no // /

column3: gsum po 'di dag la go rims ji lta ba bzhin kho nar rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid las brtsams nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams yid  bzhin gyi nor bu dang  nam mkha' dang  chu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang  chos mthun pa nyid du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170385#170396#TD4035E.TXT.r_8020;TD4035E.TXT.r_8021;TD4035E.TXT.r_8022;TD4035E.TXT.r_8023# de 'gro yang rung gnas kyang rung ste / / +'jig rten gyi sna tshogs dag la 'du shes sna  tshogs su 'gyur na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170397#170408#TD4035E.TXT.r_8022;TD4035E.TXT.r_8023;TD4035E.TXT.r_8024;TD4035E.TXT.r_8025# phyi rol du 'du shes pa de ni de'i ting nge 'dzin la bar du gcod par byed do // / +yang na ting nge 'dzin des bdag nyid ni mchog tu mthong la / /

column3: de la re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la ni bsam pa'i don grub pa la sogs pa mthu'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid las bsams nas yid     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170409#170424#TD4035E.TXT.r_8024;TD4035E.TXT.r_8025;TD4035E.TXT.r_8026;TD4035E.TXT.r_8027;TD4035E.TXT.r_8028;TD4035E.TXT.r_8029# gzhan ni dma' bar bdag nyid kun tu 'dzin par byed na / / +de yang 'du shes sna tshogs yin no // / +ha cang smra ba la brtson  pa'am / /

column3: bzhin gyi nor bu dang chos mthun pa nyid du rig par bya'o // / +de bzhin nyid la ni gzhan du ma yin pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo'i rang gi mtshan nyid las brtsams nas nam mkha' dang chos mthun pa nyid du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170425#170434#TD4035E.TXT.r_8028;TD4035E.TXT.r_8029;TD4035E.TXT.r_8030;TD4035E.TXT.r_8031# sems kyang ting nge 'dzin du mi rung bas na / / +ha cang smra ba mang na yang bar du gcod pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170435#170445#TD4035E.TXT.r_8030;TD4035E.TXT.r_8031;TD4035E.TXT.r_8032;TD4035E.TXT.r_8033# de nas snang ba'i mtshan ma dang  gzugs snang ba byung na yang / / +nang gi rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i yid la byed    pa bor nas / /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni sems  can la snying brtse bas brlan pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid las brtsams nas chu dang chos mthun pa nyid du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170444#170461#TD4035E.TXT.r_8031;TD4035E.TXT.r_8032;TD4035E.TXT.r_8033;TD4035E.TXT.r_8034;TD4035E.TXT.r_8035;TD4035E.TXT.r_8036# nang gi rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i yid la byed    pa bor nas / / +phyi rol du 'jug par byed cing / / +gzugs rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir / /

column3: 'dir thams cad kyang rtag tu rang bzhin gyis shin tu nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid las brtsams nas de  nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang  nam mkha' dang chu rnam bar dag pa'i yon tan dang  chos mthun par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170462#170478#TD4035E.TXT.r_8035;TD4035E.TXT.r_8036;TD4035E.TXT.r_8037;TD4035E.TXT.r_8038;TD4035E.TXT.r_8039# 'di dag ni mthun mthun du ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa dang  gzhi la bar du gcod par rig par bya ste / / +de dag  kyang go rims bzhin du dmigs pa dang  gzhi'i mtshan ma rnams las nyams par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170475#170488#TD4035E.TXT.r_8037;TD4035E.TXT.r_8038;TD4035E.TXT.r_8039;TD4035E.TXT.r_8040;TD4035E.TXT.r_8041;TD4035E.TXT.r_8042# kha cig ni gnyi ga'i mtshan ma las nyams par byed do // / +dga' ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /

column3: de la tshigs su bcad pa phyed 'og mas ci bstan zhe na / / +chos la khong khro bdag lta dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170487#170498#TD4035E.TXT.r_8040;TD4035E.TXT.r_8041;TD4035E.TXT.r_8042;TD4035E.TXT.r_8043;TD4035E.TXT.r_8044# bde ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin GANG ZHE NA / / +bsam gtan gsum pa'i 'o // /

column3: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs dang / / +sems  can don la ltos med pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170499#170506#TD4035E.TXT.r_8044;TD4035E.TXT.r_8045# tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang zhe na / /

column3: 'dod chen mu stegs nyan thos dang / / +rang byung rnams kyi sgrib rnam bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170507#170514#TD4035E.TXT.r_8045;TD4035E.TXT.r_8046;TD4035E.TXT.r_8047# tshe 'di la  bde bar gnas pa bzhi po rnams kyi sbyor ba'i lam la ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang yin pa'am / /

column3: dag rgyu lhag par mos pa la // / +sogs pa'i chos ni rnam bzhi nyid // / +mdor bsdu na sems can gyi tshogs na sems can gyi rnam pa 'di gsum yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170515#170529#TD4035E.TXT.r_8047;TD4035E.TXT.r_8048;TD4035E.TXT.r_8049;TD4035E.TXT.r_8050# yongs su ma byang ba rnams la ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang yin pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa'i don  du bsam gtan dang po la sbyor ba'i lam gsungs so // /

column3: srid pa  'dod pa dang  srid pa dang bral bar 'dod pa dang  de gnyis ka mngon par mi 'dod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170530#170537#TD4035E.TXT.r_8049;TD4035E.TXT.r_8050# ye shes mthong ba thob par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang zhe na / / +de la dge slong gis snang ba'i mtshan ma legs par rab tu shin tu bzung bar gyur ces bya ba mdo las byung ba bzhin du sbyar te / /

column3: de la srid pa 'dod pa ni rnam pa gnyis su rig par bya ste / / +thar pa'i lam dang zhe 'gras pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i rigs can gyi sems can 'khor ba nyid  'dod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170538#170546#TD4035E.TXT.r_8050;TD4035E.TXT.r_8051# de la dge slong gis snang ba'i mtshan ma legs par rab tu shin tu bzung bar gyur ces bya ba mdo las byung ba bzhin du sbyar te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170547#170556#TD4035E.TXT.r_8050;TD4035E.TXT.r_8051;TD4035E.TXT.r_8052;TD4035E.TXT.r_8053# de la dge slong gis snang ba'i mtshan ma legs par rab tu shin tu bzung bar gyur ces bya ba mdo las byung ba bzhin du sbyar te / / +de nyid ni lha'i mig  mngon par bsgrub pa'i sbyor pa'i lam las blta bar bya'o // /

column3: mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin pa gang dag yin pa dang  der nges par lhung ba chos 'di pa nyid de dag las kha cig theg pa chen po'i chos la sdang ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170554#170569#TD4035E.TXT.r_8051;TD4035E.TXT.r_8052;TD4035E.TXT.r_8053;TD4035E.TXT.r_8054;TD4035E.TXT.r_8055;TD4035E.TXT.r_8056# de nyid ni lha'i mig  mngon par bsgrub pa'i sbyor pa'i lam las blta bar bya'o // / +de la lha'i mig gis gzugs rnams la lta zhing / /
column5: 0.023#TD4039E.TXT.r#1818534#1818534#TD4039E.TXT.r_377;TD4039E.TXT.r_378;TD4039E.TXT.r_379# 'du byed rnams mngon par 'grub pa la ni rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis gdags pa'i skyes    bu'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur te / / +ming ni 'di zhes bya / / +rigs ni 'di zhes bya / /
column6: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2715194#2715194#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1716# de'i 'og tu 'du shes kyi phung pos ni ming ni 'di zhes bya rigs ni 'di zhes bya / /
column7: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#44925#44925#TD4036E.TXT.r_6849;TD4036E.TXT.r_6850# myong ba po gang yin pa'i byed pa po mi dmigs pa dang  ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang  skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar de dag la ming ni 'di zhes bya / / +rigs ni 'di zhes bya / /

column3: gang gi dbang du mdzad nas / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ni de dag gi ston pa ma yin la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170570#170578#TD4035E.TXT.r_8056;TD4035E.TXT.r_8057;TD4035E.TXT.r_8058# rigs ni 'di zhes bya zhes bya bar shes pa gang yin pa / / +lha'i ched du  gsungs pa'i mdo las rgya cher 'byung ba de ni ye shes so // /

column3: de dag  kyang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no // / +sh'a ri'i bu de dag ni mun pa bas kyang ches mun pa chen por 'gro ba mun pa chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes pa smra'o zhes gsungs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170577#170586#TD4035E.TXT.r_8057;TD4035E.TXT.r_8058;TD4035E.TXT.r_8059# lha'i ched du  gsungs pa'i mdo las rgya cher 'byung ba de ni ye shes so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170586#170594#TD4035E.TXT.r_8058;TD4035E.TXT.r_8059# shes rab rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang zhe na / / +sbyor ba'i lam la bden pa mngon par rtogs par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang     // /

column3: de la srid pa dang bral bar 'dod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +thabs ma yin pa la zhugs pa dang  thabs    la zhugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170595#170604#TD4035E.TXT.r_8059;TD4035E.TXT.r_8060;TD4035E.TXT.r_8061;TD4035E.TXT.r_8062# sbyor ba'i lam la bden pa mngon par rtogs par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang     // /

column3: de la thabs ma yin pa la zhugs pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +'di las phyi rol du gyur pa tsa ra ka dang  kun tu rgyu dang  gcer bu pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa du ma'i mu stegs pa mang po dang  de dang mthun par spyod pa chos 'di pa nyid dad pa yod  kyang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170603#170612#TD4035E.TXT.r_8061;TD4035E.TXT.r_8062;TD4035E.TXT.r_8063# zag pa zad par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gang zhe na / / +sbyor ba'i lam la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170613#170622#TD4035E.TXT.r_8063;TD4035E.TXT.r_8064;TD4035E.TXT.r_8065# 'phags pa'i shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / /

column3: nges par gzung dka' ba'i lta ba 'dzin pa ste / / +de dag kyang gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170623#170630#TD4035E.TXT.r_8064;TD4035E.TXT.r_8065;TD4035E.TXT.r_8066# bdag gi ting nge 'dzin 'di ni 'phags pa zang  zing med pa / / +phung po med pa zhes mdo las rgya cher 'byung ba bzhin no // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +don dam pa la mi mos pa gang zag tu lta ba ste / / +gang la bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid la mos pa med pa ni mu stegs pa dag dang khyad par med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang   mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong ba nyid du lta ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170631#170639#TD4035E.TXT.r_8065;TD4035E.TXT.r_8066;TD4035E.TXT.r_8067;TD4035E.TXT.r_8068# phung po med pa zhes mdo las rgya cher 'byung ba bzhin no // / +des shes pa lnga yongs su bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170640#170647#TD4035E.TXT.r_8068;TD4035E.TXT.r_8069;TD4035E.TXT.r_8070# ngo bo nyid dang  gang zag dang  yongs su dag pa dang  'bras bu dang  snyoms par 'jug pa dang  ldang ba'i mtshan ma rnams zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'di la stong pa nyid du lta ba gang dag de'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la yang stong pa nyid du lta par 'gyur ba gang gi dbang du mdzad nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170646#170661#TD4035E.TXT.r_8068;TD4035E.TXT.r_8069;TD4035E.TXT.r_8070;TD4035E.TXT.r_8071;TD4035E.TXT.r_8072# ngo bo nyid dang  gang zag dang  yongs su dag pa dang  'bras bu dang  snyoms par 'jug pa dang  ldang ba'i mtshan ma rnams zhes bya'o // / +de la  'phags pa zhes bya ba ni / / +dge ba'i 'phags pa dang  zag pa med pa'i 'phags pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2012803#2012803#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5099;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5100# bdag la sogs par sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +'phags pa rnams kyis spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'od srungs gang zag tu lta ba ri rab tsam ni bla'i / / +mngon pa'i nga rgyal can ston pa nyid du lta ba ni de  lta ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170662#170675#TD4035E.TXT.r_8072;TD4035E.TXT.r_8073;TD4035E.TXT.r_8074# phung po med pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i 'phags pa nyid du'o // /

column3: de la thabs la zhugs pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +nyan thos kyi theg pa dang mthun pa yang dag par nges pa nyid du zhugs pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang mthun pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170674#170687#TD4035E.TXT.r_8073;TD4035E.TXT.r_8074;TD4035E.TXT.r_8075;TD4035E.TXT.r_8076;TD4035E.TXT.r_8077# skyes bu ngan pa ma yin pas bsten pa zhes bya ba ni  'phags pa sangs rgyas rnams dang  de'i nyan thos rnams kyis bsten pa'o // / +shes pa rnams kyis bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid kyis so // /

column3: de gnyi ga mngon par mi 'dod pa ni / / +theg pa chen  po la yang dag par gnas pa mchog tu dbang po rnon po'i sems can te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170688#170696#TD4035E.TXT.r_8076;TD4035E.TXT.r_8077;TD4035E.TXT.r_8078;TD4035E.TXT.r_8079# dper na bsam gtan dang po ni gong du 'gro bar brtson  pa'i phyir / / +sngar zhi ba'o zhes bsngags la / /

column3: gang dag 'dod chen pa bzhin du 'khor ba yang mi 'dod cing / / +mu stegs pa la sogs pa ltar thabs ma yin pa la zhugs pa yang ma yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#170697#170708#TD4035E.TXT.r_8078;TD4035E.TXT.r_8079;TD4035E.TXT.r_8080# phyis ni rags pa'o zhes rnam par smad pa de lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +zhi ba zhes bya ba ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro // /
