column5: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#174650#174650#TD4035E.TXT.r_8784;TD4035E.TXT.r_8785# 'dod pa la nye bar spyod pa rnams kyi lta bu'o // / +rnam par gyeng ba'i phyir mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa yang yod de / /
column6: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464367#1464367#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7531;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7532;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7533# sa gong ma pa dang sa 'og ma pa dag phan tshun du zhes de skad du bya ba'i phyir te / / +sa gong ma pa yang sa 'og ma pa dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin la / / +sa 'og ma pa yang sa gong ma pa dag gi yin no // /
column7: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#810396#810396#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7289;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7290;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7291# lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pas de na kun shes pa'i dbang po yod do // / +rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i lam ni mi     // / +lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa'i phyir dang  de na tshor ba btang snyoms kho na yod pas btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang yod do // /

column3: ji ltar padma chu nang du // / +skyes  pa chu yis gos pa med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#174820#174833#TD4035E.TXT.r_8817;TD4035E.TXT.r_8818;TD4035E.TXT.r_8819;TD4035E.TXT.r_8820;TD4035E.TXT.r_8821# yongs su nyams pa'i phyir mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa yang yod de / / +'di lta ste / / +ting nge 'dzin thob pa las yongs su nyams pa'i lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#14220#14223#TD4036E.TXT.r_2111# ldang ba'i 'du shes gnyis pas ni sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i seng ge'i nyal stangs las lhag chad med par nyal bar byed do // /
column6: 0.016#TD4013E.TXT.r#614905#614905#TD4013E.TXT.r_619# de bas na mi dge ba'i  las byas par gyur par de dag las rnam par grol ba'i spyad par bya bar sbyar ro // /
column7: 0.016#TD4039E.TXT.r#1821921#1821921#TD4039E.TXT.r_861;TD4039E.TXT.r_862# bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i las ni sred pa'i 'bras bu'o // / +de la bde 'gror 'gro ba'i las kyis ni sred pas byis pa kun tu sbyong bar byed de / /
column8: 0.016#TD4039E.TXT.r#1861636#1861636#TD4039E.TXT.r_5400;TD4039E.TXT.r_5401# khyim  pa'i phyogs dang rab tu byung ba'i phyogs las 'byung bar rig par bya'o // / +de la las dang srid pa'i kun nas nyon mongs par mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni sems las byung ba zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.017#TD4066E.TXT.r#2107531#2107531#TD4066E.TXT.r_780# 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi rtag pa dang chad par smra ba rnams kyi dang  kha cig rtag pa rnams kyi yang log bar bsam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'o // /
column10: 0.019#TD4091E.TXT.r#705023#705023#TD4091E.TXT.r_1950;TD4091E.TXT.r_1951;TD4091E.TXT.r_1952# rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'am / / +rgyas pa las byung ba'am / / +rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'am / /
column11: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#644002#644002#TD4069E.TXT.r_3010;TD4069E.TXT.r_3011# nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i las spangs pa'i phyir  te ; / +nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i las ni lus dang ngag gis nyes par spyad pa ste / /
column12: 0.019#TD4070E.TXT.r#2802359#2802360#TD4070E.TXT.r_41;TD4070E.TXT.r_42# de ni sngon med pa'i las bstsags pa'i phyir gang ba'o // / +sngon byas pa'i las yongs su spyad pas zad pa'i phyir zag pa'o // /
column13: 0.019#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2005170#2005170#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3979# yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las mang ba'i phyir dang  'phen par byed pa'i  las 'dra ba'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#187027#187027#TD4035E.TXT.r_10608;TD4035E.TXT.r_10609;TD4035E.TXT.r_10610# snams su bya ba'i bzo dang  nyo tshong gi bzo dang  rgyal po'i zham 'bring bya ba'i bzo dang  yi ge dang  rtsis dang  shod dgod pa dang   grangs dang  lag rtsis kyi bzo dang  ltas su blta ba'i bzo dang  blo gros kyi bzo dang  'bur gyi bzo dang  bskyed pa'i bzo dang  snams su bya ba'i bzo dang  sbyor ba'i bzo dang  gyos su bya ba'i bzo dang  rol mo'i bzo'o // / +rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +thos pa las byung ba'i sa rdzogs so //// /
column15: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#175090#175092#TD4035E.TXT.r_8865;TD4035E.TXT.r_8866# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las sems yod pa'i sa dang  sems med pa'i sa rdzogs so //// /
column16: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1134207#1134209#TD4047E.TXT.r_1877;TD4047E.TXT.r_1878# 'phen pa chen po  nyid dang  gnas pa chen po nyid do // / +byang chub sems dpa' bde 'gror skyes par gyur pa'i tshe ring bar 'phen pa'i las kyis 'phangs pa'i tshe ni ring ba nyid dang ldan par 'gyur gyi thung bar mi 'gyur te / /
column17: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790004#2790004#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12361# dad pa mngon par rtogs pa ni dkon mchog rnams la bsam pa dag pa nas mos pa mi gyo ba skyed pa'i las can dang  yang dag par rtogs pas rnam par byang bar byed pa'i las can dang  de dag las  la la bde 'gror 'gro bar byed pa'i las can yin no // /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548645#548645#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12800;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12801# las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pas kyang nyon mongs par 'gyur la / / +skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kyang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur bas 'khor ba na yun ring por rgyug cing / /
column19: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2595081#2595081#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7437# 'di ni chung ngu zin kyang thar pa 'dod pa'i stobs skyed pa las thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i 'phen par 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1222783#1222783#TD4047E.TXT.r_14401;TD4047E.TXT.r_14402# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas tha ma las sa'i le'u ste gsum pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +de ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i  sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir / /
column21: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#155050#155051#TD4035E.TXT.r_5238;TD4035E.TXT.r_5239;TD4035E.TXT.r_5240# bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang  spong ba'i sdom pas bsdus pa'am / / +zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa gang yin pa'o // / +sdom pa ma yin pas bsdus pa'i las ni / /
column22: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1020139#1020139#TD4054E.TXT.r_4861;TD4054E.TXT.r_4862# so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa dang   bsam gtan gyi sdom pas bsdus pa dang  zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa'o // / +so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i las gang / /
column23: 0.023#TD4019E.TXT.r#2465133#2465133#TD4019E.TXT.r_7644# 'ga' zhig ni skye ba gzhan du rang gi sems rgyud sdug bsngal dang 'brel pas 'jigs nas de las ldog pa'i don du zag pa dang bcas pa'i las dge ba'am / /
column24: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2746577#2746577#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6382# gal te gzhan la zhe sdang bas gzhan gyi chung ma la log par bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhan dag spad nas de dag kyang de'i tshig gis 'dod pa de dag la log par gyem par byed pa yang zhe sdang las  byung ba'i 'dod pa la log par gyem pa dang 'dra ba'am / /
column25: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#182656#182656#TD4035E.TXT.r_9965;TD4035E.TXT.r_9966# sangs rgyas kyi bka'i shes bya'i gnas bcu bcu pa rdzogs so //// / +sangs rgyas kyi bka'i shes bya'i gnas rdzogs so //// /
column26: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1926426#1926427#TD4032E.TXT.r_1062# mngon du'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang gzhan gyis yongs su dri bar bya ba'i skabs su bdag nyid kyis las byas pa'i rnam par smin pas yang srid par 'byin par mngon par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /
column27: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#155443#155443#TD4035E.TXT.r_5305;TD4035E.TXT.r_5306# las zad par 'gyur ba ni las gsum char yang spong ba'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir / / +'jig rten las 'das pa'i zag pa med pa'i las gang yin pa'o // /
column28: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994381#1994381#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2261;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2262# sa rnams sred pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro // / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i rdzogs par byed pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir gyo ba yin no // /
column29: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2001129#2001129#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3334# mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos drangs pa'i log par lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i las kun de 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kho na la bstan pas bstan bcos  dang 'gal ba med do // /
column30: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#208234#208234#TD4035E.TXT.r_14455;TD4035E.TXT.r_14456;TD4035E.TXT.r_14457# tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa brtsams pas ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims  las tshul khrims nyams pa dang  de bzhin du cho ga las cho ga nyams pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shes pa rnams kyis mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  dogs pa las gleng ba'am / / +dran par byed pa'am / / +rjes su slob par byed pa'i tshig bzod pa'o // /
column31: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2883409#2883409#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_2151# byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pas sems can la phan btags na  byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar dge ba byed du bcug pa de bzhin du sems can dge ba byed pas ni sbyin pa'i las ni sems can snod du gyur par byed pa'o // /
column32: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#154989#154989#TD4035E.TXT.r_5221;TD4035E.TXT.r_5222;TD4035E.TXT.r_5223# myong bar 'gyur ba nges pa'i las ni / / +bsams bzhin du byas pa dang  bsags pa  gang yin pa'o // / +myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa'i las ni / /
column33: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2708368#2708368#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_840# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig  gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag kyang rig pa'i gnas lnga po nang gi rig pa dang  gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang  sgra'i rig pa dang  gso ba'i rig pa dang  'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas kyi rig pa dag las brtsams te yongs su brtags pa yin par  rig par bya'o // /
column34: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#152727#152728#TD4035E.TXT.r_4857;TD4035E.TXT.r_4858;TD4035E.TXT.r_4859# brda phrad par byed pas na rnam par rig pa'o // / +chos dang ldan pas na mnyan par 'os pa'o // / +zang zing med pa'i sems las byung bas na mi gnas pa'o // /
column35: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#58484#58484#TD4036E.TXT.r_8681;TD4036E.TXT.r_8683;TD4036E.TXT.r_8684;TD4036E.TXT.r_8685# 'di na des bdag nyid dam gzhan dag gi lus sngon brgyugs pa'am / / +mchongs pa'am / / +'dzegs pa'am / / +las sna tshogs rings par byas pas yongs su ngal ba dang lus yongs su dung bar mthong la / /
column36: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1218475#1218475#TD4047E.TXT.r_13782# mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes rnam par phye ba tshad med pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i las rnams mngon par bsgrub par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa yin no // /
column37: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1472190#1472190#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8449;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8450# dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ni  dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu char gyi yang 'thob pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dag mnyam du 'thob par 'gyur la / / +de dag las dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'das pa'i thob pa gang dag yin pa de ni 'bras bu 'byin par byed kyi bzung zin pa'i     // /
column38: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374186#2374186#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7529# 'di ltar thos pa las byung  ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsams pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems so // /
column39: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1465969#1465969#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7707# des gzhom par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i thob pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir dang  rgyus shin tu rgyas par byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column40: 0.027#TD4010E.TXT.r#2286866#2286866#TD4010E.TXT.r_7190;TD4010E.TXT.r_7191# mthu chen po dang ldan  pa'i lha rnams kyis dam pa'i chos thos pa las byung ba'i dga' ba rab kyi mthar thug par gyur pa las byung bas kun du 'khor bar gyur pa las 'khrugs pa'o // / +brtan pa'i 'jig rten yang thams cad las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i chos nyid kyi dbang por gyur ba nyid du bstan  pa dang ; /
column41: 0.027#TD4032E.TXT.r#1955525#1955525#TD4032E.TXT.r_5530;TD4032E.TXT.r_5531# bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i ched du zhugs pa dang  yid la byed pa'i gyeng ba kun du 'byung ba'i phyir theg pa chen po  yid la byed pa las gyeng bar byed pas na / / +dman pa'i sems ni yid la byed pa'i gyeng ba zhes bya'o // /
column42: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1401979#1401979#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_252;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_253# de las ni thos pa las byung ba'o thos pa las byung ba las ni bsams pa las byung ba'o // / +bsams pa las byung ba las ni bsgoms pa las byung ba zag pa dang bcas pa'o // /
column43: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#703894#703894#TD4091E.TXT.r_1704# de dag las so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang  'phags pa ma yin pas thob pa so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i thob pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'o // /

column3: de bzhin 'di ni 'jig rten du // / +skyes kyang 'jig rten chos mi gos // / +bya ba sgrub la rtag tu blo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#174834#174842#TD4035E.TXT.r_8820;TD4035E.TXT.r_8821;TD4035E.TXT.r_8822;TD4035E.TXT.r_8823;TD4035E.TXT.r_8824# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i  sa las mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa rdzogs so //// / +sems yod pa dang sems med pa'i sa gang zhe na / /

column3: me bzhin du ni 'bar ba dang / / +zhi ba'i bsam gtan snyoms 'jug la // / +rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#174841#174850#TD4035E.TXT.r_8822;TD4035E.TXT.r_8823;TD4035E.TXT.r_8824# rnam pa de gnyis la yang / / +rnam pa lnga yod par rig par bya ste / / +sar gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  sems 'khrul pa dang  ma 'khrul ba rnam  par gzhag pa dang  'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang  gnas skabs rnam par gzhag pa dang  don dam pa rnam par gzhag pa'o // /

column3: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang    dang ni // / +rnam rtog thams cad bral ba'i phyir // / +de ni lus can smin pa yi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#174848#174860#TD4035E.TXT.r_8824;TD4035E.TXT.r_8825# sar gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  sems 'khrul pa dang  ma 'khrul ba rnam  par gzhag pa dang  'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang  gnas skabs rnam par gzhag pa dang  don dam pa rnam par gzhag pa'o // /

column3: don du 'bad pa byed ma yin // / +bstan dang gzugs sku dag dang ni // / +spyod dang spyod lam gyis kyang rung // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162406#162409#TD4035E.TXT.r_6548;TD4035E.TXT.r_6549# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang  rtog pa med  la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa ste lnga pa rdzogs so //// /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162544#162548#TD4035E.TXT.r_6577;TD4035E.TXT.r_6578# yang ting nge 'dzin ni gsum ste / / +rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#174859#174870#TD4035E.TXT.r_8824;TD4035E.TXT.r_8825;TD4035E.TXT.r_8826# sar gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  sems 'khrul pa dang  ma 'khrul ba rnam  par gzhag pa dang  'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang  gnas skabs rnam par gzhag pa dang  don dam pa rnam par gzhag pa'o // / +de la sar gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa ni / /
column7: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1847035#1847038#TD4039E.TXT.r_3850;TD4039E.TXT.r_3851# de la snyoms par 'jug pa la brten pa'i bye brag ni 'di lta ste / / +rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang  bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dang  dga' ba dang ldan pa dang  bde ba dang ldan pa dang  btang snyoms dang ldan pa dang  nyams par 'gyur ba dang  gnas pa dang  khyad par du 'gro ba dang  nges    par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ste / /
column8: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#296721#296723#TD4026E.TXT.r_3821# rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dang  zhi gnas yid la byed pa dang  lhag mthong yid la byed pa dang  zung du 'brel pa yid la byed pa dang  rab tu  'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan yid la byed pa dang  zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan yid la byed pa dang  btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan yid la byed pa dang  rtag tu sbyor ba yid la byed pa dang  gus par bya ba yid la byed pa'o // /
column9: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#300524#300526#TD4026E.TXT.r_4540;TD4026E.TXT.r_4541# de rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang bcas shing / / +dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'o // /

column5: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#174828#174830#TD4035E.TXT.r_8819;TD4035E.TXT.r_8820;TD4035E.TXT.r_8821# ting nge 'dzin thob pa las yongs su nyams pa'i lta bu'o // / +rnal 'byor spyod pa'i  sa las mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa rdzogs so //// /
column6: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#5382#5382#TD4036E.TXT.r_695;TD4036E.TXT.r_696# nyan thos kyis las 'jug pa'i sa rdzogs so //// / +de la nges par 'byung ba'i sa gang zhe na / /

column3: 'jig med chos kyang ma byas rang bzhin phyir // / +'dis ci bstan zhe na / /

column3: skye ba med cing 'chi ba med // / +gnod med rga ba med pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175105#175113#TD4035E.TXT.r_8868;TD4035E.TXT.r_8869;TD4035E.TXT.r_8870# rigs pa'i gnas lnga gang yin pa de dag ming dang tshig dang / / +yi ge las blo sngon du btang ste / /
column5: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344018#2344018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3861# 'di lta ste rig pa'i gnas lnga gang yin pa de dag ming dang tshig dang yi ge tshad med pa'i bye brag las blo sngon du btang ste / / +nyan  pa dang  'dzin pa dang  'chang ba dang  kha ton byed pa dang  rjes su dran pa dang  phyin ci ma log par shes pa'o zhes 'byung bas go rims bzhin du mdo 'di las rnam pa lnga gsungs pa dang sbyar te / /

column3: de ni rtag dang brtan phyir dang / / +zhi ba'i phyir dang gyung drung phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175112#175128#TD4035E.TXT.r_8869;TD4035E.TXT.r_8870;TD4035E.TXT.r_8871# yi ge las blo sngon du btang ste / / +nyan pa dang  'dzin pa dang  'chang ba dang  kha ton byed pa dang  rjes su dran pa dang  ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs la brten pa'i don rtogs pa 'di ni thos pa las byung ba'i sa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2763659#2763659#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8891# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyi don ni don gzhan dang 'brel pa yin te / /
column6: 0.021#TD4097E.TXT.r#2226227#2226227#TD4097E.TXT.r_3220;TD4097E.TXT.r_3221# sgra ni mang po'i don te / / +des na ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.022#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128582#2128584#TD4029E.TXT.r_1113;TD4029E.TXT.r_1114# phyin ci ma log pa'i don gyis rtag tu smin par byed pa ni rtag tu smin par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni ming gi tshogs  dang ; / +tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyi don phyin ci ma log par ston pa ste / /
column8: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2955858#2955858#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12091# yang na sa re re'i don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams ji ltar bshad pa / /
column9: 0.024#TD4018E.TXT.r#3055682#3055682#TD4018E.TXT.r_6661# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams ni spyir btags pa'i don la sgro btags te 'jug pa'i phyir bsam pa med cing / /
column10: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#142726#142726#TD4035E.TXT.r_3080# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs la brten pa'i     // /
column11: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#376846#376846#TD4043E.TXT.r_2802# ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i  tshogs la brten pa'i don ni dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba la tshogs la brten pa'i don zhes bya ba ni de dag gis brjod par bya ba'o // /
column12: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#923500#923500#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4214;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4215# gang 'das pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs kyi sgo nas chos phyin ci ma log par bshad pa la / / +sems can gyi don du ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi  tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyi sgo nas chos de dag gi don rtag tu phyin ci ma log par 'chad pa ni rtag tu smin byed ces bya'o // /

column3: de ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyi // / +lus kyi skye med rtag pa'i phyir // /
bsam gyis mi khyab bsgyur ba yi // / +'chi 'pho brtan  phyir de mi 'chi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175129#175137#TD4035E.TXT.r_8870;TD4035E.TXT.r_8871;TD4035E.TXT.r_8872# nyan pa dang  'dzin pa dang  'chang ba dang  kha ton byed pa dang  rjes su dran pa dang  ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs la brten pa'i don rtogs pa 'di ni thos pa las byung ba'i sa zhes bya'o // / +rig  pa'i gnas lnga gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste nang gi rig pa dang  gso ba rig pa dang  gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang  sgra'i rig pa dang  bzo'i las kyi gnas kyi rig pa'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#961810#961811#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9274;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9275# nang rig pa dang  rgyu rig pa dang  sgra rig pa dang  gso ba rig pa dang  bzo'i las kyi gnas rig pa'o // / +de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsud rab yan lag bcu gnyis  la mkhas pa ni nang rig pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: bag chags phra mo'i nad rnams kyis // / +gnod med zhi ba nyid kyi phyir // / +zag med mngon par 'dus byas kyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175135#175153#TD4035E.TXT.r_8872;TD4035E.TXT.r_8873;TD4035E.TXT.r_8874;TD4035E.TXT.r_8875# 'di lta ste nang gi rig pa dang  gso ba rig pa dang  gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang  sgra'i rig pa dang  bzo'i las kyi gnas kyi rig pa'o // /

column3: gyung drung phyir na rga ba med // / +shin tu dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba rang gi rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis la rnam par gnas pa de  bzhin gshegs pa'i khams de ni sngon gyi mtha' nye bar bzung nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175154#175166#TD4035E.TXT.r_8875;TD4035E.TXT.r_8876;TD4035E.TXT.r_8877# gzhi gdags pa rnam par  gzhag pa dang  ming rab tu dbye ba gdags PA RNAM PAR GZHAG PA dang  bstan pa'i don bsdu ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi bka'i shes bya'i gnas so // /

column3: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis skye ba yang ma yin te / / +rtag pa'i phyir ro // / +phyi ma'i mtha' nye bar bzung nas bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su bsgyur ba'i 'chi 'pho bas 'chi ba ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175165#175179#TD4035E.TXT.r_8876;TD4035E.TXT.r_8877;TD4035E.TXT.r_8878;TD4035E.TXT.r_8879;TD4035E.TXT.r_8880# de la gzhi gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na / / +gzhi gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' bsdus pa yin te / /
column5: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2720769#2720772#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2570# dus kyi gzhi dang  'jig rten gnas pa'i gzhi dang  'pho ba'i gzhi dang  mchog gi gzhi dang  de kho na'i gzhi dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi dang rnam    par byang pa'i gzhi dang  mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi gzhi'o // /

column3: brten pa'i    phyir ro // / +sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' nye bar bzung nas / / +ma rig pa'i bag chags kyis yongs su 'dzin pas gnod pa yang ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175178#175188#TD4035E.TXT.r_8879;TD4035E.TXT.r_8880;TD4035E.TXT.r_8881# mdo sde'i gzhi dang  'dul ba'i gzhi dang  ma mo'i gzhi ste / / +gsum po 'di dag gi rnam par dbye ba rgyas pa ni gzhi bsdu ba las 'byung ngo // /

column3: zhi ba'i phyir ro // / +de ltar don med pas ma phog pa gang yin pa de ni gyung drung nyid kyi phyir zag pa med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su smin  par rga ba yang ma yin na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175187#175202#TD4035E.TXT.r_8880;TD4035E.TXT.r_8881;TD4035E.TXT.r_8882;TD4035E.TXT.r_8883;TD4035E.TXT.r_8884;TD4035E.TXT.r_8885;TD4035E.TXT.r_8886;TD4035E.TXT.r_8887# gsum po 'di dag gi rnam par dbye ba rgyas pa ni gzhi bsdu ba las 'byung ngo // / +ming rab tu dbye ba gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na / /

column3: de la tshig gnyis de bzhin gnyis // / +gnyis dang gnyis kyis go rims bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175203#175218#TD4035E.TXT.r_8885;TD4035E.TXT.r_8886;TD4035E.TXT.r_8887;TD4035E.TXT.r_8888;TD4035E.TXT.r_8889;TD4035E.TXT.r_8890;TD4035E.TXT.r_8891;TD4035E.TXT.r_8892;TD4035E.TXT.r_8893# rab zhi rang bzhin rigs pa dang / / +brda dang mngon par rtogs pa'o // / +gnas gang zhe na / /

column3: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la ni // / +rtag pa la sogs don shes bya // / +de la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la rtag pa dang  brtan pa dang  zhi ba dang  gyung  drung gi tshig 'di rnams las go rims ji lta ba bzhin tshig re re'i don bstan pa dang  bshad pa'i tshig gnyis gnyis rnam par dbye ba ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175219#175226#TD4035E.TXT.r_8893;TD4035E.TXT.r_8894;TD4035E.TXT.r_8895# 'dod pa'i khams dang  gzugs    kyi khams dang  gzugs med pa'i khams dang  gzhan yang khams gsum ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175227#175236#TD4035E.TXT.r_8894;TD4035E.TXT.r_8895;TD4035E.TXT.r_8896# stong chung ngu dang  stong gnyis pa bar ma dang  stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang  phyogs bzhi ste / / +khyim pa'i phyogs dang  rab tu byung ba'i phyogs dang  dge bsnyen gyi  phyogs dang  mi ma yin pa'i phyogs dang  tshor ba gsum ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175237#175246#TD4035E.TXT.r_8895;TD4035E.TXT.r_8896;TD4035E.TXT.r_8897;TD4035E.TXT.r_8898# khyim pa'i phyogs dang  rab tu byung ba'i phyogs dang  dge bsnyen gyi  phyogs dang  mi ma yin pa'i phyogs dang  tshor ba gsum ste / / +bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa dang dus gsum ste / /
column7: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1786531#1786531#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10870;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10871# tshe dang ldan pa dag tshor ba ni gsum po 'di dag ste / / +bde ba dang  sdug bsngal dang  bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#659238#659238#TD4069E.TXT.r_5156;TD4069E.TXT.r_5157;TD4069E.TXT.r_5158# dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni tshor ba yin te / / +gsum po gang dag ce na / / +bde ba dang  sdug bsngal dang  bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal  yang ma yin pa'o // /

column3: mi zad yon tan dang ldan phyir // / +gzhan 'gyur med bdag rtag pa'i don // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175245#175255#TD4035E.TXT.r_8896;TD4035E.TXT.r_8897;TD4035E.TXT.r_8898;TD4035E.TXT.r_8899# bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa dang dus gsum ste / / +'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba dang  dkon mchog gsum ste / / +sangs  rgyas dkon mchog dang  chos dkon mchog dang  dge 'dun dkon mchog dang  chos gsum ste / /
column5: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2781533#2781533#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11213# rku bar 'dod pa dang  sangs  rgyas dkon mchog la ji lta ba bzhin du chos dkon mchog dang  dge 'dun dkon mchog la yang de bzhin pa dang  tshul khrims nyams pa'i phyogs sam / /
column6: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2286620#2286620#TD4010E.TXT.r_7153;TD4010E.TXT.r_7154# rin chen 'od zer rgya che    gang ; / / +zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang  chos dkon mchog dang  dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dpag tu med pa'i spyod pa rgya che ba dang  bstan pa rgya che ba ni rgya che ba zhes brjod do // /

column3: mtha' yi mu dang mtshungs  pa'i phyir // / +skyabs kyi bdag nyid brtan pa'i don // / +rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175256#175266#TD4035E.TXT.r_8898;TD4035E.TXT.r_8899;TD4035E.TXT.r_8900# sangs  rgyas dkon mchog dang  chos dkon mchog dang  dge 'dun dkon mchog dang  chos gsum ste / / +dge ba dang  mi dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum ste / /
column5: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876263#1876264#TD4039E.TXT.r_7136# 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yang srid par skye ba'i kun nas nyon    mongs pa ste / /
column6: 0.016#TD4039E.TXT.r#1831428#1831429#TD4039E.TXT.r_2037# gzhan yang nyes par bshad pa'i chos can ni de ltar log par zhugs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas nyon mongs shing yang srid par skye ba mngon par 'grub par byed de / /
column7: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1000522#1000522#TD4054E.TXT.r_1524;TD4054E.TXT.r_1525# gang du kun nas nyon  mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'am / / +gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'am / /
column8: 0.019#TD4032E.TXT.r#1928511#1928511#TD4032E.TXT.r_1402;TD4032E.TXT.r_1403# stong pa nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par dag pa'o zhes rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +kun nas nyon    mongs rnam par dang / /
column9: 0.019#TD4054E.TXT.r#1045091#1045091#TD4054E.TXT.r_8546;TD4054E.TXT.r_8547# gus par nyan pa la sogs pa la rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir / / +kun nas nyon mongs la can ma yin pas tshogs yongs su sdud do // /
column10: 0.019#TD4019E.TXT.r#2456825#2456825#TD4019E.TXT.r_6551# 'dis kyang da ltar gyi nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon  mongs pa dang  des kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la brten nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba mngon par 'grub cing de dag tu yang snga ma bzhin du nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang zhing / /
column11: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1831014#1831015#TD4039E.TXT.r_1985;TD4039E.TXT.r_1986;TD4039E.TXT.r_1987# de las bzlog pa thams cad la ni yang srid par skye ba'i myu gu yod par rig par bya'o // / +kun nas nyon mongs pa ni gnyis te / / +lta ba'i kun nas nyon mongs  pa dang  de ma yin pa'i nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4010E.TXT.r#2256153#2256153#TD4010E.TXT.r_3274;TD4010E.TXT.r_3275# dbyangs brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung ni bsam du mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes byas nas so // / +kun nas nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni kun nas nyon mongs bsgrub par byed  pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do // /
column13: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#201018#201020#TD4035E.TXT.r_13263# rjes su dran pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rang  dbang med pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yul gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yongs su gdung ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  bde 'gro dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  ngan 'gro dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  lta ba'i kun nas nyon mongs  pa'o // /

column3: gnyis med chos nyid zhi ba'i don // / +ma bcos yon tan nyid phyir ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175267#175274#TD4035E.TXT.r_8900;TD4035E.TXT.r_8901# nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  las kyi kun nas nyon  mongs pa dang  skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ste / /

column3: 'jig med don ni gyung drung nyid // / +ji skad du / / +sh'a ri'i bu mi zad pa'i chos nyid kyis na gzhan du mi 'gyur  ba'i chos kyi sku 'di ni rtag pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175275#175282#TD4035E.TXT.r_8901;TD4035E.TXT.r_8902;TD4035E.TXT.r_8903# sdug bsngal ba dang  kun 'byung ba dang  'gog pa dang  lam dang  mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175283#175290#TD4035E.TXT.r_8902;TD4035E.TXT.r_8903;TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# bsam gtan dang po nas / / +'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa'i bar dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te / /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257749#257749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5450# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis dmigs par bya ba'i yul gang yin pa ste / /
column7: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#953543#953544#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8130# bsgrub  par bya ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun dang  bshad par bya ba'i chos gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis dang 'thob par bya ba'i chos mngal du 'jug pa la sogs pa ste / /
column8: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267685#267685#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6764# yul la dmigs pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa dmigs pa'i bdag nyid dang bcas pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun len par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid do // /

column3: sh'a ri'i bu phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mtshungs pa nyid kyis bstan pa'i skyabs su gyur pa'i chos kyi sku 'di ni brtan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520216#520220#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ngas skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang   zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag thams cad la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521334#521338#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328111#2328115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2079# 'phags pa'i bden pa la ji lta ba bzhin du dran ba nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang     rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams la yang de bzhin du rgya cher bshad par bgyi lags so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pas khong  du chud par bstan pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175291#175301#TD4035E.TXT.r_8903;TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa'i bar dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / /
column8: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790235#2790240#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12376# mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi rab tu dbye bas rnam pa du ma yod do // /
column9: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093599#3093602#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column10: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108952#3108953#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2426;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2427# rab 'byor phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam  pa yin par yongs su bstan cing rab 'byor skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  khams rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang      // / +dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni / /
column11: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109025#3109027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2437# yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i  spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi / /
column12: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113022#3113027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3055# bden pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa    rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyi yan lag re re la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi lags so // /
column13: 0.009#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520401#520405#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column14: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#187286#187290#TD4035E.TXT.r_10654# mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa la de de dang 'dra ba dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag par spong ba  rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub thob par bya ba la bya ba bsgrub pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis spyi'i mtshan nyid rnams  so // /
column15: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#18377#18381#TD4036E.TXT.r_2669;TD4036E.TXT.r_2670# bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de dag tu gdul ba de dang de dag dang gdul ba'i spyod pa rnams las brtsams  nas phung po dang ldan pa'i gtam dang  skye mched dang ldan pa dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang      // / +yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang ldan pa dang  mi sdug pa dang  dbugs rngub pa dang  dbugs 'byung ba dang  bslab pa dang / /
column16: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1815504#1815507#TD4039E.TXT.r_20# de dang der 'dul ba la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang  de'i 'og tu yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa sbyar bar ci rigs par go  rims su phab ste gtam du sbyar ba dang  de bzhin du zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang tshor ba dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang  de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa  dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang  dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran pa dang  bslab pa rnams dang  shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang  'khor brgyad kyi dbang du byas nas 'khor dang ldan pa'o // /
column17: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1880486#1880490#TD4039E.TXT.r_7676;TD4039E.TXT.r_7677# byed pas sgo drug nas dge ba la brten te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams so // /
column18: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110726#3110726#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2685# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang bka' stsal / /
column19: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543707#543707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  stsal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /
column20: 0.027#TD4031E.TXT.r#2960322#2960322#TD4031E.TXT.r_229# ngo tsha'i rnam par dbye ba dang  brtan pa dang  mi skyo ba dang  bstan bcos shes pa dang  'jig rten shes pa dang  rton pa dang  so  so yang dag par rig pa dang  tshogs gnyis dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  thabs la  mkhas pa dang  gzungs dang  smon lam dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  chos kyi sdom dang  de'i skad cig ma dang  bdag med pa dang  ngo tsha la sogs pa'i las mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: sh'a ri'i bu rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sku 'di ni zhi ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175302#175310#TD4035E.TXT.r_8904;TD4035E.TXT.r_8905# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / / +rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa nyid dang  yon tan khyad par can mang po la 'di lta ste / /
column5: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#38875#38879#TD4036E.TXT.r_5822;TD4036E.TXT.r_5823# dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / / +rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa nyid do // /
column6: 0.013#TD4067E.TXT.r#1090480#1090483#TD4067E.TXT.r_642# rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang   dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o // /
column7: 0.016#TD4088E.TXT.r#2837655#2837655#TD4088E.TXT.r_2602;TD4088E.TXT.r_2603# rgyu dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang bral ba'i 'bras bu'o // / +zag pa med pa'i las kyi zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu yod dam zhe na / /
column8: 0.016#TD4032E.TXT.r#1952515#1952518#TD4032E.TXT.r_5068;TD4032E.TXT.r_5069# bstan pa ni phyi ma phyi ma 'bras bu la sogs pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni phyi ma phyi ma 'bras bu dang  thog ma'i 'bras bu dang  goms par byas pa'i 'bras bu dang  rdzogs pa'i  'bras bu'o // /
column9: 0.020#TD4098E.TXT.r#1396359#1396359#TD4098E.TXT.r_1047;TD4098E.TXT.r_1048# 'di ni 'bras bu'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhir gzhag ste // / +rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  dgra bcom ba'i 'bras bu'o // /
column10: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#153940#153941#TD4035E.TXT.r_5062# lan mang du byas pa de'i dbang gis phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyi 'bras bu mthu chung ba dang  'bras bu mi smin pa dang  'bras bu 'drul ba dang  'bras bu gzhan du 'gyur ba dang  'bras bu  shin te mar 'gyur ba dang  'bras bu mi zhim pa dang  'bras bu rtag tu ma yin pa dang  'bras bu chung ba dang  'bras bu gnod par 'gyur ba dang  'bras bu med par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.020#TD4061E.TXT.r#1537852#1537852#TD4061E.TXT.r_3420# 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos par bya ba dang  smyon pas dran pa thob par bya ba dang  gcer bu rnams gos thob par bya ba dang  sems can bkres pa rnams 'grangs par bya ba dang  skom pa rnams ngom par bya ba dang  ngan song du skyes pa rnams ngan song  dag nas thar bar bya zhing mi'i lus thob par bya ba dang  tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par bya ba dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i  phung po la dgod pa dang  bden pa ma mthong ba rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod pa dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  dgra bcom pa nyid dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i  byang chub la dgod par bya na / /
column12: 0.022#TD4088E.TXT.r#2828821#2828826#TD4088E.TXT.r_849# mi sdug pa'i 'bras  bu dang  mi gces pa'i 'bras bu dang  mi dga' ba'i 'bras bu dang  yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  yid du mi 'thad pa'i 'bras bu dang  mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'o // /
column13: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1434464#1434464#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4020;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4021# yang tha ma dag kyang gang yin zhe na rgyun du zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dbyug pa la tha ma gnyis yod pa de bzhin du sbrengs te 'dug pa rnams las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ni tha  ma yin no // / +lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni bar ma dag yin no // /
column14: 0.028#TD4017E.TXT.r#2655744#2655744#TD4017E.TXT.r_395;TD4017E.TXT.r_396;TD4017E.TXT.r_397# bsdu ba'i don ni gong du smos pa'i tshig bco lnga po yon tan bcu ra bsdu bar bya ste / / +bstan du yod pa'i 'bras  bu dang ; / +bstan du med pa'i 'bras bu ste / /
column15: 0.029#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1893494#1893494#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1212;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1213# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge  sbyong gi 'bras bu dang  dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dge sbyong gi 'bras bu'o // / +rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dge sbyong gi 'bras bu gang zhe na / /

column3: sh'a ri'i bu ma bcos pa'i chos nyid  kyis 'jig pa med pa'i chos kyi sku 'di ni gyung drung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#259374#259379#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5669;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5670# yon tan mngon du byas pa thob pa ni 'di lta ste / / +tshad med pa dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  mngon par  shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175309#175323#TD4035E.TXT.r_8905;TD4035E.TXT.r_8906# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa nyid dang  yon tan khyad par can mang po la 'di lta ste / /
column6: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349508#1349509#TD4037E.TXT.r_4549# de la byang  chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan stobs bcu'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med pa sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa dang  ting nge 'dzin gang dag nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ming yang mi shes na snyoms  par 'jug par lta ga la 'gyur ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis non pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon gnas shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan nyan thos dang     thun mong pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan sgrub pa'i bsam gtan yin par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393676#2393677#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9815# zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched yongs su dag pas ni nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par sgrub par byed do // /
column8: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2755514#2755515#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7736# zad par rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched kyis ni nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub par byed do // /

column3: shin tu rnam par dag pa mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rnam par dag pa'i gnas skabs 'di nyid la dbye ba med pa'i don las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175322#175335#TD4035E.TXT.r_8906;TD4035E.TXT.r_8907;TD4035E.TXT.r_8908;TD4035E.TXT.r_8909# tshad med pa rnams dang  rnam par thar pa dang   zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  mngon par shes pa drug dang  gzhan yang rgya che ba'i dbang du byas nas / /
column5: 0.025#TD4048E.TXT.r#1696487#1696487#TD4048E.TXT.r_1889# shin tu yongs su dag pa'i tshad med pa bzhin dang  rnam par thar pa brgyad dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang  zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang   mngon par shes pa drug dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang  rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi dang  stobs bcu dang  mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang  bsrung ba med pa gsum dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang  bag chags  yang dag par bcom pa dang  bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid dang  thugs rje chen po dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang  rnam pa'i mchog thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang  pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan no // /

column10: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#667731#667731#TD4069E.TXT.r_6321;TD4069E.TXT.r_6322# de'i dngos po ni skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid do // / +don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa de ni don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa nyid do // /

column3: de'i rigs rang bzhin gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa thob  pa'i don ni gang gi dbang du mdzad nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175435#175445#TD4035E.TXT.r_8919;TD4035E.TXT.r_8920# ngo bo nyid dang  mthu dang  thabs dang  'jug pa dang   ldog pa dang  theg pa chen po rnam pa lnga ste / /

column3: brgyud nas 'ongs pa'i thog ma med pa'i chos nyid thob pa de ni skye mched drug gi khyad par de 'dra ba yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175446#175456#TD4035E.TXT.r_8920# sa bon dang  'jug pa dang  go rims dang  yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa dang  yang dag pa'i bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dang  de bzhin du dang po sems bskyed pa dang  sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang  pha rol tu phyin    pa dang  bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi bdag dang pha rol gyi rgyud yongs su smin par bya ba dang  dpag tu med pa la 'du shes pa lnga ste / /

column4: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271599#271600#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7251# sems can gyi khams dang  'jig rten gyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  gdul ba'i khams dang  gdul ba'i thabs kyi khams te zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs mdor smos pa bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o // /

column6: 0.023#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122746#3122746#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4383# de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni khams lnga po sems can gyi khams dang  'jig rten gyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  'dul ba'i  khams dang  'dul ba'i thabs kyi khams rnam pa thams cad de / /

column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175473#175486#TD4035E.TXT.r_8921# sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa la 'du shes pa dang  'jig rten gyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  'dul ba'i  khams dang  'dul ba'i thabs kyi khams dpag tu med pa la 'du shes pa dang  de kho na'i don gyi rjes su 'gro ba dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang  de'i ye shes gang yin pa dang  mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa  dang  ye shes sgrib pa med pa dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang  rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi dang  stobs bcu dang  mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang  bsrung ba  med pa gsum dang  snying rje chen po dang  bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang  bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang  rnam pa thams cad dang  mchog gi ye shes so // /

column5: 0.0#TD4048E.TXT.r#1696494#1696502#TD4048E.TXT.r_1889# shin tu yongs su dag pa'i tshad med pa bzhin dang  rnam par thar pa brgyad dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang  zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang   mngon par shes pa drug dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang  rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi dang  stobs bcu dang  mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang  bsrung ba med pa gsum dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang  bag chags  yang dag par bcom pa dang  bsnyel ba med pa'i chos nyid dang  thugs rje chen po dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang  rnam pa'i mchog thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang  pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan no // /

column6: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#151326#151326#TD4035E.TXT.r_4617;TD4035E.TXT.r_4618;TD4035E.TXT.r_4619# 'du shes phyin ci log dang  lta ba phyin ci log dang  sems phyin ci log dang  mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam pa'i phyin ci log dang  sdug bsngal la bde'o snyam pa'i phyin ci log dang  mi gtsang ba la gtsang ngo snyam pa'i phyin ci log dang   bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa'i phyin ci log go // / +'du shes phyin ci log gang zhe na / / +mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam pa dang  sdug bsngal ba la bde'o snyam pa dang  mi gtsang ba la gtsang ngo snyam pa dang  bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa'i 'du shes kyi yongs su rtog pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: chos kyi sku gzhan pa ni ma lags kyi / / +bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lags so zhes bya ba dang  bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa zhes bgyi ba yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi skur bstan to zhes bya ba dang   bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig bla dgas lags so zhes gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: de la tshigs su bcad pa phyed phyi mas ci bstan zhe na / / +rnam kun mngon par byang chub dang / /

column3: gang gi phyir zag pa med pa'i dbyings kyi rnam grangs bzhi po 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams kyi don gcig la yang dag par 'du ba de'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175590#175601#TD4035E.TXT.r_8939;TD4035E.TXT.r_8940;TD4035E.TXT.r_8941;TD4035E.TXT.r_8942;TD4035E.TXT.r_8943# mchog du gdags par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +rab tu zhi ba gang zhe na / / +dge ba'i     // /

column3: 'di dag don gcig pas  gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi sgo nas chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid ces brjod pa gang yin pa dang  lhan cig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas bag chags dang bcas pa'i dri ma spangs pa'i phyir mya ngan  las 'das pa zhes brjod pa 'di gnyis ka yang zag pa med pa'i dbyings la dbyer med bcad du med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175602#175615#TD4035E.TXT.r_8943;TD4035E.TXT.r_8944;TD4035E.TXT.r_8945;TD4035E.TXT.r_8946;TD4035E.TXT.r_8947;TD4035E.TXT.r_8948;TD4035E.TXT.r_8949# byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'bras bu dang bcas pa thams cad la rab tu zhi zhes bya'o // / +rang bzhin gang zhe na / /

column3: gnyis su med do zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o // / +rnam pa thams cad grangs med pa // / +bsam med dri med yon tan dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175638#175648#TD4035E.TXT.r_8955;TD4035E.TXT.r_8956;TD4035E.TXT.r_8957;TD4035E.TXT.r_8958;TD4035E.TXT.r_8959;TD4035E.TXT.r_8960# chos tsam la gang zag rnam par gzhag pa'am / / +mtshan ma tsam la chos su rnam par  gzhag pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: dbyer med mtshan nyid thar pa ste // / +thar pa  gang de de bzhin gshegs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175649#175656#TD4035E.TXT.r_8958;TD4035E.TXT.r_8959;TD4035E.TXT.r_8960;TD4035E.TXT.r_8961;TD4035E.TXT.r_8962# mngon par rtogs pa drug ste / / +snga ma bzhin du 'di lta ste / / +rtogs pa dang bcas dpyod pa bcas pa'i sa las 'byung ba bzhin no // /

column3: zhes bya ba 'di ni ji skad du // / +dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbang du mdzad nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175657#175665#TD4035E.TXT.r_8960;TD4035E.TXT.r_8961;TD4035E.TXT.r_8962;TD4035E.TXT.r_8963;TD4035E.TXT.r_8964# rtogs pa dang bcas dpyod pa bcas pa'i sa las 'byung ba bzhin no // / +sdom la / / +yul can gnas skabs rtog pa dang / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni / / +de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags so zhes gsungs  ba yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175666#175673#TD4035E.TXT.r_8963;TD4035E.TXT.r_8964;TD4035E.TXT.r_8965;TD4035E.TXT.r_8966# spyod len tshogs  dang mun pa dang / / +tshig dang rtogs bya yang dag phul // /

column3: 'dis ni lam ring pos dub pa rnams la 'brog dgon du mdzad nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175674#175681#TD4035E.TXT.r_8965;TD4035E.TXT.r_8966;TD4035E.TXT.r_8967;TD4035E.TXT.r_8968;TD4035E.TXT.r_8969# dben pa dang ni 'jug pa bzhi // / +yul can gang zhe na / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa zhes ba gyi dbang phyug dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi ldog pa'i thabs yin no zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175682#175693#TD4035E.TXT.r_8968;TD4035E.TXT.r_8969;TD4035E.TXT.r_8970;TD4035E.TXT.r_8971;TD4035E.TXT.r_8972;TD4035E.TXT.r_8973;TD4035E.TXT.r_8974# gnas skabs gang zhe na / / +tshor ba'i phung po gang yin pa'o // / +rtog pa gang zhe na / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin     // / +gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175692#175708#TD4035E.TXT.r_8972;TD4035E.TXT.r_8973;TD4035E.TXT.r_8974;TD4035E.TXT.r_8975;TD4035E.TXT.r_8976;TD4035E.TXT.r_8977;TD4035E.TXT.r_8978;TD4035E.TXT.r_8979# spyod  pa gang zhe na / / +'du byed kyi phung po gang yin pa'o // / +len pa gang zhe na / /

column3: thams cad gzhal du med pa / / +bsam gyis mi khyab pa / / +rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni yon tan rnam pa  bzhi grub pa dang  dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid mya ngan las 'das pa thob pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175708#175719#TD4035E.TXT.r_8978;TD4035E.TXT.r_8979;TD4035E.TXT.r_8980;TD4035E.TXT.r_8981;TD4035E.TXT.r_8982;TD4035E.TXT.r_8983# nyon mongs pa'i tshogs dang las kyi tshogs so // / +tshogs ji lta ba de bzhin du / /

column3: de'i bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i phyir na sangs rgyas dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag rnam par dbye ba med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas nyid med par 'ga'  yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa med do zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175718#175730#TD4035E.TXT.r_8981;TD4035E.TXT.r_8982;TD4035E.TXT.r_8983;TD4035E.TXT.r_8984;TD4035E.TXT.r_8985;TD4035E.TXT.r_8986# mun pa gang zhe na / / +ma rig pa dang the tshom mo // / +tshig gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175730#175738#TD4035E.TXT.r_8985;TD4035E.TXT.r_8986;TD4035E.TXT.r_8987;TD4035E.TXT.r_8988;TD4035E.TXT.r_8989# rtogs par bya ba gang zhe na / / +bstan pa de dang  de'i don la rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: de la zag pa med pa'i dbyings la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrubs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan thams cad pa nyid ni ri mo mkhan gyi dpes rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175737#175754#TD4035E.TXT.r_8987;TD4035E.TXT.r_8988;TD4035E.TXT.r_8989;TD4035E.TXT.r_8990;TD4035E.TXT.r_8991;TD4035E.TXT.r_8992# yang dag phul gang zhe na / / +dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1362048#1362049#TD4037E.TXT.r_6192;TD4037E.TXT.r_6193# bcu gang zhe na / / +nyes par spyod pa las dben pa dang  'dod pa las dben pa dang  nyes par mi spyod cing 'byung bar byed pa dang  dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdams pa dang  shes bzhin du gnas pa dang  'dul 'dzi dben pa dang  rab tu bden par gyur nas  rtogs pa ngan pa las dben pa dang  sgrib pa las dben pa dang  nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa las dben pa dang  nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyi gnas ngan len las dben pa'o //// /

column3: ji  ltar ri mo 'dri byed pa // / +gzhan dang gzhan la mkhas pa dag / / +gang zhig yan lag gang shes pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175750#175765#TD4035E.TXT.r_8991;TD4035E.TXT.r_8992;TD4035E.TXT.r_8993;TD4035E.TXT.r_8994;TD4035E.TXT.r_8995# nyes par spyod pa las dben pa dang  'dod pa las dben pa dang  yo byad las dben pa dang / /

column3: de gzhan des zin med par 'gyur // / +des na 'di la khyed kun gyis // /

column3: nga yi gzugs ni gyis shig ces // / +mnga' bdag rgyal pos de dag la // / +bka' yis ras ni byin pa  dang / /

column3: de las de ni thos gyur te // / +ri mo'i las la rab sbyor ro // / +de la mngon par sbyor rnams las // /

column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175859#175876#TD4035E.TXT.r_9004;TD4035E.TXT.r_9005# gcig nas rtog pa dang  tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba dang  tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba dang  mu bzhir sbyor ba dang  dngos po med pa dang  gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang   gzugs can ma yin pa rnams dang  bstan du yod pa rnams dang  bstan du med pa rnams dang  thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  thogs pa med pa rnams dang  zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  zag pa med pa rnams dang  'dus byas rnams dang   'dus ma byas rnams dang  nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  nyon mongs pa med pa rnams dang  zang zing dang bcas pa rnams dang  zang zing med pa rnams dang  zhen pa la brten pa rnams dang  mngon bar 'byung ba la brten pa rnams dang  'jig rten  pa rnams dang  'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang  khongs su gtogs pa rnams dang  khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa rnams dang  nang gi rnams dang  phyi rol gyi rnams dang  rags pa rnams dang  phra ba rnams dang  ngan pa rnams dang  bzang po  rnams dang  rgyang ring ba rnams dang  nye ba rnams dang  dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  dmigs pa med pa rnams dang  mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang  mi ldan pa rnams dang  rnam pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam pa med pa rnams dang  rten dang bcas  pa rnams dang  rten med pa rnams dang  rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa dang  'bras bu dang 'bras bu ma yin pa dang  rnam par smin pa dang  rnam par smin pa ma yin pa rnams dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba rnams dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba ma yin pa rnams dang  'bras     // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi gyo ba rnam par mi rtog pa skyon med pa rgyun mi 'chad par rang gi dang gis 'jug pa'i lam shes pa la brten pas na zag pa  med pa'i dbyings la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan thams cad pa nyid yang dag par 'grub po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175876#175887#TD4035E.TXT.r_9005# bu dang bcas pa rnams dang  'bras bu dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  zin pa rnams dang  ma zin pa rnams dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur  byas pa dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa ma yin pa dang  mtshungs pa rnams dang  de dang mtshungs pa rnams dang  gong na yod pa rnams dang  gong na med pa rnams dang  'das pa rnams dang  ma 'ongs pa rnams dang  da ltar byung ba rnams dang  dge ba rnams dang  mi dge ba rnams dang   lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa rnams dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  mthong bas spang  bar bya ba rnams dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang  spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang  rkyen bzhi ste / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa dag gis tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes  pa la brten pas ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#154872#154877#TD4035E.TXT.r_5204# de bzhin du rnam par smin par nges pa dang  rnam par smin par ma nges pa dang  rnam par smin pa rnam par smin zin pa dang  rnam par smin pa rnam par ma smin pa dang  dge ba dang mi dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa dang  sdom pas bsdus pa dang   sdom pa ma yin pas bsdus pa dang  sdom pas bsdus pa yang ma yin la sdom pa ma yin pas bsdus pa yang ma yin pa dang  sbyin pa las byung ba dang  tshul khrims las byung ba dang  bsgom pa las byung ba dang  bsod nams dang  bsod nams ma yin pa  dang  mi gyo ba dang  bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang  sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang  tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba dang  skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang  lan grangs gzhan la  myong bar 'gyur ba dang  'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  de ltar byung ba dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa dang  gzugs dang ldan pa dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang  slob pa dang  mi slob pa dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa dang   mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang  spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dang  gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa dang  dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba dang  gnag cing dkar la rnam par smin pa gnag cing dkar ba dang  las gnag    pa yang ma yin dkar ba yang ma yin la rnam par smin pa yang med de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175886#175900#TD4035E.TXT.r_9005# bu dang bcas pa rnams dang  'bras bu dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  zin pa rnams dang  ma zin pa rnams dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur  byas pa dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa ma yin pa dang  mtshungs pa rnams dang  de dang mtshungs pa rnams dang  gong na yod pa rnams dang  gong na med pa rnams dang  'das pa rnams dang  ma 'ongs pa rnams dang  da ltar byung ba rnams dang  dge ba rnams dang  mi dge ba rnams dang   lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa rnams dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  mthong bas spang  bar bya ba rnams dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang  spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang  rkyen bzhi ste / /
column6: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2772358#2772358#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9956# dmigs pa dang  gnas pa 'dren pa'i chos rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa med pa rnams dang  rgyu dang bcas pa rnams dang  rgyu med pa rnams dang  'bras bu dang bcas pa rnams dang  'bras bu med pa  rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams dang  nang gi rnams dang  phyi rol gyi rnams dang  ming dang gzugs kyis bsdus pa rnams dang  zin pa rnams dang  'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa dang  'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa ma  yin pa dang  srid pa rnams dang  srid pa ma yin pa rnams dang  bla na yod pa rnams dang  bla na med pa rnams dang  bsgom par bya ba rnams dang  'das pa rnams dang  ma 'ongs pa rnams dang  da ltar byung ba rnams dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs dang ldan  pa rnams dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  dge ba rnams dang  mi dge ba rnams dang  lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa rnams dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  mthong bas spang bar bya ba  rnams dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang  spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang  zab mo mthong bar dka' ba'i chos rnams kyi dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad bstan pa de dag yin te / /

column3: yon tan tshad med pa nyid yang dag par 'grub po // / +byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas lkog tu ma gyur pa'i shes pa la brten pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175901#175914#TD4035E.TXT.r_9005;TD4035E.TXT.r_9006;TD4035E.TXT.r_9007# bu dang bcas pa rnams dang  'bras bu dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  zin pa rnams dang  ma zin pa rnams dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur  byas pa dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa ma yin pa dang  mtshungs pa rnams dang  de dang mtshungs pa rnams dang  gong na yod pa rnams dang  gong na med pa rnams dang  'das pa rnams dang  ma 'ongs pa rnams dang  da ltar byung ba rnams dang  dge ba rnams dang  mi dge ba rnams dang   lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa rnams dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  mthong bas spang  bar bya ba rnams dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang  spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang  rkyen bzhi ste / /

column3: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mngon par  'grub po // / +de'i rjes thogs su sangs rgyas kyi sa thob pa'i phyir bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa mtha' dag las grol ba'i shes pa la brten pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2900906#2900914#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4631;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4632# de la so sor rton pa ni bzhi ste / / +chos la rton gyi  gang zag la ma yin pa dang  don la rton gyi tshig la ma yin pa dang  nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi bkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde la ma yin pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par sha pa la ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175915#175934#TD4035E.TXT.r_9006;TD4035E.TXT.r_9007;TD4035E.TXT.r_9008# rgyu'i rkyen dang  mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang  dmigs pa dang  bdag po'i rkyen dang  rton pa bzhi ste / / +chos la rton gyi gang zag la ma yin pa dang   don la rton gyi yi ge la ma yin pa dang  nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi / /
column6: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1454601#1454601#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6428# chos la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang  don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la ma yin pa dang  nges pa'i don gyi mdo la rton gyi drang ba'i don la ma yin pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba dang  de bzhin du don la rton  pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ba yin no // /
column7: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2455411#2455411#TD4019E.TXT.r_6357# nges pa'i don la rton gyi drang ba'i don la mi rton ces pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang  chos la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton ba dang  don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o // /

column3: rnam par dag pa mchog gi yon tan nyid yang dag par 'grub po // / +gang gi phyir sa'i ye shes kyi rten  bzhi po 'di dag la dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba med pa de'i phyir de dag ni yon tan rnam pa bzhi grub pa dang  dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings las ring du gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4006E.TXT.r#1086626#1086636#TD4006E.TXT.r_328# pha  rol tu phyin pa bcu dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang  bden pa bzhi dang  tshad med pa bzhi dang  bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi  dang ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543729#543733#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12246# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la tshig lnga yod pa bzhin du yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun  rnams la yang tshig lnga yod par gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column6: 0.0#TD4017E.TXT.r#2685993#2686000#TD4017E.TXT.r_4276;TD4017E.TXT.r_4277# byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyi chos te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175932#175946#TD4035E.TXT.r_9007;TD4035E.TXT.r_9008# chos la rton gyi gang zag la ma yin pa dang   don la rton gyi yi ge la ma yin pa dang  nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi / / +dkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde la ma yin pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang  tshad med pa bzhi dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang   rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang  chos kyi gnas bzhi dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  lhag pa'i tshul  khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems dang  lhag pa'i shes rab dang  bslab pa rnams dang  rnam par thar pa rnams dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams so // /
column8: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175946#175960#TD4035E.TXT.r_9008# dkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde la ma yin pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang  tshad med pa bzhi dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang   rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang  chos kyi gnas bzhi dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  lhag pa'i tshul  khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems dang  lhag pa'i shes rab dang  bslab pa rnams dang  rnam par thar pa rnams dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams so // /
column9: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34384#34393#TD4036E.TXT.r_5257;TD4036E.TXT.r_5258;TD4036E.TXT.r_5259# byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di lta ste / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi  dang ; / +yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste / /

column3: shes rab ye shes rnam grol rnams // / +gsal dang 'phro  dang dag phyir dang / / +tha dad med phyir 'od dang zer // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175961#175973#TD4035E.TXT.r_9008;TD4035E.TXT.r_9009# dkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde la ma yin pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang  tshad med pa bzhi dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang   rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang  chos kyi gnas bzhi dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  lhag pa'i tshul  khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems dang  lhag pa'i shes rab dang  bslab pa rnams dang  rnam par thar pa rnams dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams so // /

column3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang mtshungs // / +shes rab gang dang ye shes gang dang rnam par grol ba gang gis yon tan rnam pa bzhi 'grub pa dang  dbye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings de mtshon par byed pa de  dag ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsum dang  rnam pa gcig gis nyi ma dang chos mthun par rnam pa bzhin bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175974#175982#TD4035E.TXT.r_9008;TD4035E.TXT.r_9009;TD4035E.TXT.r_9010;TD4035E.TXT.r_9011;TD4035E.TXT.r_9012# dkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde la ma yin pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang  tshad med pa bzhi dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang   rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang  chos kyi gnas bzhi dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  lhag pa'i tshul  khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems dang  lhag pa'i shes rab dang  bslab pa rnams dang  rnam par thar pa rnams dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams so // / +kun 'byung ba gang zhe na / /

column3: de bzhin bde gshegs mnar med rnams la yang // / +sangs rgyas spyan gyis rang chos nyid gzigs te // /

column3: sgrib med phyi ma'i mur gnas thugs rje yi // / +bdag cag sgrib pa las ni grol bar byed // /

column5: 0.020#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1064800#1064801#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1995# byang chub zad  pa dang mi skye ba shes pa na gang zag gi bye brag gis nyan thos kyi byang chub dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang  byang chub gsum zhes bya ste / /

column3: ji ltar mi sdug padma  zum la bde bar gshegs pa ni // / +de yi khong gnas lha mig mthong nas 'dab ma gcod byed ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#176342#176354#TD4035E.TXT.r_9079;TD4035E.TXT.r_9080;TD4035E.TXT.r_9081;TD4035E.TXT.r_9082# nyan thos kyi byang chub dang  rang byang chub dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'o // / +bstan pa gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +skyabs su 'gro ba rnams dang  bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba dang  ston pa po dang  nyan pa po gzhag pa dang  bla ma dang slob  ma gzhag pa dang  sbyin pa'i gtam dang  tshul khrims kyi gtam dang  mtho ris kyi gtam dang  'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba dang  mngon par 'byung zhing rab tu dben par gnas pa'i phan  yon dang  rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes rgyas par sbyar ro // /

column3: chags sdang sogs dri sbubs bsgribs rdzogs sangs snying po'i 'gro gzigs te // /

column5: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#657712#657712#TD4069E.TXT.r_4943# sbyin pa'i gtam dang  tshul khrims kyi gtam dang  mtho ris kyi gtam dang  'dod pa rnams la  ro myong ba dang  nyes dmigs dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba dang  nges par 'byung ba dang  rab tu dben pa dang  phan yon dang  rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad pa yin no // /

column3: thugs rjes thub pa de bzhin sgrib pa de ni 'joms par mdzad // /
nyon mongs pa ni srog chags     // / +sbrang ma dang 'dra la / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sbrang rtsi lta bu ste / /

column3: mthong nas de dang thabs kyis srog chags sogs // / +kun nas bral bar rab tu byed pa  bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#176391#176401#TD4035E.TXT.r_9087;TD4035E.TXT.r_9088# dge ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba rnams dang  nyes dmigs dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang dag yongs su shes par bya ba dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams gang dag dang du mi len cing rnam par gnon pas thog mar spang bar bya ba dang      // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#176428#176431#TD4035E.TXT.r_9088# bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gang dag mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba dang  mi mthun pa dang  mthun pa'i chos rnams gang dag mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba dang mthun pa dang  mtshan nyid la dmigs pa de  bzhin nyid du gtogs pa'i chos rnams gang dag so sor khong du chud par bya ba dang  yon tan khyad par can du gtogs pa'i chos rnams gang dag par bya ba dang  'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i chos rnams gang dag so sor bsten pas spang bar bya ba dang  spangs  nas kun du 'byung ba rnams dang  mthar phyin pa'i chos rnams gang dag bdag gi don thob pa ngag gis mngon sum du bya ba'o // /

column7: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1776241#1776241#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9654# dge slong gang dag mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos de dag mngon par shes shing yongs su shes par 'gyur ba dang  chos gang dag mngon par shes nas spang bar bya ba'i chos de dag mngon par shes  nas yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang  chos gang dag mngon par shes nas mngon du byed pa'i chos de dag mngon par shes nas mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba dang  chos gang dag mngon par shes nas bsgom par bya ba'i chos de dag sgom par 'gyur ba 'di ni dge slong zhes brjod de / /

column17: 0.028#TD4027E.TXT.r#555472#555472#TD4027E.TXT.r_528# rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don la gang kun nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yin yang med par rab tu rtogs  pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2772172#2772172#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9940;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9941# 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa lta ba lnga dang  lta ba de  dag la 'dod chags dang  khong khro ba dang  nga rgyal gang dag yin pa dang  de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang  bden pa rnams la ma rig pa ma 'dres pa dang  bden pa rnams la yid gnyis dang  ngan song du 'gro ba dang  mthun pa'i las mthong bas spang bar bya ba  gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o // / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na / /

column3: nyon mongs pa ni phyi yi sbun pa dang 'dra la // / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i  khams ni nang gi snying po bzhin // /

column3: ji ltar sbun ldan 'bru yi snying po ni // / +mi rnams kyis ni longs spyod mi 'gyur ba / / +zas sogs don du gnyer ba gang yin pa // /

column3: de dag gis ni sbun gnas de 'byin ltar // / +de bzhin sems can la yod nyon mongs kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#176484#176493#TD4035E.TXT.r_9095;TD4035E.TXT.r_9096;TD4035E.TXT.r_9097;TD4035E.TXT.r_9098# mi  dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams la yang bag yod pa yod de / / +'di lta ste / / +kha cig srog chags bsad pa la sogs pa dang  spyod lam dang bzo'i gnas la sogs pa lhur len pa lta bu dag ste / /

column3: dri ma dang 'dres rgyal ba'ang ji srid  du ; / / +nyon mongs dri ma 'dres las ma grol ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#176494#176503#TD4035E.TXT.r_9097;TD4035E.TXT.r_9098;TD4035E.TXT.r_9099;TD4035E.TXT.r_9100# kha cig srog chags bsad pa la sogs pa dang  spyod lam dang bzo'i gnas la sogs pa lhur len pa lta bu dag ste / / +dge ba'i chos la bag yod pa gang yin pa de ni / /
column5: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#638571#638571#TD4069E.TXT.r_2238# ma chags par mi 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par grol bar mi byed ces bya ba'i bar du shes par bya'o // /
